description:
Open by Axis Bank is a safe, secure and user friendly mobile banking application with 250+ cutting edge features and services satisfying more than just your regular banking queries.

Online Digital Savings Account

Now open a savings account online at your convenience! The latest version of open by Axis Bank allows you to get your digital savings account up and running from anywhere, with services such as video based KYC that can be set up at your convenience. You will also be instantly issued a Virtual Debit Card linked to your Digital Savings Account!
What’s more, you can enjoy various offers on your Digital Savings Account with Grab Deals, Axis Bank’s shopping portal.

Banking Transactions Simplified

Banking needs are often subjective to individuals, some prefer to get a comprehensive update of all their financial activities while others simply wish to check their savings account balance; so why shouldn’t your app be the same? Get a customisable dashboard on open by Axis Bank with the explore tab that grants you a one-stop access to your account balances as well as regularly used features like mutual fund investments, dues and more!
Apart from an interactive dashboard you also set-up a 6 digit MPIN when using open by Axis Bank. This is a cross platform security code that can help you validate fund transfers from your savings account and transactions on your App, as well as log in to internet banking and authenticate Debit/Credit Card payments. The Bhim Unified Payment Interface (UPI) is also enabled on Axis Bank, letting you make UPI payments, Add Payees, Scan & Pay instantly as well as Make Your Own UPI QR Code. UPI ID is a unique ID that is used to make UPI payments in place of bank account details. UPI PIN is a 4- or 6-digit number which needs to be set by you while creating your UPI ID. Please don’t share your UPI PIN. Additionally, you can also find a record of transactions made for your ready reference via:

• UPI Transaction history
• Savings Account summary
• Card Statements
• Utility Bill Payments made to over 200 registered billers

Avail Services at One Touch

Whether it’s a Mutual Fund you seek to start or open FDs & RDs, open by Axis Bank lets you do that and more! Experience a newly re-vamped Mutual Fund journey along with instant opening of Digital Savings Accounts, access to Insurance services & Credit Card application.
Alternatively, if you’re seeking to avail funds instead of investing them, get instantly sanctioned pre-approved 24x7 loans! One can easily avail 100% digital Personal Loan as well in few simple steps.

Apart from new ones, you can also easily access and control existing services such as your Savings Account /Loan statements, Forex, Demat and Mutual Fund details, Credit and Debit Cards statements or converting your Credit Card dues into EMI.

Go beyond everyday banking

Now that banking services are covered, what next? Glad you asked!

Enjoy deals on various brands across lifestyle, travel and more with grab deals on the Axis Mobile App, open. Not only can Axis Bank customers be eligible for these offers but on having specific products such as the Full Power Digital Savings Account you can avail for exclusive cashback!

You can also browse through the Open Access blog for timely and thematic reads on all things related to personal finance.
If you have queries that need to be resolved at a branch, use the app’s branch locator feature to know where the nearest Axis Bank branch is!
And while there may be more features for you to unpack, we welcome you to join open by Axis Bank and explore them as per your preferences.

For any feedback, queries or issues pertaining to Axis Mobile application please write to customer.service@axisbank.com or call us @ 1860-419-5555

For any other details  please visit https://www.axisbank.com/bank-smart/open-by-axis-bank

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Lr: The image is an advertisement for the Axis Bank mobile app. It features a phone displaying the app's "open" logo, and text indicating it is the Axis Mobile App.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/mv: This appears to be a screenshot of a mobile banking app interface. It shows a dashboard with information about the user's accounts, including account balances, credit card information, and offers for personal loans. The app seems to provide a "one view" of all bank accounts. The user's name is "Vijay".
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/PC: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app related to money transfers. It seems to be advertising instant and secure money transfers, with features for sending money, managing payees, and viewing transaction history.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Ti: The image is a screenshot from a mobile app that allows users to book Fixed Deposits (FDs) at attractive interest rates. The screenshot displays the "Start a Deposit" page, with options to choose between Fixed Deposit and Recurring Deposit. It shows the interest rates for different tenures like 6 months, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years. There is also an option to "Enter your own tenure". The screenshot is designed to showcase the app's features and promote the benefits of booking an FD through the app.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/pZ:
The image is a screenshot or mockup of a mobile app interface related to Unified Payments Interface (UPI) transactions. It displays the following elements:

*   **App Interface:** The screen shows a mobile device displaying the app's interface.
*   **UPI Payment Section:**  The header reads "UPI Payment."
*   **User Information:**  It greets the user "Hi, Vijay," and shows a bank account linked to Axis Bank with a masked account number.
*   **Check Balance Button**
*   **UPI ID:** It displays the user's UPI ID (xxx123@axisbank).
*   **Send Money Options:**  It offers options to send money via "Scan Any UPI QR", "Any UPI ID", "Phone Number", and "Bank Account."
*   **Recent Transactions:**  It lists recent UPI transactions with names like "Rahul Mehra" and "Priya Sen".
*   **BHIM UPI Logo:** The logo of BHIM UPI is visible, implying this app is related to or powered by the BHIM UPI platform.
*   **Text Overlay:** There's a text overlay at the top saying, "Perform seamless and secure UPI transactions," likely an advertising or promotional message.

The design, UI etc are user friendly and nothing against that. but the app is HORRIBLY slow and going just to check my credit card recent transactions is a pain. There are 3 popups, a very slow login, no good navigation, and user experience is pathetic. when you have a smooth UI and good navigation, why can't you make an app that doesn't lag so much

An excellent app which fulfills all requirements impeccably. However, a glitch has occurred recently. On clicking "Credit Cards", a blank screen is appearing and credit card section is not accessible anymore. It's working fine in net banking but not at all inside this app. Please rectify this glitch which I trust is a temporary one. I'm still maintaining 5* since the app is otherwise perfect.

New version is horrible.! Axis Mobile used to be a great app, all info and features used to be there with easy access. With the new design, with the introduction of account aggregator there is no way to see my axis savings account and transaction details. Horrible. Lots of pages throws out error or breaks. Even though UX is better, I cannot see my savings details and has to go to netbanking to do my tasks. Feels like proper testing didn't happen before pushing to production.

Useless. The app automatically logged me out. I updated to the latest version and it doesn't even go beyond the log in page now. After I give the login pin, it hangs for a while and then closes. How the heck do you roll out a buggy below par app like this to your customers?! Edit: After the latest update, it automatically says enter sim card in correct slot,etc. I have been using the same phone, number, sim and the same tray slot for the past many years and now suddenly app gives this error

Really bad interface. Only the home page is looking better. All services and everything is bad. Giving 2 star just for home page and credit card page. I have a credit card and app showed it was ineligible ifor limit enhancement, but when i mailed customer support those guys said it is eligible and they guided me through the process. App REALLY need a complete testing and need a rework. **Edit: Reduced 1 star for their bad development team and customer support team. THE WORST banking app EVER!!

This is a good APP. App is fast and UX is very convenient. Show balance in locked app is very helpful feature. Feedback for new version: Current version's speed is very slow. Ux is also not upto the mark. Team, please take necessary action. I think you have moved from native app to hybrid. Please resolve the issue due to technology change.

After the recent update on 20-11-2024, the app sends an SMS from the registered mobile number (which it doesn't send as it seems so) and lands on login screen. After entering 6 digit password, the app says SIM is not in the correct slot and asks the user to re-register with axis Bank app. All this while the SIM was on the first slot and the app has no issues, then why now and issue is faced suddenly after the update? This is not good user experience with latest update. Please check your build.

I get the following error while opening the app: 'We detected screen sharing application RVNCViewer Kindly uninstall to continue'. This is an application used by people to login into their remote computers and hence very common among IT professionals. RVNCViewer does not allow anyone to take remote control of the mobile and is only a viewer as in the name itself. It's pretty dumb of your security experts to block this app. Above all, give a warning if necessary, you have no right to block.

Useless app! Used to work just fine. But one fine fine day all of a sudden, it refused to recognise the sim registered with the bank a/c even though the sim was properly placed in the proper slot, activated and working without any issue. Now even to register again for mobile no. verification, it sends SMS but after 45 sec timer the system never verfies it. Classic example of intentionally breaking what is not broken by modifying unnecessary stuff.

Slow and old UI like a government web app. Spammy notifications being sent from one single channel, cannot even disable them due to loss of important notifications along with them, if disabled. Functionality and access is good. Edit: Updated UI is better. Also, why in the world can't I take a screenshot of my own account transactions? I literally entered a passcode to access them on my OWN device. At least give us an option or a setting to toggle this "security" feature.

The app is extrenely slow. Does not recognize action. Keeps on telling me to update profile even after I have done so and got a mail to the effect. Cannot pay my bills as the app continues to tell me update my mobile and phone numbers even though it is updated. Extremely bad experience from the time it changed from citi to axis. Citi was very good.

The latest update of app is pathetic. On launch, it asks me to enable thumbprint each time. Then it is not able to display transactions on clicking on account number. Blank page shows up, which do not even allow me to go back. The back button there is non-functional. How can axis roll out with so visible and bugs on landing/main pages. No testing at all?

This app is an absolute trash when used outside of India. What's the point of this app when it can't connect from anywhere ? 1. App just doesn't even go to the login page and says cannot process the request. It works 1 every 50 tries. 2. Even after login it starts showing me demo of the app EVERY TIME I manage to login. I have to skip the damn thing!!! (happens even when accessed within India) 3. Internet banking also directs to app to 1 time otp! While the app hardly works!! USELESS!!

After an update of application, It is very irritating when an undesired tips screen pops up for every interaction with the app although there are no changes with that feature. Update : responding to your response I can only say that debugging/testing your app is your responsibility . there us enough input for you to act if you ever intended to.

This update is blocker for customers who are on overseas work assignment with no internet plan for their mobile connectivity. Thanks to the update, now I cannot login though I have access to OTP. It is asking to turn off wifi and use mobile internet to enhance security. As an IT professional, I can understand that. But that can not justify the showstopper feature.

Editing after 6 months of usage. This app is still worst app in the world. Never experienced such useless and hopeless app in my life. Just to check balance and statement, I had to close the app 10 times. Still unable to get the details. Finally checked balance from Phonepe app where I got the info instantly. You won't find any banking app worst than this. Since there is no option for zero star giving 1 star. I thought Axis bank is good but I was wrong. Worst user experience someone can get.

Previously it was good experience with this app but now all payment details specially regarding credit card bill payment it is worst app. I have done my payment but still it is showing me unbilled. And also there is no credit limit available. Worst experience ever. Also they charged me Rs 3778 in the name of Ecs return charges within 3 months. I want to close my account but there is no option to close it online and I am not able to go to branch that is why I am continuing to be customer of Axis

The Axis Mobile app isn’t working on my phone. When I tap "Login," it sends an SMS for verification, but I don’t receive any response from the bank. No error message appears, and it goes back to the main screen. I’ve reinstalled the app, cleared cache, checked settings, and updated it, but nothing helps. Even customer support couldn’t resolve the issue. Very frustrating experience. I FEEL REVIEW/RATINGS ARE FAKE!

This is a 2 hand app! They have disabled the back key functionality and give option to go back on the top left of the screen. The user pin is required to be put in multiple times. You log in with pin to transfer money. Then they send you an otp to verify transaction. Then you have put in your pin again! What logic is this?

Whoever designed this app's interface really wanted all the users to literally suffer and scratch and bang their head every single time to find even the most basic options or services...the app keeps pushing update every now and then changing things drastically and I have no idea where to find what.It completely lacks a good user experience and makes even the simplest of things difficult for users to find.

App is really a horrible experience, took a while to setup the login process on the app. Too many very long loading screens after launch. Worst part is my internet banking is also blocked after installing the app. They introduced some idea of getting otp on app instead on sms. This is horrible. App doesnot give OTP, it stuck in a loading loop. Tried 5 times already and there is no way to do switch to sms mode. Stay Away from the App, its a buggy, web is much smoother and effective than app.

Disappointing Experience with Axis Bank App I've been using the Axis Bank app for a while now, and unfortunately, it's been a frustrating experience. The app is extremely heavy and slow, making it a chore to use. I've experienced frequent crashes, errors, and timeouts, which is unacceptable for a banking app. The app's performance is subpar, and it's clear that the developers have not prioritized user experience.

I've been using the Axis Bank app for a while now, and I have to say, it's one of the most intuitive banking apps out there. The interface is clean, easy to navigate, and packed with features that make managing my finances a breeze. Transferring money is quick and hassle-free, with multiple payment options like IMPS, NEFT, and UPI. I also appreciate the smooth integration of services like bill payments, recharges, and even managing my credit card.

Update 2025: I can no longer use this app while running a VPN. Users should have the freedom to choose which apps to run and accept the associated risks. Marking a VPN network as malicious is deceptive. Additionally, when I turn off the VPN, the app loads ads. Update 2024: The app has become non-functional without phone/SMS access. An app should operate with minimal access requirements. If mandatory access is needed for onboarding, users should be able to disable it afterward.

These days everyone forcing us to place the SIM in main slot. Disgusting and irritating to see the message "Insert the SIM in correct slot". Why you guys forcing us? I know safety is very important but there are many other ways to balance the safety and usability of the users. I can not use this app because internet is activated on other SIM which is in main slot. Without it I am not able to use the app and the internet at the same time. Before recent updates this app was working fine.

description:
What is True Balance?
True Balance is a secure platform for lending, payments, and financial services dedicated to the mission of "Finance for All." True Balance is a Prepaid Payment Instrument issuing entity, authorised by RBI, which issues Digital Wallet and Gift Wallet, which can be further utilised for recharges, bill payments, fund transfers and payments through wallet interoperability on UPI. It also provides unsecured Personal Loans through RBI-registered NBFCs, which have been trusted by over 75 million users across the country. Here, you may avail of digital personal loans ranging from ₹1,000 to ₹2,00,000 (Disbursal Amount) for a tenure of a minimum of 6 months to a maximum of 12 months at a low processing fee. The APR ranges from 28.8% to 99.7%

What We Offer:
*1- Quick Personal Loan: Cash Loan and Level Up Loan*
Cash Loan Features:
●Cash Loan: Apply today for a seamless borrowing experience.
●Safety: 100% safe and secure platform
●100% Digital and 24*7 access to loans
●Personal Loan Range: Borrow from ₹1,000 to ₹2,00,000 (Disbursal Amount)
●Flexible Tenure: Choose a repayment period of 6 to 12 months
●Low Processing Fees: Affordable costs
●Direct loan disbursal to your bank account

Example Online Loan Calculation:
-Loan Type: Unsecured Personal Loan
-Loan Amount INR 10,000
-Loan tenure: 6 Months
-Interest Rate 2.4% Per Month
-Processing Fee (6%): ₹600 + GST (18%): ₹708
-Interest: ₹844
-EMI: ₹1807
-Total Repayment: ₹11,550 (includes processing fee + GST)
*Interest rates may vary based on the borrower's risk profile.

*2. UPI*
Simplify money transfers with UPI-enabled True Balance Wallet (NPCI Approved).
●UPI Features
●Quickly transfers money to anyone, anytime
●Pay bills and recharge online
●24x7 access to digital payments to merchants
●Pan-India Service
●Interoperable personal loan app - Send money using your mobile number via UPI-enabled True Balance Wallet, including to those who are not on True Balance

How to Apply for a Personal Loan?
●Install the True Balance app.
●Register with your contact number to log in.
●Complete basic details to check loan eligibility.
●Submit KYC documents and apply for a quick loan.
●Receive the approved loan amount directly in your bank account.

Lending Partner Details (Loans facilitated by RBI-licensed NBFCs)
●True Credits Pvt. Ltd.
●InCred Financial Services Limited
●Grow Money Capital Pvt. Ltd.
●Muthoot Finance Ltd.
●Vivriti Capital Limited
●Northern Arc Capital Limited
●Lendbox (Transactree Technologies Pvt. Ltd.)
●Oxyzo Financial Services Limited

App Permissions and Reasons
●Location: For suitable online loan offers & Video KYC.
●SMS: For phone number verification & SIM binding for PPI interoperability.
●Camera: For KYC documentation & Video KYC.
●Phone Info: To prevent fraud.
●Microphone: For video KYC.

Contact Information
Address: The Circle Work, 5th Floor, Huda City Centre Metro Station, Sector 29, Gurugram, Haryana 122001, India. Email:  cs@balancehero.com

Additional Information
-A fully online and secure process with a 4.4-star rating.
-Highly secured and encrypted system for customer data.
-Privacy Policy: [True Balance Privacy Policy]
-Note: Terms and Conditions Apply!

## About Us

![Wavy Line](https://truebalance.io/_next/static/media/WavyLine.bdb20f99.svg)

Welcome to **True Balance** – your trusted financial friend. We pride ourselves on being the go-to platform for all your financial needs. **True Balance is your one-stop digital personal loan partner.** We are committed to providing hassle-free, quick personal loan online for your financial emergencies and guaranteeing you financial support precisely when you need it. Join us on the journey towards financial empowerment with True Balance.

[Know More](https://truebalance.io/who-are-we)

![Award Assocham](https://static.truebalance.io/tb-website/images/about-us-942.webp)

![Wavy Line](https://truebalance.io/_next/static/media/WavyLine.bdb20f99.svg)

- Cash Loan
- Level Up Loan
- Bill Payment and Recharges

![Cash Loan](https://static.truebalance.io/tb-website/images/img_tb_cl-640.webp)![background image](https://static.truebalance.io/tb-website/images/img_semicircle_bg-880.webp)

- Cash Loan

- Bill Payment and Recharges

₹5,000 - ₹2,00,000(Disbursal Amount)

Interest Rate Starting from **2.4%** per month\| **6 - 12 Months** Tenure

- **Online Quick Personal Loan** with a limit determined by credit score and income

- Ideal for **salaried** & **self-employed**, additional documents like Bank Statement may be required.


[Know More about Cash Loan](https://truebalance.io/cash-loan)

- Complete paperless Process
- Minimum documentation
- Quick Disbursal in your bank account

* * *

## How True Balance Works  ![Wavy Line](https://truebalance.io/_next/static/media/WavyLine.bdb20f99.svg)

True Balance - The **online lending platform** ensures a fast and hassle-free borrowing

experience, simple steps, easy processes.

![How it works](https://static.truebalance.io/tb-website/images/img_tb_step-1960.webp)

1

**Onboarding and KYC verification** The first step is the completion of KYC, which requires your PAN, Aadhaar, and a selfie.

![](https://static.truebalance.io/tb-website/images/img_tb_step_01_onboarding-750.webp)

**Select the Loan** Choose the amount and EMI tenure.

description:
We unveil to you a new world of endless possibilities which has grown from a smaller to a bigger passion encompassing an all new digital experience. From the Best technology bank 2021*, presenting to you bob World, the official Bank of Baroda’s Mobile Banking application (erstwhile known as M-Connect Plus).

bob World has been crafted intuitively for a seamless, delightful, contactless and effortless experience with 240+ services, all that you have to do is to sit back and experience the joy of banking for your 360° banking needs.

bob World - A World that is in tune with your World:

● Enhanced User experience with state-of-the-art design
● Open B3 digital savings account instantly with Video Know Your Customer (KYC) procedure & say bye to branch visits
● Refer, Earn & invite friends into your world of banking
● Enjoy a bouquet of benefits under bob world benefits program
● Secure app with dual PIN for login & transaction
● Bank-from-home with the all-in-One App at your fingertips
● Convenient user experience for senior citizens with new persona through bob World Gold

Save - Your world of savings & rewards:

● Save intelligently by tracking your expenses with our spend analyzer
● Transact with confidence as we have zero hidden cost
● Take control by managing your debit cards efficiently

Invest - Your world of investment on-the-go:

● Take informed investment decisions with Baroda Wealth- your one-stop Wealth Management solution
● Invest in Government schemes such as PPF, SSA, APY in a single click
● Insure yourself affordably & secure your family with PMJJBY & PMSBY
● Apply for IPO with most convenient and hassle free process
● Open instant Demat account and start invest.

Borrow - Your world of hassle-free loans:

● It's time to turn your dreams into reality with Digital loans #DilseDigital
● A bouquet of products such as Home, Car, Personal, Mudra, MSME, Loan against FD/RD, Micro- Personal Loans
● Check your Credit Score, EMI calculator

Shop & Pay - Your world of secure shopping:

● Travel solutions such as Bus, Flight & Hotel Booking to make your trips more memorable
● Compare & shop merchandise - We help you choose the best deal
● Bill & Recharge Payments at your convenience
● No need to use multiple UPI payment apps when you have bob World

*Adjudged as “Best Technology Bank of the Year” amongst large banks, by an eminent jury of IBA Annual Banking Technology Awards

New dashboard is not as user-friendly as before. Longer steps. Unnecessary info on first half of dashboard (account part). And orange is hard to look at. Even can properly scroll on the bottom half. And why is passbook not based on FY. It only shows calendar year.

Bob World is full of bugs. You have to try multiple times just to get anything done. After several attempts, I finally got into the app, but now I can't even set a PIN for my account debit card—it just keeps saying, "Unable to process now, please try again later." The experience has been terrible; even during registration, I faced multiple issues.

The worst payment app I have ever experienced. It often stops working without any prior notice showing a message 'update the app'. You can't scan any QR code and can't pay even ₹ 10 unless you update the app first. No matter where you are, whether you have Wi-Fi or not, whether you have enough data balance in your phone or not, whether you have enough storage space in your phone or not. All this happen without any warning and you become totally helpless at that moment.

I don't understand the purpose of this app. You can't see transactions, check your passbook status, or use any online services. It's just a fancy login screen with no real functionality. Every time I try to access something important, it either shows an error or doesn't work at all. If you're looking for a convenient banking experience, this app is NOT for you. Developers seriously need to fix this or just remove it from the store. Total waste of time!

Hi, With the latest update, UPI is not working. It says, "Debugging mode is enabled and usb is connected" while there is no usb connected to my phone. Resolve the bug and give an update asap! Been waiting for more than a month now. The error is coming when I click the option itself. Update: The issue is not resolved yet. Kindly raise a complaint by urself and let me know the status. I tried to raise. But the option is not available

Worst app, not letting users do anything (especially UPI transactions) in the basis of Location permissions. Once this bug appears, it just hangs and we need to force stop and restart, only to asked about location permission again. This app has gotten to the point of non-usability. It seems they just want to know users location, rather than letting customers do basic transactions.

Idk what these developers are doing. It doesn't work whenever I open the application for what I search. Transaction history is not shown. Passbook is not shown. Main thing for me are those but what's the use if it doesn't work. Branch office and the application both are lame. This issue is not a recent one but from long back.

My journey with the bob World app, the mobile banking platform of Bank of Baroda, has been nothing short of phenomenal. From the moment I registered, I found the interface incredibly user-friendly, designed with intuitive navigation and a sleek aesthetic that makes banking a seamless experience. One of the first features that caught my attention was the secure and straightforward login process. With options like biometric authentication, I felt confident about the safety of my transactions. such a trash app. keeps logging out. when I setup the app again, it limits the amount I can use. then I need to setup login pin. stupid app won't let me use the same pin. it says don't use previous 3 pins.... I tried 4 different pins, still it says the same! how many numbers can I remember???????? very bad app development. this is not security. this is nuisance. app is unreliable and not user friendly. very irritating to just login and view my statement. don't even deserve 1 star.

This App has many bugs to fix it has server issues at night. It shows insufficient funds at the night time. You need resolve All this issues for better banking services and experience for users.

BOB World offers a seamless mobile banking experience with a user-friendly interface, robust security, and comprehensive features. It enables instant transfers, bill payments, investment tools, and real-time transaction tracking. The app provides excellent 24/7 customer support and frequent updates for a cutting-edge experience. ✅ Highly recommended for hassle-free, secure, and efficient banking on the go!

description:
Securely buy, sell, and hold cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and PEPE (PEPE) with low trading fees. Used by over 240 million users worldwide, Binance is the largest cryptocurrency exchange* in the world.
Here is why:

TRADE YOUR FAVORITE TOKENS AND MORE

Trade over 350 listed cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), PEPE (PEPE) and Notcoin (NOT).
Track the market using price alerts and trade with advanced trading tools. 
Set up recurring orders (DCA) to buy crypto every hour, day, week or month.
Enjoy best-in-class liquidity on each crypto trade. 
Buy cryptocurrency and fund your wallet in minutes with flexible payment options, including credit/debit, bank transfers, and peer-to-peer (P2P) trading.
Find leading traders and replicate their trading strategies with one tap.

EARN DAILY REWARDS ON YOUR IDLE ASSETS

Earn rewards from staking, dual investment and yield farming. Reap the benefits of staking cryptocurrency on popular assets like Bitcoin (BTC) or Solana (SOL).
Use Auto-Invest to buy crypto and earn passive income at the same time. 
Support emerging blockchain and cryptocurrency projects on Binance Launchpad.**


SECURE, COMPLIANT, AND REGULATED CRYPTO EXCHANGE

Binance is the most regulated crypto exchange in the world, with licenses, registrations, and approvals across multiple jurisdictions. 
All user funds are held 1:1 in a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion. 
Our system is secured with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, strict KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption.

FAST AND SECURE KYC PROCESS

Binance partners with leading KYC vendors to provide a speedy registration process, so you can verify your Binance account and buy Bitcoin in minutes.


SPEND AND SEND YOUR CRYPTO BALANCE

Use the tokens in your wallet to buy flight tickets or shop at crypto-friendly brands.
Make secure crypto transfers from your wallet to your friends and family worldwide. 


EXPLORE THE BEST OF WEB3, CRYPTO, AND THE BLOCKCHAIN

Get tailored blockchain and crypto Web3 content delivered to your app. 
Earn crypto rewards by learning and completing quizzes on how certain cryptocurrencies work. 
Unlock the future of finance with the Binance Web3 Wallet, your all-in-one crypto wallet within the Binance app. Seamlessly trade your favorite tokens on-chain, access multiple blockchains, and explore top dApps without leaving your wallet. Effortlessly transfer funds between exchange and wallet, and navigate CeFi, DeFi, and Web3 with ease. Manage your cryptocurrencies, execute token swaps, and earn yields securely with our advanced bitcoin wallet.

ACCESS 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Let us help you on your crypto journey, whether you’re an avid crypto trader or a beginner looking to buy Bitcoin.
Get help from 24/7 live chat customer support, available in 18 languages (English, Arabic, German, French, Filipino, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Turkish, Korean, Ukrainian, and Vietnamese).


*by trading volume - Source: coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges
**Region Limitation Disclaimer: This is a general announcement. Products and services referred to here may not be available in your region. Not investment advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
***Binance App is available only to non-U.S. citizens and residents. For U.S. citizens and residents, please install the Binance.US App.

Investment involves risk.

Binance Investments Co., LTD
House of Francis, Room 303, IIe Du Port Mahe, 28001
Seychelles


Still undecided? Download now and discover why over 240 million users choose Binance to buy crypto, trade over 350 cryptocurrencies, and securely hold their assets. The Binance App goes beyond your traditional trading app, enabling users to learn more about blockchain, earn passive income through staking, and spend their cryptocurrency.

Mind blowing platform. With its quick response and seamless controls, Binance is an excellent tool for cryptocurrency trading. Because the trading campaigns are brief, they are perfect for brief sessions. Even for novices, the UI is easy to use. Pay-to-win features, however, might be annoying because certain characters and skins offer benefits. The exchange doesn't always react right away and occasionally appears to have its own ecology. The skill component may be diminished.

Enter Code while signup to get $100. The app is extraordinarily well crafted and addictive to trade. Like so many other app these days, you eventually come to a point where you MUST spend money in order to progress. The levels (must necessarily) become more challenging, and your free resources only last so long. Restarted with a new phone. The app give some trader challenges. Regardless how fast you finish one, it always immediately determines your cut, like you're always the last one done.

## Frequently Asked Questions

1

What is a cryptocurrency exchange?

[Cryptocurrency](https://www.binance.com/en/price) exchanges are digital marketplaces that enable users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies like [Bitcoin](https://www.binance.com/en/price/bitcoin), [Ethereum](https://www.binance.com/en/price/ethereum), and [Tether](https://www.binance.com/en/price/tether). The Binance exchange is the largest crypto exchange by trade volume.

2

What products does Binance provide?

Binance is the world's leading cryptocurrency exchange, catering to 235 million registered users in over 180 countries. With low fees and over 350 cryptocurrencies to trade, Binance is the preferred exchange to trade Bitcoin, Altcoins, and other virtual assets.

With Binance users can:

Trade hundreds of cryptocurrencies on [Spot](https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT?theme=light&type=spot), [Margin](https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT?theme=light&type=spot), and [Futures](https://www.binance.com/en/futures/markets/um) markets.
Buy and sell cryptocurrencies with [Binance P2P](https://p2p.binance.com/en/trade/all-payments/USDT?fiat=EUR).
Earn interest on your crypto with [Binance Earn](https://www.binance.com/en/earn).
Buy or earn new tokens on [Binance Launchpad](https://launchpad.binance.com/en).
Trade, stake, and loan NFTs on [Binance NFT](https://www.binance.com/en/nft/home) marketplace.

3

How to buy Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies on Binance

There are several ways to buy cryptocurrencies on Binance. You can use a credit/debit card, cash balance, or Apple Pay/Google Pay to [purchase crypto](https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/how-to-buy-cryptocurrency-on-binance-homepage-400c38f5e0cd4b46a1d0805c296b5582) on Binance. Before getting started, please make sure you’ve completed [Identity Verification](https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/how-to-complete-identity-verification-360027287111) for your Binance account.

4

How to track cryptocurrency prices

The easiest way to track the latest cryptocurrency prices, trading volumes, trending altcoins, and market cap is the [Binance Cryptocurrency Directory](https://www.binance.com/en/price). Click on the coins to know historical coin prices, 24-hour trading volume, and the price of cryptocurrencies like [Bitcoin](https://www.binance.com/en/price/bitcoin), [Ethereum](https://www.binance.com/en/price/ethereum), [BNB](https://www.binance.com/en/price/bnb) and others in real-time.

5

How to trade cryptocurrencies on Binance

You can trade hundreds of cryptocurrencies on Binance via the [Spot](https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/

description:
Instant Personal Loans range from ₹500 to ₹200,000. Experience the ease of accessing instant credit within minutes. Say goodbye to tedious paperwork and physical documentation – our 100% online system ensures a hassle-free experience.

Tenure: 62 days to 12 months. Interest rates range from 2% - 4% depending on the risk profile of the customer.

Instant Personal loan Example:  

-> Loan Amount: Rs.20,000
-> Tenure: 3 Months
-> APR: 72.7%
-> Equivalent Monthly Interest Rate: 2.5%
-> Processing Fee: Rs.899
-> GST: Rs.161
-> Interest: Rs.1510
-> EMI: Rs.7,170
-> Amount disbursed: Rs.18,940 (Rs.20,000-Rs.899-Rs.161)
-> Total repayment amount: Rs 21,510

Some customers may be charged a late fee. 

Branch is the simplest and most secure way to borrow, save, and improve your financial health all from the convenience of your phone. Branch Personal loan app is operated by Branch International Financial Services Pvt Ltd. which is an RBI-registered NBFC. 

Branch adheres to regulations as mandated by the RBI for NBFCs, ensuring maximum security for our users. This establishes us as a trusted cash loan app in India, valued by many.

Terms: Depending on your personal loan amount for which you are eligible, you have the option to choose repayment terms for up to 12 months  Every loan amount we offer has the option to repay in a minimum of 62 days.

The amount borrowed via the Branch personal loan app would be directly deposited into your verified bank account. 

KEY BRANCH FEATURES: FINANCIAL ACCESS IS JUST A TOUCH AWAY

Branch loan app lets you apply for personal loans. It's one of the best-rated loan apps in India. We have millions of happy customers who have taken an instant loan from Branch. 

Branch Personal loan app is operated by Branch International financial services Pvt. Ltd. which is an RBI-registered NBFC.

* No paperwork, collateral or office visits needed
* Easy access 24/7
* Quick and easy signup
* Use your money the way you want to -- for home or business
* Lower fees, and flexible payment terms as you repay

Questions? 
We're the lone app that provides world-class support for your financial needs, 24 hours a day. Message us within the app and receive an answer in minutes!

Branch instant personal loan app provides the following type of personal loans like dhani app, navi loan app,  and other mobile loan apps in India. We are also an RBI registered NBFC and you can take credit line for: 
- Medical Loan/Emergency Hospitalisation Loan
- Shopping Loan
- Home Renovation Loan
- Consumer Durable Loan (home appliances)
- Education Loan
- Vehicle Loan (2/4 wheeler loan)
- Travel Loan
- Wedding/Marriage Loan
- Student Loans

SAFE AND SECURE LOANS

Branch app makes getting an instant personal loan simple by using the data on your phone including your SMS history to verify your identity and create a credit score. We encrypt the data you choose to share with us to protect your privacy. We take your privacy very seriously and promise to never share your information with third parties.

CONTACT US 

We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please e-mail us at india@branch.co. 

Our Office Address: 01, AWFIS, Space Solutions, 4th Floor,
VIOS Towers, Off Eastern Express Highway, Sewri-Chembur Road,
Mumbai, Maharashtra 400037

websiteContent:
# Fueling a worldof opportunity

With over 40 million downloads across Africa and India, Branch is one of the most popular finance apps in the world.

[Download Branch on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.branch_international.branch.branch_demo_android&referrer=utm_source=GLOBAL_Website&utm_medium=CTA_Click&utm_term=CTA_click)

At Branch, we're building a new frontier of finance — where banks aren't physical, paperwork is obsolete, and possibility is the end game.

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/shape_1-a8aea370bc62bd2627f9fe5d0d7e958429fc6532d59cde47a01c5f29967b2279.png)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/phone-4ab1089042ec534781d2d639ffc63816ec17bacbee24279473d2c8ba83a6572d.png)

## Fair accessto all

For many, Branch provides first time access to a range of high quality digital banking products - instant loans, money transfers, bill payment, high yield investments and savings. All in one place.

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/shape_2-6333dbfd3b3d4772e14319bce3c60bf1d4586c0cb6baf5b2de4091cc44ad2d06.png)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/plants-2120f3eafc92bfda7a3c0562f0b5ea5f59e2791c332573a61e3038d8ae267d43.png)

## Smart digitalloans

With Branch, everything is 100% smartphone based. We bypass the hurdles imposed by traditional institutions and provide more customers access to money and the freedom to use it whenever and wherever they choose.

[How it works](https://branch.co/how-it-works)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/shape_1-a8aea370bc62bd2627f9fe5d0d7e958429fc6532d59cde47a01c5f29967b2279.png)

Your browser doesn't support this HTML5 video.

## Enabling seamlesstransactions

The Branch wallet provides a gateway to our suite of digital banking services. Enjoy the ease of sending and receiving funds from family and friends with no hidden charges. Pay everyday bills reliably and enjoy amazing bonuses and rewards while at it.

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/shape_2-6333dbfd3b3d4772e14319bce3c60bf1d4586c0cb6baf5b2de4091cc44ad2d06.png)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/debit_card-18fa3f8280c66c167216f41fd0ebf3031c30dea142dcc42dbf250886b2527728.png)

## Make paymentswith ease

We have launched the branch debit card in Nigeria, enabling our customers to make reliable payments every time, and to make ATM withdrawals with no charges. Coming to other markets soon!

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/shape_1-a8aea370bc62bd2627f9fe5d0d7e958429fc6532d59cde47a01c5f29967b2279.png)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/plants-2120f3eafc92bfda7a3c0562f0b5ea5f59e2791c332573a61e3038d8ae267d43.png)

## Make moreon your money

We offer many customers a way to save and invest their hard earned money. With a few clicks, millions of customers can keep their money securely with Branch and enjoy some of the best yields in the market. Make your money work harder while you sleep.

## A mission withfar-reaching impact

With growing ubiquity of the smartphone and billions of underserved people across the globe, the market is ripe for disruption. Branch is leading the way by bringing together cutting-edge technology and user-friendly mobile services to open new channels for personal empowerment and financial growth.

[About us](https://branch.co/about)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/tile_1-9d89862c19768611fbc81185c913fe9aea5c0b14f4457ca506ef9ff9b63a6ca0.jpg)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/tile_2-0474c8dd7a1b7880936432692e53a581f1559505a6d7303461d05c623d5ba768.jpg)

![](https://d2c5ectx2y1vm9.cloudfront.net/assets/index/tile_3-7ac7232bbf58c1b8d4717c8f80f1dc100ff2d51856b56bfbb87c2651a8fdef72.jpg)

## Access equals opportunity

“Branch has been there when I need it for my business. It’s real, it’s reliable and simple to use.“


– Debola O., Lagos, Nigeria

[Download Branch on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.branch_international.branch.branch_demo_android&referrer=utm_source=GLOBAL_Website&utm_medium=CTA_Click&utm_term=CTA_click)

## Be a part of thenext big thing

Through machine learning and mobile technology, we're transforming the financial services landscape in emerging markets across the globe. And we're just getting started.

[Join the team](https://branch.co/careers)

description:
Canara ai1 is the Mobile Banking Super App with more than 300 features integrated with the futuristic vision of “One Bank, One App”.  

An intuitive app with enhanced User Interface & User Experience, “Canara ai1” Mobile Banking Super App offers a host of customer centric functionalities such as multi-mode funds transfer viz. UPI, RTGS,NEFT & IMPS, Fixed and Recurring Deposit opening, Fastag Recharge, Pay EMI / loans, Lockers, Insurance, scheduled payments, Nomination, Integrated Bill Pay, Integrated UPI etc., as additional features.

The app gives unique experience by providing option to customize the dashboard and choose the application theme of user choice (light/dark). App also features SCAN & PAY facility in the pre login screen. 

Canara ai1 Features:

1. Fund Transfer using IMPS, UPI, RTGS & NEFT.
2. Invest in Fixed Deposits & build wealth.
3. Start Recurring Deposits & meet your goals.
4. Add Nominee & care for your loved ones.
5. Pay EMIs/Repay Loans.
6. Schedule payments on your own. 
7.  View Balance in a click & download statement.
8. Compare & Shop.
9. Apply for IPO (ASBA).
10. Insurance & Demat .
11.  Public Provident Fund (PPF), Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana, Senior Citizen Saving Scheme.  
12. Manage Debit & Credit Cards.
13. Block/Unblock Financial Transaction facility.
14. Bharat Bill Payment.
15. Check Credit Score.
16. UPI  
17. Scan & Pay facility in Pre & Post Login.
18. Hotel, Bus, Cab & Flight Booking.
19. Register & track Complaints.
20. Block Internet Banking Usage
21. Apply for Locker
22. Link RuPay Credit Card

For feedback and suggestions, email us at hoditmb@canarabank.com https://canarabank.com or call us on 1800 1030

Steps to install:

1. Install Canara ai1 mobile app.
2. After successful installation open app by clicking new Canara ai1 icon.
3. Click on next button to continue after selecting the SIM having Registered Mobile Number with the Bank.  SMS will be initiated from the selected SIM; Ensure balance is available to send the SMS successfully.
4. After successful Mobile Number validation, an OTP will be sent to your Registered Mobile Number. 
5. Enter the OTP received and continue.
6. You will be redirected to create and confirm your 5 digits numeric PASSCODE for login to the application.
7. Accept the Terms & Conditions after successfully creating the PASSCODE.
8. Grant the permissions requested during the registration process to access all application features.
9. Before initiating any mobile Banking transactions, you need to create and confirm new 6 digits numeric MPIN for authenticating transactions.
10. Click on ‘SET NOW’ to activate your Mobile Banking facility using active Debit Card details/Aadhaar/Activation code (Visit home branch for generating the activation code).

Welcome, you’re all set to explore the new Canara Bank Mobile Banking Super App, Canara ai1.

"Together We Can"

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/QH: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app for Canara Bank, an Indian bank. The app allows users to access pre-login features and biometric login. The interface includes options like sending money, scanning UPI QR codes, viewing balance, opening accounts, applying for loans, and more. The app is branded with the bank's logo and includes a banner promoting credit card offers.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Ud: The image appears to be a screenshot or a mockup of a mobile banking app interface. It highlights the app's features, such as viewing a portfolio, making payments and transfers, and other banking services. The app seems to be associated with "Canara Bank". The text at the top says "One stop solution for all your Banking needs."
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/yn: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app interface. It appears to be a banking app, as indicated by options like "Manage View Balance/Statement", "Change MPIN", "MB Fund Transfer", and "My UPI Accounts". The screen shows a user's profile page, including their name ("DEAR CUSTOMER"), phone number, and various banking-related settings and options. The app has a modern and clean design.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/qb: The image shows a mobile phone displaying a successful fund transfer summary from Canara Bank. The screen displays the amount paid (₹100.00), transaction details, and sender/receiver information. There are also buttons for "Home" and "Share."
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Mh: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app showing a 360-degree view of credit cards. The screen displays details like credit card information, total limit, current outstanding balance, and a summary of the latest bill.  There's an option to "Pay Now" and "Manage Card Usage". It appears to be a banking or financial app, possibly for managing credit card accounts.

ai1 Utsav

‹›

- Opening/Closing of Fixed Deposits & RD.
- Loan Against Fixed Deposits
- Scan & Pay QR codes using Bharat QR.
- Pay to Contact or Mobile Number
- Instant OD for Premium Payroll Accounts
- Apply for Pre-approved Credit Card /Debit Card through Mobile Banking
- View facility for Credit Card Statement and Request for Email Statement.
- Virtual Debit Card.
- Cardless Cash withdrawal
- Recharge Mobile
- Flight/Cab Booking
- Apply Locker Facility
- Loan Repayment
- Credit score generation
- Apply for FASTag
- Bill Payment facility

And 300 plus attractive features. Download the app now for enjoying flawless Mobile Banking services.

**Pre Requisite**

- Smart phone (android 7.0 and above, ios 17.0 and above)
- Internet Connection
- Sufficient Balance to send SMS (Carrier charges by Network Operator)
- Sufficient storage to download application

**Steps to install and use the New Canara Bank Mobile Banking Application**

- Please visit Play Store/App Store on your smart phone and search Canara Bank ai1 Mobile Banking application.
- After successful installation open app by clicking ai1 Mobile banking icon.
- Give all the necessary permissions.
- Select the SIM slot with Registered Mobile Number (RMN) with the Bank. SMS will be initiated by the selected SIM; Ensure balance is available to send the SMS successfully.
- After successful Mobile Number validation, an OTP will be sent to your RMN.
- OTP will be auto reading received and validate the authenticity & you will be redirected to create and confirm your 5 digits numeric PASSCODE for login into the application.
- Accept the Terms & Conditions after successfully creating the PASSCODE.
- After successful login, you need to activate your account using Debit Card/Aadhar/Internet Banking/ through Branch.
- Before initiating any mobile Banking transactions, you need to create and confirm new 6 digits numeric MPIN for validating all MB transactions.
- Welcome, you’re all set to use the new Canara ai1 Mobile Banking Application.
- You may also contact us at mailto:  hoditmb@canarabank.com,  https://canarabank.com or call us at  1800 1030

**With Debit Card**

Login to Mobile Banking Application>Click on Send Money>Click On Debit Card>Enter the card details( 16 Digit Debit Card Number , Expiry Date & ATM Pin)>Click on Submit

**With Activation Code**

User has to request Mobile Banking Activation through Activation code to the nearest Branch.

**With Aadhar**

Login to Mobile Banking Application>Click on Send Money>Click on Activation through Aadhar Number>Click on the Accept Button below the declaration>Enter the 12 digit Aadhar Number>Click on Next>Copy the OTP received to the Registered Mobile Number and paste>Click on Account Number which user wants to activate> Click on Next.


**With Internet Banking**

Login to Internet Banking Application>Click on Other Services(Top Right)>Select the account which the user wants to activate from the drop down menu> Click on Confirm> Click on Proceed> OTP Will come to the registered Mobile Number of the customer> Copy & Paste the OTP> Click on Submit> Activation code will be sent to the registered Mobile Number of the Customer.

**Privacy Policy for**
**Canara ai1 - Mobile Banking App**

Canara Bank (The Bank) recognizes the expectations of its customers with regard to privacy, confidentiality and security of their personal information that resides with the Bank. Keeping personal information of customers secure and using it solely for activities related to the Bank and preventing any misuse thereof is a top priority of the Bank. The Bank has adopted the privacy policy aimed at protecting the personal information entrusted and disclosed by the customers \[“the Policy”\]. This policy governs the way in which the Bank collects, uses, discloses, stores, secures and disposes of personal information and sensitive personal data or information.

**Definitions**

”Personal information” means any information that relates to a natural person, which either directly or indirectly, in combination with other information available or likely to be available with the Bank, is capable of identifying such person.

“Sensitive personal data or information” of a person means such personal information which consists of information relating to:

- Password;
- financial information such as Bank account or credit card or debit card or other payment instrument details;
- physical, physiological and mental health condition;
- sexual orientation;
- medical records & history;
- biometric information;
- any detail relating to the above clauses as provided to body corporate for providing service;
- Any of the information received under above clauses by body corporate for processing, stored or processed under lawful contract or otherwise. Provided that, any information that is freely available or accessible in public domain or furnished under the right to information act, 2005 or any other law for the time being in force shall not be regarded as sensitive personal data or information for the purposes of this policy.

**Applicability**

This Policy is applicable to personal information and sensitive personal data or information collected by the Bank’s application or it’s affiliates directly from the customer or through the Bank’s online portals, mobile apps and electronic communications as also any information collected by the Bank’s server from the customer’s browser.

**Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information**

The Bank collects and uses the financial information and other personal information from its customers. This information is collected and used for specific business purposes or for other related purposes designated by the Bank or for a lawful purpose to comply with the applicable laws and regulations. The Bank shall not divulge any personal information collected from the customer, for cross selling or any other purposes.

The authenticity of the personal information provided by the customer shall not be the responsibility of the Bank.

Any information that is freely available or accessible in public domain or furnished under the Right to Information Act, 2005 or any other law for the time being in force shall not be regarded as personal information for the purposes of this Policy and the Bank shall not be responsible for the same.

**Disclosure of Personal Information**

The personal information collected by the Bank shall not be disclosed to any other organization except:

**Where the disclosure has been agreed in a written contract or otherwise between the Bank and the customer;**

where the Bank is required to disclose the personal information to a third party on a need-to-know basis, provided that in such case the Bank shall inform such third party of the confidential nature of the personal information and shall keep the same standards of information/ data security as that of the Bank.

**Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures**

The security of personal information is a priority and is protected by maintaining physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards that meet applicable laws. The Bank shall take reasonable steps and measures to protect the security of the customer’s personal information from misuse and loss, un-authorized access, modification or disclosure. The Bank maintains its security systems to ensure that the personal information of the customer is appropriately protected and follows the extant standard encryption norms followed for the transmission of information. The Bank ensures that its employees and affiliates respect the confidentiality of any personal information held by the Bank.

**Contact Information**

In order to address any discrepancies or grievances related to the personal information residing with the Bank, the customer may visit: [https://canarabank.com/](https://canarabank.com/)

**Notice of change**

The Bank may, from time to time, change this Policy. The effective date of this Policy, as stated below, indicates

As a long-time user of CoinDCX on both Android and iOS, I’ve seen its UI evolve, but performance has declined. On iOS, pages often render partially, indicating viewport issues. Android navigation tools frequently become unresponsive, disrupting usability. Since 2023, updates have failed to improve speed and simplicity. Poor state management, sluggish APIs, and inefficient UI rendering contribute to these issues. Competing apps perform better, proving that seamless UX is achievable.

very useful app
I love how easy it is to make instant deposits and withdrawals with Dhan’s secure system..

Used to be my favourite broker. Trading here was great. Since last week there are some technical problems on the app and web (I use the web version most of the time). Once the order is executed the price stops moving. I have to always refresh the web page or restart the app to see price movements. This leads to delay in understanding price movement and it's risky to trade here as I generally scalp.

The interface with Dhan is user-friendly and the features are comprehensive, offering everything you need to track and get real-time market updates. I love how easy it is to navigate to the detailed analytics it provides. But, I'm stealing stars for not supporting landscape mode on tablets. When I switch to that orientation, the screen doesn’t adjust properly, making it harder to view charts and other detailed information. Hope you're reading this and work on fixing this issue at the earliest

The prices on charts are not refreshing automatically or accurately when switching between different applications. For instance, if the Dhan application remains inactive for 5 minutes, the prices fail to update. Additionally, please consider designing a more user-friendly interface to enhance the trading experience. Even the same issue with Dhan web ,If I don't open tab in browser in 5 mins, index and option which we were opened will disappear. we have to reload all the charts again.

one of the best app out there for trading. The need do some changes regarding features. They are just adding new features and not making existing features more fast. The have to look into this also othere than everything is fine.

very good app. I was earlier using zerodha. But, since last 7-8 months, I am using Dhan, and think it is the best. You can get into about all previous buys and sells of the stocks in your portfolio very easily, which helps in easily averaging ETFs. Stocks and ETFs are shown separately which is cool. After using it, now I have closed my Zerodha account. The charts are also very good. Hopefully it will remain like this always, even after the customers increase.

Extremely Disappointed with App Performance I ordered a trade and tried to set a trailing stop loss, but the app got stuck and failed to execute any stop loss. I was in profit of around 5000, and despite my attempts to exit the order, nothing happened. they exited the trade for me at a loss. This has been a frustrating experience, and I can't recommend this app. I've uninstalled it and won't be using it again

Dhan app very slow working. This app not open fastly and not run smoothly. dhan app have many glitches. when buy the option not showing profit in chart. Sometimes stuck app. please solve app many problems. please update. Its working too slow.

There should be option to open chart in each n every screen after placing order. Dhan is lagging n stuck with price in order placement screen no change in price whenever u want to make order. Hope dhan will work on both problem plz make option after placing order or redirect to chart after pressing buy button instead to redirect to order window.

not able to save a layout of 4 and more charts. Then why they have given option to make a layout of 8 charts? If no solution, then I've to look for other platform. I've raised the issue with your customer care executives. And they agreed to forward my issues with the dhan developers team. Kindly make a call arrangement with the Dhan developer team if required.

Dhan application chart don't refresh when I open after sometime. I need to close the app and again start to see the chart. Please improve it so that it could run in background. Multiple timeframe don't scroll sometime. Please check why????

Needed directly close the trade option even we put stoploss, now we unable to close like that before we need to cancel the sl order,, then need to close, another we are unable to move stepping stoploss when profit increases on chart,(up to certain points it will allowing modified order, after that shows modification failed)for that old sl order should be cancelled and need to put again revised sl order, and we are unable to show position on Frist appearance, we need to check where it is on app,

Dhan is the most pathetic platform for trading. My stop losses are not hitting. Even LTP is not updated on time in comparison with other brokers. My profitable trades are converting into losses after exit. I tried reaching there customer service but only getting automatic response which even more frustrating. I will never recommend this broker to anyone.

Subject: Issue with Exit Order Execution – Loss of ₹4,432 Dear Dhan Support Team, I encountered a serious issue with your app today. When I attempted to exit my position, the app failed to execute the order on time due to an error. As a result, I had to switch to the web platform to manually close my position, leading to an avoidable loss of ₹4,432. This is a critical technical failure that directly impacted my trading. I would like to understand who is responsible for this loss?

Updating my review. Thank you Dhan team for adding feature to add TP and SL at the same time when in trade in the chart itself. However there is lag many times in chart. Please fix that, it has caused me to consider losses.

Your chart layout and cleaness used to be best.... i am mobile trader and need clear visuals on chart... 1. Why did you add extra decimals in price bar. 2. Why there is refresh button in center of charts. It block clear chart view on mobile as it's small screen and we need nothing extra on charts... Kindly follow and update as requested. Not getting attacment option to tell you better

For scalping both stoploss and target need to be set immediately like which is available in trading view app- paper trading .kindly give the option just like available in trading view app where you can set immediately both stoploss and target on the screen itself by dragging the stoploss and target marker on the screen once you buy any stock which really helps lots of scalpers

I appreciate the effort you put into making the Dhan app user-friendly and feature-rich. However, I’ve noticed that at times, the time frame selection gets stuck and becomes unresponsive, making it difficult to scroll. This issue affects the overall experience, especially when analyzing charts. It would be great if your team could look into this and provide a fix in an upcoming update. Looking forward to a smoother experience.

the app lags most of time, chart loading is very slow and the user interface is too messy. it's too much on a single screen and confusing. and I've to apply my favourite indicators every time I open a new chart.

Dear devloper team, Can you do one thing in App, in option chain if i want to see volume & IV i have to click on put top right corner button it is difficult becoz whole screen showing put side data instead of this can you do slide option (i.e inside dreag with finger showing volume and IV you can take reference of FYERS App. it will helpful to see both side volume and OI in one screen

worst app ever... description:
FamApp by Trio is for everyone - teens, students, GenZ, millennials, and anyone who wants to upgrade the way they pay. It gives you a Spending Account that comes with your own UPI and card to make lightning fast payments and earn massive rewards.

Your first and forever FamX Spending Account by Trio lets you save, spend, receive money, and grow your money - all with one account. 
Make payments that are smooth, fast and secure 

- Get your own personalised FamX card and UPI ID
- Instantly send and receive money from friends and family
- Scan QR codes and pay
- Make online and offline payments at your favourite stores
- Choose from unique QR code themes on the app

A card like no other - the FamX card

- Get your own numberless FamX card, which has its card details stored within the app
- Block, pause and change your card PIN anytime on the app
- Make the fastest payments with just a tap thanks to Tap and Pay
- Make ATM withdrawals any time with your card

Get rewarded on spending, investing AND playing!

- Pay your electricity bills and earn cashback and FamCoins
- Recharge your phone, with zero processing fees, and earn FamCoins
- Buy gift cards from brands like Amazon, Myntra, PVR, Flipkart, etc., and earn cashback
- Get Google Play Redeem Codes and earn cashback
- Earn FamCoins on all your card spends
- Grow your money by making your first investment in DigiGold, for as little as ₹10
- Win cash rewards and FamCoins by playing fun games on the app
- Use your FamCoins to redeem offers & discounts on the best brands, participate in exciting giveaways, unlock cash spinners, and more!

We take our safety seriously

- We've gathered the best engineers to detect frauds, prevent hacking, and keep your money safe
- Every transaction is protected with a device lock, such as fingerprint, face ID, pattern lock, or PIN
- Our numberless card ensures that important card details are stored safely within the FamApp
- You can block, pause or change the PIN of the card anytime, anywhere on the app
- Our customer support is available 24x7 to help out with any queries

The most convenient payments app for parents

- Now you can be on FamApp too! Send your child money whenever you want, from wherever you are, directly on the app or from any other account
- Set limits and control the expenses of your child by transferring the amount you wish into their FamX account
- Easily manage and track your child's finances by viewing their spending activity
- Watch your child become financially independent through practical experience as they save, spend, receive money, and grow their money on the app
- Experience unmatched security that follows all required guidelines, including a multi-step verification process while signing up on the app

FamApp by Trio is for everyone

Above the age of 10? Congratulations! Get downloading to start making payments and earn rewards.

version.changelog:
We’ve changed things up.
New look. New vibe. New features.

Even a new FamX Spending Account.
Your first and forever account that lets you spend, save, invest, and earn.
It’s like a sundae with all your favourite flavours.

And it comes with the sweetest cherry on top - FamX Ultra.
A membership that gets you special perks for a year.

Fampay is honestly the best for teen payments, and I trust it completely. The app is smooth, and the numberless card is just amazing! I've just ordered mine, and I'm super excited to use it. But I feel like the app could be more interactive and less overwhelming. Right now, too many features show up at once, making it confusing to navigate. A cleaner, more user-friendly interface would make things even better. Also, using more Gen Z language and adding rewards for payments would be great.

The app is good for teens and UPI payments are easy. However, there is no UPI pin and only fingerprint or password is used for authentication. This makes it less secure. Also, there is a limit on transactions which is very small and you need to buy their plans to make more payments. Hope they correct this and instead of those plans maybe put in a little ads if they really wanna make money of it (Although ads is bad, but the limit is worse). Also maybe add UPI pin to make it feel much more safer.

Fampay is honestly the best for teen payments, and I trust it completely. The app is smooth, and the numberless card is just amazing! I’ve just ordered mine, and I’m super excited to use it. But I feel like the app could be more interactive and less overwhelming. Right now, too many features show up at once, making it confusing to navigate. A cleaner, more user-friendly interface would make things even better. Also, using more Gen Z language and adding rewards for payments would be great.

FanPay is a great money transaction app for teenagers—smooth, user-friendly, and reliable. I liked it so much that I ordered the FanPay card to enhance my experience. However, the card did not connect with the app, which was frustrating. I expected seamless integration, but it didn’t work as promised. If this issue gets fixed, it would be a perfect app. Until then, I recommend using just the app and skipping the card.

"Fampay is an amazing app! It's incredibly user-friendly and makes managing finances with family and friends a breeze. The interface is sleek and intuitive, and the features are top-notch. I love how I can easily track expenses, split bills, and send/receive money with just a few taps. The app is also very secure, which gives me peace of mind. The customer support team is also super responsive and helpful. Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with Fampay app.And I think every person should try.

While making a payment the app just stops working for some time and this gets very embarrassing. There is no option to cancel the payment if it is taking too long. Once the app gets stuck, the cross at the top does not respond. At the end we have to make a cash payment and move on. But the app suddenly makes the payment after sometime since it was stuck midway. I lost on 3 transactions like this. One of the transactions was for rs. 600 plus about 2 or 3 days back so I went to bhavna pharmacy who

This app works fine and is a good alternative for students who are minor or who do not have their bank account yet. But there are many glitches in this app too and we have to update it too much. And mostly its network system always has issues. Kindly fix all these problems but overall a nice app.

This app is a total disaster! I accidentally mistyped my name when I first signed up, and now I'm stuck with it forever. There's absolutely NO option to change it. Seriously, who designed this app? It's like they're intentionally trying to annoy their users. I've tried contacting support, but they're either unresponsive or unhelpful. This is a basic feature that any decent app should have. Avoid this app at all costs unless you're happy being permanently labeled with a type.😡

I think it's the best available app for teenagers. The money transfer is smooth sometimes lags but mostly smooth. From My perspective the best part is investment but still I think there should be more optionfor investment. Only gold is not good there should be more options for teenagers to invest and save money. We have keeper but it does not increase our money. If I could get more options then it would be great.

Its good for teens. The transaction is easy nd quick. I didn't really like the theme for the app nd the emoji nd all. I think the fonts, theme nd color could be much better for an upi app. Since its a transaction app it should be of solid simple colors. The app kinda is like a game nd all the extra layouts make no sense. Overall the app is amazing, i only have an ick bc of the themes nd layout.

I am using this upi app for the past three years and it is amazing.In my case the app never lagged and the payment got pending it was always working so smoothly. Recently, I cannot log in to the account and mailed the team about the issue, it took them a while to resolve the issue but they did, so those who said they will leave you hanging it's not true, for once I also believed all that comments but they won't ignore your problem.

Great App, But Please Add NFC! Fampay is a solid payment app for teen,secure, easy to use, and packed with great features.But one major thing is missing: NFC payments. In a world where tap-and-pay is the norm, adding NFC support would make transactions way more seamless. Hope the team brings this in soon! 😄

"FamApp offers a smooth and hassle-free payment experience. It supports multiple payment options like UPI, debit/credit cards, and digital wallets, making transactions quick and convenient. The security measures are reliable, and I’ve never faced any payment issues. Overall, a seamless and user-friendly experience. Highly recommended!"

The customer support was slow, and the overall experience was highly disappointing.

Fampay is unreliable. I made a payment, but the recipient never received the money. Despite multiple emails and calls, customer support gave false assurances. They promised a refund in 5–6 days, but it's been over a month with no resolution. Their phone lines are always busy, making it impossible to get help. This app is unsafe for teenagers and lacks proper support. Avoid using it to prevent financial loss!

I am not able to make any transactions since I've downloaded it. It shows some authentication error that occurred I'm not understanding what it is. I just wasted my money that I put into it. Very disappointing.

description:
Kissht is India’s trusted quick loan app, which offers online instant loans, business loans, & a seamless experience. Whether you need funds for unexpected expenses or business growth, Kissht advance loan app provides you immediate financial assistance. 
 
What is Kissht App?  
Kissht offers online personal loans of up to ₹5,00,000 with minimal documentation. In just 5 minutes, you can apply for a personal loan and get your funds. Furthermore, Kissht provides competitive business loans to meet entrepreneurs' needs, enabling them to access capital quickly. 
 
Example of Unsecured Personal Loan
Loan amount (Sanctioned): ₹ 60,000.
Tenure: 18 months.
Interest Rate: 33% per annum.
Processing Fee (incl. GST): ₹ 4,248.
Total Interest: ₹ 16,858.
EMI: ₹ 4,271.
APR: 44 %.
Sanctioned Loan amount is ₹ 60,000.
Net Disbursed amount is ₹ 55,752.
Total loan repayment amount is ₹ 76,858.
Total Cost of the Loan = Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹16,858 + ₹4,248 = ₹21,106.
 
We work with RBI-registered NBFCs. These NBFCs are as follows:  
-Si Creva Capital Services Pvt Ltd 
-MAS Financial Services Ltd 
-Northern Arc Capital Ltd. 
-Piramal Capital & Housing Finance Ltd. 
-SMFG India Credit Co. Ltd.    
 
How to apply for Kissht instant loan? 
1. Install Kissht app  
2. Register with a mobile number & accept basic permissions  
3. Complete 100% digital KYC for an instant credit check  
4. Sign online loan agreements from approved NBFCs 
 
Why Choose Kissht for Your Instant Personal Loan Needs? 
Whether it’s for an emergency or business growth, Kissht provides instant loan & financial assistance with flexible repayment plans. 

Kissht stands out among loan apps by providing quick, reliable, and secure instant small loans. This is the cash loan app that can help you get a quick personal loan to manage emergencies or meet your financial goals. Further, Kissht offers a convenient online loan application process with transparent terms and competitive interest rates. Our low-interest loan and easy repayment plans make managing finances stress-free. 
 
The Expense tracker feature analyzes your transactional messages to provide insights into your spending habits, including summary of your expenses and income across categories. 

What Makes Kissht a Unique online instant loan app? 
1. Easy Approval: Get instant loans online with minimal documentation in a fully digital process. 
2. Instant Fund Transfer: With The Kissht advance loan app, you can get funds directly transferred to your bank account. 
2. Safe & Transparent: Kissht prioritizes user safety and follows RBI guidelines for collections. Our processes are transparent, with no hidden charges. 
3. Customer-Centric: We adopt a human-first approach, ensuring a delightful experience at every interaction. 
4. Competitive Rates: Enjoy a lower-interest loan with flexible repayment options.
 
Our Commitment to Customer Safety 
All communication for payment reminders is done via registered landline numbers only. We never use personal mobile numbers, foreign numbers, or VOIP calls. 
Payments are collected only through our app or website. We never request payments to personal accounts or demand commissions on dues. 
Our collection processes strictly follow RBI and MeitY guidelines. All calls are monitored and recorded to ensure no threats or abusive language are used. 
The Kissht app respects your privacy — it does not access your Contacts List, and we do not contact your friends or relatives regarding loan repayments. 
 
 
Contact Us: 
1. Write to care@kissht.com OR call our customer care number on 08044745884 / 
08062816309.  
2. Share with us a screenshot or recording of the message or call.  Address: 10th Floor, 
Tower 4, Equinox Park, LBS Marg, Kurla (West), Mumbai - 400070 

Need quick access to funds? Download the Kissht loan app today! This trusted app offers online personal loans up to ₹5,00,000 with minimal documentation, competitive interest rates, and a seamless experience.
