description:
Join crores of Indians who are using Google Pay for all their payment needs. Google Pay is a simple and secure payments app by Google. Refer friends, get offers and earn rewards as you pay.

All you need to do is link your bank account on this app with your registered mobile number and start the experience.

UPI ID is a unique ID that is used to make UPI payments in place of bank account details.

UPI PIN is a 4 or 6 digit number which needs to be set by you while creating your UPI ID. Please don’t share your PIN.

+ Multiple layers of security from your bank and Google
Your hard-earned money is kept safely in your bank account and you have control over money leaving your bank account*. With a world-class security system that helps detect fraud and hacking, we are committed to keeping your money safe and we work with your bank to protect your payment information.

Each transaction is secured with your UPI PIN, and you can safeguard your account with a device lock method such as your fingerprint.

*Google Pay works with all banks in India that support BHIM UPI.

+ Conveniently pay DTH, broadband, electricity, FASTag, LPG bills and more
Link your biller accounts once, we remind you thereon to pay your bill with just a few taps. Google Pay works with billers across the country.

+ Find the latest prepaid recharge plans and easily recharge your mobile
Recharge in fewer steps and at zero extra charges. 

+ Check your bank account balance
No need to visit the ATM to see your bank balance, quickly view it anytime, easily.

+ Get rewarded
Refer friends, get offers and earn cash rewards into your bank account as you pay.

+ QR code payments
Pay through the QR code scanner at your favorite offline shops and merchants.

+ Book tickets, shop online and order meals
Order your favorite food and book your travel within the app or on partner websites and apps like Zomato, redBus, MakeMyTrip etc.

+ Fast & secure payments with your debit and credit cards
Add and link your debit and credit cards** on Google Pay and use them for:
- Online payments (mobile recharges or with online apps) 
- Offline payments (at offline shops by tapping your phone on NFC terminals)

**Service is rolling out across bank issuers and card network providers.

+ Buy, sell, and earn 24K Gold
Trade gold securely with rates backed by MMTC-PAMP. Gold is securely deposited in your Gold Locker on Google Pay, or delivered as gold coins to your home. New! You can now earn gold as Google Pay rewards.

+ Send money directly from your bank account to any bank account, including those who are not on Google Pay, via UPI transfers
Using NPCI's (National Payments Corporation of India) BHIM Unified Payments Interface (BHIM UPI), money transfers are simple & secure with Google Pay.

+ Provide loans
 - Lenders: Aditya Birla Finance Limited, Axis Bank, Bajaj Finance Limited, DMI Finance

Google Pay has reliable services, but it comes with major drawbacks. It charges a 1% platform fee for bill payments with a credit card, even when using UPI. There’s no option to change the email address, which is frustrating. Additionally, the fee makes it less appealing for frequent transactions compared to other apps. Google Pay was once the best, but these issues seriously affect the user experience. Hope they improve!

Google Pay has become unreliable and frustrating to use due to constant payment failures. What's the point of a digital wallet if I can't depend on it to complete transactions? It's incredibly inconvenient to be stuck at a checkout wondering if my payment went through. I've wasted time and faced embarrassing situations because of this. Google Pay needs to fix these issues immediately. Until they do, I strongly recommend other payment apps.

Google Pay is simply the best UPI payment app! The transactions are super fast, secure, and seamless. I love how easy it is to send and receive money, pay bills, and recharge mobile numbers—all in just a few taps. The rewards and cashback offers make it even better! The app interface is clean and user-friendly, and the security features ensure safe transactions every time. I’ve never faced any issues with payments, and customer support is responsive if needed. Highly recommended for UPI Pay.

Google Pay is a great, fast, and secure payment app. The UI is smooth, transaction speed is quick, and UPI support is excellent. There are also occasional offers. Title: Seamless & Secure Digital Payments I've been using Google Pay for a while now, and it has truly made digital transactions effortless. The app is incredibly user-friendly, with a clean interface that makes sending and receiving money quick and hassle-free. One of the best features is its seamless integration with UPI, allowing instant bank transfers without extra charges. Bill payments, mobile recharges, and online shopping ar

I've used this app for years and overlooked occasional issues due to its convenience. Recently, I checked a refund for a large amount and found it hadn't been processed, with no notification. Google Pay and customer care gave conflicting statements about crediting but the amount was never credited. My bigger concern now is the possibility of failed transactions over the years. After a while I stopped cross checking the refunds and that was a big mistake.

★ I've used this app for years and overlooked occasional issues due to its convenience. Recently, I checked a refund for a large amount and found it hadn't been processed, with no notification. Google Pay and customer care gave conflicting statements about crediting but the amount was never credited. My bigger concern now is the possibility of failed transactions over the years. After a while I stopped cross checking the refunds and that was a big mistake.

GPay has a bug where the PIN screen gets covered by the bottom gesture bar if three button navigation is enabled. Have seen this issue on multiple phones, like Pixel 7 Pro, Samsung S24 Ultra, Nothing Phone 2. Such a minor thing and Google hasn't been able to fix it for more than 3 months now.

Very disappointing experience! I urgently transferred money, and the amount was debited from my account, but the receiver didn't get it. Please fix these transaction delays and improve reliability!

poor transactions , Google Pay to make a payment at a shop, assuming it would work smoothly. This is second time that using Google i lost money, and how's that happened first I paid money, and the amount was debited from my account. receiver doesn't get it i paid twice time, yesterday i paid another man and amount debited from my account Google pay showing money processing and 24 hours later showing payment completed and the receiver telling me i don't receive any money and after that I paid one more time, i leave google pay to phone pay

websiteContent:
# Pay the  Google way

![Half eaten hamburger and fries next to an open check at a restaurant](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-32rIJRfByVN1TZbpD2q5kWPL67pgdoGG900mtcr8KrBqtcgL4vkNjAhJHCU0991N51jSjYjm2pmkJB7AwbTQ3U7d7YjHZpTjPLqkffy1tSM_1UlpW8=w1200)

![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/jhGxPeqpVryArW_MuCoDAINsL3nUD4wpKLedDF8u4hestl7ab3bJ4GuEMGzttbzpuox2s-Hmmc9EjuozHNBllZXlY_yhMsj9uvpZgcuH7Pj112uAsOc=w1200)

The

pay with a tap,

check out with a click,

security built-in,

right card at the right time

way to pay

- autofill



Save your payment details once and they’ll appear at checkout on Android and Chrome, every time.

- Tap to pay



Tap to pay with your phone in stores. Just look for these familiar symbols for in-store checkout.

- Buy with Google



Check out with a click everywhere you see the Buy with Google Pay button.


## Seconds to set up — easy checkout every time

Seamless payments across all of your devices begin with a few quick steps. Add your card details to your Google Account, and they will be stored safely for a smoother checkout experience.

![Person holding phone up to contactless payment system](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/jZAJ0kLpv2Y-1Y_MhP-FDqpOXOiaiDYyej_9IP8RmGPbvnY74wtK1vojmTlPjtJQiJXVnUvejoZbzmtDnF-iLPqzXyok30ZkpXWGAzILhiWmaYeigg=w1200)

For online payments big and small

This helpful button lets you enjoy a simplified checkout experience and added security using your saved details.

[Learn more about online checkout](https://pay.google.com/about/pay-online/)

Life in the fast (checkout) lane

Add cards to Google Wallet and tap to pay with them at the world’s leading retailers. Put your old wallet away; your phone’s got this.

[Learn more about in-store checkout](https://pay.google.com/about/pay-in-store/)

Don’t sweat the digits

Save and secure your payment details just once. Google will encrypt them and have them ready for use at checkout on Chrome and on Android devices.

[Learn more about autofill](https://pay.google.com/about/pay-online#FeaturedPillar1)

## Safe, secure transactions

With built-in authentication, transaction encryption, and fraud protection, Google Pay helps keep your money and personal information safe. Plus, the control is in your hands.

[How Google Pay keeps you safe](https://safety.google/pay/)

## With safety at heart

Transparency


Google Pay will never sell your personal information or transaction history.

[learn more about Transparency](https://safety.google/)

Security


Google Pay offers built-in security, like fraud alerts and encryption when paying online.

[learn more about Security](https://safety.google/)

Control


Google Pay lets you choose your preferred privacy settings.

[learn more about Control](https://safety.google/)

Pay the

Google way

[Download the Google Pay app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.nbu.paisa.user&hl=en)

or


[Set up Google Pay](https://wallet.google.com/wallet/?p=home&utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=wallet_about)

description:
Are you looking for a loan app that offers instant cash loans that get transferred directly to your Bank Account? Download RING, a trusted loan app packed with offerings for all your financial needs.
 
Customers can avail of loans up to Rs. 5 lakhs with quick and paperless KYC in under 5 minutes! Unlock higher pre-approved loans on timely repayment. 💰
 
Transfer funds directly from your bank account with ease.
Zero documentation, quick disbursal and lower interest rates 
 
⚡Effortless Instant Loan Approval- Get a quick loan up to Rs. 5 lakhs in just 5 mins through RING's instant loan paperless KYC process. 
 
Example of Unsecured Personal Loan
Loan amount (Sanctioned): ₹ 60,000.
Tenure: 18 months.
Interest Rate: 33% per annum.
Processing Fee (incl. GST): ₹ 4,248.
Total Interest: ₹ 16,858.
EMI: ₹ 4,271.
APR: 44 %.
Sanctioned Loan amount is ₹ 60,000.
Net Disbursed amount is ₹ 55,752.
Total loan repayment amount is ₹ 76,858.
Total Cost of the Loan = Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹16,858 + ₹4,248 = ₹21,106.
 
Now avail Insurance on the RING app with cover as low as Rs.25 per day.
 
We work with RBI-registered NBFCs such as:
 
1.⁠ ⁠Si-Creva Capital Services Pvt. Ltd. 
2.⁠ ⁠⁠Northern Arc 
3.⁠ ⁠⁠MAS Financial Services Ltd.
 
Features That Make RING Your Go-To Lending Option!
📲 Direct Deposit - Get the RING Power Loan, up to ₹5,00,000, deposited straight into your bank account in a flash.
💸 Affordable Rates - Our interest rates go up to 33%, with APR ranging from 32% to 63%.
📥Flexible & Quick Loan Repayment: With our quick loan app, you can enjoy flexible instant loan repayment tenure from 3 months to 60 months
🔐Prioritize security:  Ring follows all the RBI guidelines to ensure you can get instant cash loans, personal loans & more with peace of mind.
 
🤝 Become A RING Merchant - Partner with our personal loan app, also a trusted payment solution for over 10 lakh businesses, to streamline your payment process. Use our power loan app to build strong customer relationships, experience rapid settlements, enjoy rewards & cashbacks. Upgrade your business today with the RING safe loan app.
Why choose RING?
● Super quick approval with RING Power Loan
● Flexible repayment on personal loans
● Instant loan disbursement
● Ditch the paperwork with our safe loan app
● We work with RBI-registered NBFCs
● Transparent terms and zero hidden costs on instant loans 
 
Start your Journey
 
1️⃣ Download the Ring instant loan app 
 
2️⃣ Register with ease 
 
3️⃣ Experience financial freedom with transparent, quick loan options 
Why Borrow An Instant Loan Through Ring?
At RING we care about the safety and well-being of our customers. Our collection processes follow RBI guidelines and reflect our values of empathy and courtesy.
Also, we follow strict guidelines for customer service -
● We use registered landline lines to communicate with customers
● We never use personal cell phones, international numbers, or VoIP conversations
● We never ask customers to make payments into personal or private bank accounts. Payments are only accepted on our personal loan app.
● Our loan app cannot access sensitive information without your consent. 
Contact Us
In case you have faced any of the above-mentioned situations, do this: 
1. Write to care@pay-with-ring.com OR call our customer care number on
08044745880 / 08062816300.
2. Share with us a screenshot or recording of the message or call.
Address: Office units 2, 3, and 4, 10th Floor, Tower 4, Equinox Park, LBS Marg, Kurla (West), Mumbai -400070, Maharashtra, India.

description:
Welcome to IDFC FIRST Bank’s Mobile Banking App. Enjoy a fast and seamless online banking experience, with integrated banking services and exciting features.

Experience the joy of:
* One-Swipe Banking: Swipe to view your account balances and manage credit card/debit card details, deposits, investments, etc
* Instant Payments & Transfers: Make secure payments, UPI transfers, and bill payments
* Zero Fee Banking: Enjoy commonly used Savings Account services free of cost, including money transfers, cheque re-issuance, debit card issuance, and ATM withdrawals
* Tracking Expenses:  View your savings and transactions across all your accounts and monitor cash flow with over 20 automatically categorized transaction types
* Auto-Sweep Current Accounts: BRAVO Current Accounts with Auto-Sweep to FD for higher interest rates
* Building Wealth: One screen view of your investment portfolio. Get curated investment recommendations based on your risk profile
* Investing for Life Goals: Create and make investments for your investment goals – wedding, education, or retirement
* Personalized Offers: Get exciting offers across dining, lifestyle, travel & more
* Instant Personal Loans: Avail pre-approved loan offers at attractive interest rates and flexible tenures

Smart App Features and Services
1. Secure Fund Transfers & Payments
⭐ Free fund transfers to any bank account without adding beneficiary
⭐ Easy bill payment and recharge – mobile recharge, DTH & utility bills
⭐  3-click digital bill payments 
⭐ Zero fee money transfer (मनी ट्रांसफर) to bank accounts through IMPS, NEFT, or RTGS
⭐Send money, pay utility & credit card bills, loan EMIs, buy/recharge FASTag, using UPI 
⭐ Link bank (बैंक) accounts & view your savings account (बचत खाता) balances with UPI

2. Investment, Mutual Funds & IPOs App:
Explore online investment services:
✓ Invest in Mutual Funds online with Instant SIP
✓ Invest in equity, debt, large-cap and multi-cap
✓ Save tax with ELSS mutual funds
✓ Invest in Unit Linked Insurance Plans (ULIP) and Online Sovereign Gold Bonds

3. Insurance App:
Buy health, bike & car insurance through our app

4. Tripstacc Benefits 
☛ Convenient in-app flight and hotel booking experience on the IDFC FIRST Bank mobile app, powered by Tripstacc
☛ZERO convenience fees on flight booking & earn 20 bonus points for every ₹100 spent on hotel bookings

5. Other Banking Services:
⭐ Apply for debit card & cheque book via app completely free of charge
⭐ Use smart filters to view transactions
⭐ Manage credit card payments, download statements, and redeem credit card (क्रेडिट कार्ड) rewards
⭐ Quick purchase and recharge of FASTag
⭐ Zero fee on DD & Pay order issuance & 3rd party withdrawals
⭐ No ECS return fee & decline fee at ATMs for low funds
⭐ Get personalised offers across loans
⭐ Contact us via chat, video call and call centre

Steps to Download App & Open a Digital Banking Account (बैंक खाता):
☛ Download the banking app & click on open savings account (सेविंग्स अकाउंट) 
☛ Register your details & get user ID & password
☛ Log in via user ID and password or mobile number and MPIN
☛ Set up Face ID or finger scanner (biometric) for easy log-in
☛ SIM Binding feature for secure banking (बैंकिंग)

Personal Loan Features:
Loan amount: ₹20,000 to ₹40 lakhs
Personal Loan Tenure: 6 to 60 months
Annual Percentage Rate: 11% to 28%

Representative Example:
Loan amount: ₹1,00,000
Loan Tenure: 12 months
Interest Rate (reducing): 20%
EMI Amount: ₹9,264
Total Interest Payable: ₹11,168
Processing Fee (incl GST): ₹3,499
Disbursed Loan Amount: ₹96,501
Total Amount Payable: ₹1,11,168
Total cost of Loan (Interest + Processing Fee): ₹14,667

Disclosure:
By downloading the IDFC FIRST Bank Mobile App, you agree to our Terms & Conditions, as well as IDFC FIRST Bank’s privacy policy. To go through the T&Cs, please visit https://www.idfcfirstbank.com/terms-and-conditions

I have tried mobile apps of almost all major Indian banks and this one is by far the most user friendly. I really appreciate that IDFC is working on their digital services and user experience. Keep doing this and I'm sure you will grow quickly than the competition. 4 stars only because the app feels laggy sometimes, please consider upgrading your servers, they seem slow. Otherwise app is very good in terms of UX and UI.

Doesn't allow me to have a trusted remote support app. I'm using the Microsoft Remote Desktop app, which is used by my organization and is the most trusted app I know for remote sessions. This app is one-way, meaning I can take control of other devices, and no one can take control of mine. Still, your developers are not letting me into my account. I'm aware of the risks, but you should have options for someone who works in IT and has this use case.

I am extremely frustrated with this app. It's slow, glitchy, and often crashes. I’ve tried multiple times to check balance, but it keeps saying unable to fetch details, even though I’m sure they are right. The customer service is no help either—every time I call, I’m put on hold for ages. I regret choosing this bank. Definitely needs a lot of improvements!

Such a modern app but very bad security practice of blocking remote desktop apps (like TeamViewer, RDP client). This is inconvenient to people like us who use these apps for office work/supporting parents living in another state. IDFC could have implemented something like Google messages which stops when screen sharing is active. Or they could have let us choose to continue or not. By the way, it is against Playstore policy to query the installed app without the user's consent.

after recent update in the app I am not able to use it, I have installed microsoft remote desktop app, and it detects as a screen sharing app which is wrong, also there should be an option to use the app with screen sharing apps because many people uses this app for office purpose or any other self purpose. although app interface is good but what it do if I am unable to use the application.

hello, I understand that you would want to safeguard the customers. A disclaimer is fine when you have screen apps installed. but completely asking to uninstall the app even for the Microsoft remote app, which is probably used by many for work. I would recommend a different strategy to tackle the issue to safeguard your customers.

After the latest update, this has become an utterly useless app, it doesn't let's me log in saying that my phone has teamviewer app which can potentially breach the security because it can take screenshots. This is pathetic. its like, if I use teamviewer on my phone, I can't use this app. So, I need to go on laptop and leave the convenience of banking over the phone while I am on job or else uninstall teamviewer from my phone.

I have work in my office so I need to to use Microsoft Remote Desktop app downloaded from play store but you are forcing me to delete that app otherwise I can't use your app. This is the worst experience ever. I am also a android developer, I suggest you to just change your android developer. Seems like he has no knowledge regarding this Remote Desktop app. This is not a malware app as security warning given by your app. Through this app we can control other pc and no one can control our mobile

I am customer for 5 years. Installed this app now. It is asking for Loan number while registering, but I don't have any loans with the bank. As per the Help document, I tried entering my account number too which is not getting accepted. I am not receiving any account updates and statements for the last 3 years. But for their unused credit card with me, I am getting sincere monthly statements without fail. An example for how NOT to run a business !!!

The app is good for most of its functions, but I have been getting irritated a lot while accessing my transactions. It opens in a page where there are multiple tabs on the tap and when you try to scroll down to the bottom to go through the transactions, even a very slight angled scroll either left or right changes the tab to another and when you switch back to transactions tab, you're at the top again. Such a stressful experience. Please change that UI.

App is blocked by V-KYC message. Cannot create support requests. Multiple customer IDs linking not possible. Cannot redeem points. Too slow and a lot of unwanted features. Some needed features go to Web version while unneeded ones are baked into the app. Basically, worst bank app.

First experience is really so fast , so good and animation are much better. it was my dream bank. The UI of the application is much better than other banks and it is fast as well as. First time ever I am writing review of any bank.

The app has started complaining that I need to uninstall the Microsoft Remote Desktop App before being able to use your application. I'm not able to use the app now. I don't think any app has the right to reinforce which other app should or should not be used on the phone by the user. Get this insane oversight fixed at the earliest.

worst experience ever never apply for their credit card or any kind of service they are worst applied for credit card got it they link my account with some else number now I am not able to use it or login visited branch many time they didn't help couldn't even change number ..... their customer service is rubbish they will just transfer your call

The best bank application I've used. IDFC really gives UX a top priority!! Their app & website are both so easy and satisfying to use! The features just WORK. It's easy to navigate, there are absolutely no irritating glitches or bugs. Huge kudos to the team that developed it. And also my heartfelt gratitude, for making my life, as a regular user, so much easier!

Instead of banking app it has become now promotional and marketing app. If you don't turn off the notifications I am sure you will at least get 22 to 25 notification in a day just for availing loan and blah blah. These morons even don't care to create notifications categories so that one can turn off notifications which are promotional in nature. To get rid of the marketing and promotional messages I have to turn off all the notification from this app.

Best banking mobile app ever!!!! I just love it! I have used multiple mobile banking apps and IDFC app is pure joy! Investment, deposits, especially redemption, which is a pain in HDFC and other apps, is quick and easy here. Business banking is unparalleled with IDFC mobile app! Keep up the good work!!! Only challenge is getting OTP while traveling abroad is a pain. If there is way we can have an alternative when we dont receive OTP; primarily for payment approvals, it would be great!

Update: things improved after interaction with IDFC customer care. Each and every concern was addressed. Their team is highly professional. However, reaching their support is very difficult. E-mail is the only way of interacting with humans. --------- - Agents attempt misselling of expensive cards through lies and deception - Customer care is useless, since there is no way of reaching a human and AI is poor at understanding requests - App is not user friendly to use
the app does not launches everytime even after multiple updates and reinstallation. Very frustrating experience. The app is already updated to recent version still it does not opens properly.

Latest update is no longer working in stock oneplus 12 having all latest security updates. Keep saying, your device does not meet security requirements. Edit: Non sense, seriously! I had RDP client which is used to connect to remote work servers on the move. Once I uninstalled, idfc mobile app started working. Wow kudos to the person who decided to silently stop supporting just because RDP client which can be used only to remote in to another machine! This is not TeamViewer kind of service!

After entering phone number and selecting sim slot, the app starts verifying and it doesn't proceed further. I have tried uninstalling and installing the app multiple times but same issue is happening. All permissions are given whatever prompted by the app. Steps I followed are 1. Click on Login or Register 2. Entered registered mobile number 3. Selected the sim slot 4. Allowed all the permissions that are promoted My phone is Samsung S9 and network Provider is Airtel. Please check & resolve.

Whoever has designed the UI of new app needs training on colors and contrast. Most of the things in entire app are not visible due to the background colour and fonts colour selected. There is no option to change the colour as well. The development team needs to fix this urgently.

I recently applied for an IDFC First Bank credit card on a card-to-card basis, expecting a smooth and hassle-free process. However, my experience with their customer care and verification process has been extremely disappointing. Despite submitting all necessary documents online with vkyc, the bank sent representatives to both my office and home without any prior intimation. This not only caused unnecessary inconvenience but also raised privacy concerns. So I would not suggest IDFC credit card.

Your app is big scam!!! First of all it doesn't auto debit the loan amount on time and then if loan is not paid just because delay in your auto debit we also have to pay extra bounce charges too...which keeps increasing each day and even after paying loan it keeps trying to auto debit EMI.. this is so dangerous

Worst bank customer service! Even the toll-free number is chargeable. Don’t buy any service or use their facilities. If you face any issues, you’ll have to recharge your phone just to contact customer care. They only care about their profits. Once you log in, you risk losing your credit score. Avoid opening an account with this bank. I highly recommend IDFC instead. You have all my data—if you need to talk, email or call me.

description:
Simplify your banking with India Post Payments Bank Mobile Banking App. Open a Digital Savings account, manage your accounts, transfer funds, pay utility bills – securely and easily. Our app is available in 12 languages of India along with English- Hindi, Bengali, Marathi, Telugu, Tamil, Urdu, Gujarati, Malayalam, Kannada, Oriya, Punjabi and Assamese.

Read more 

Open a Digital Savings Account with IPPB App
	Download IPPB Mobile banking and Install it
	Provide your basic details and submit
	Convert to Regular Savings Account within a year for additional benefits
       
         Fund Transfer Services in any mode including but not restricted to IPPB to IPPB accounts transfers, IMPS, UPI, NEFT and Standing Instructions will NOT be available and can be activated by completing full KYC.
         Payments services mentioned below will be available with a cumulative monthly transaction limit of Rs. 10,000:
        i. Bill Payments
        ii. In store Merchant Payments 
        iii. Payment towards eligible Post Office Savings Schemes and Services

Manage your Accounts
	One stop interface to view your IPPB and Post Office Savings Account balances
	Review your Transactions and Account Statements
	Update your Nominee, Communication address
Transfer Funds
	Between your own IPPB Accounts and Post Office Savings Accounts
	To other IPPB accounts
	To accounts with other banks
	Instantly, easily and securely
Pay Bills with India Post APP
	Pay your Mobile, Broadband, Water, Electricity, Gas, Insurance Premium bills and DTH recharges instantly
Stay Secure
	Instant SMS alerts for your transactions
	Change your mPIN regularly
	Report any fraudulent incident/suspicion at your nearest IPPB branch
Contact India Post Payments Bank
	Call: 155299 /1800-180-7980
	Email : contact@ippbonline.in
        www.ippbonline.com

Our app brings banking at your fingertips.

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/VN: The image appears to be a screenshot of a mobile banking app interface.  It shows the user's account balance, options for fund transfers (within the same bank or to other banks), UPI services (like sending and requesting money), and other services like bill payment and post office services. The bank logo is visible in the upper right corner.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/ok: The image appears to be a screenshot of a mobile app. It seems to be a banking or payment app, likely for bill payments and related services. It offers options like paying bills, accessing post office services, managing accounts, and various bill payment categories. The app also includes a QR code scanner.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/9g: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app's menu. The menu options include "Home," "My Profile," "Change MPIN," "Charges," "Account Upgradation," "Contact US," "FAQs," "Security Questions," "Fingerprint Login," and "Logout." The user is identified as "Hi, User" and the last login time is displayed.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/mj: The image is a screenshot of a mobile banking app's "Transfer Type" menu. It presents various options for transferring funds, including fund transfer, scan & pay, transfer using UPI, standing instruction, manage beneficiary, POSB sweep in and POSB sweep out.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Ab: The image shows a mobile app interface for accessing post office services. It lists various services like Post Office Savings Account, Postal Life Insurance, Recurring Deposit, Public Provident Fund, Sukanya Samridhi Account, and Loan Against Recurring Deposit.

This application has several accessibility issues, especially for blind users who rely on TalkBack. When sending money it displays 'send disable confirm disable' with TalkBack, and it is not working properly. Additionally, the application is working very slowly. Kindly address these accessibility concerns to ensure a more inclusive user experience.

No good every minute very slowly sometimes suddenly stop sometime not working I have taken an account in the application but every time I see it, I have to suffer. It is very annoying. Your application works very slowly. The expected work is not done quickly. Due to this, we have to spend all our time in our lives. We have a new problem than the problem we are facing. Our lives are difficult. With your app, we have become even more difficult. We are not lucky in life. We know that but even

The India Post Payment Bank (IPPB) app is very poorly designed and inefficient. When I try to log in, the loading time is excessively long, and after waiting, it shows an error message asking me to try again after 24 hours. Additionally, when I try to generate my MPIN, the app asks for my account number and customer ID, but it’s unclear and confusing. Dear developers, please fix these issues as soon as possible. The app needs significant improve

Too slow and buggy. No physical debit card. Changing of MPIN is absolutely unnecessary and complicated procedure. Can't update statement options. A banking app in yhe modern world should be simple and fast, especially that of a payment bank.

Very poor performance. For one transaction, we have tried for at least 10 to 15 times. Even connected to WiFi, it still won't work properly. Very disappointing service provided by IPPB mobile banking app😞😞😞

Third class application. Each and every step is taking too much time and showed massage maximum number attempted. Though indian user are ready to use it but government doesn't ready to change the things and make things user friendly. Such disappointing.

Pls design the app which works on normal OTP to register and also works with wifi/hotspot. If we don't have sms plan in mobile, this registration process took 2 sms costs around rs.3/-. Everytime we have to re register in this app. It's quite frustrated. all bank apps are designed in this way for security reasons. But it's very annoying.

Very usefully this application and last update awesome because every transactions I enter the OTP but this update I enter only password so very fast usage this time. I expect the next update to bring in technology that will update it and keep the same password, as I have to change my password after a certain number of days. And sometimes connecting problem so clear this problems

Worst experience all gov apps looks bad and not work properly I don't know why, 1) Not user friendly every time it will ask customer ID, account number and DOB and phn number while login. 2) No Mpin login 3) Statement download is very dificult 4) Add beneficiary very dificult. New bug is while we are trying to transfer to any other account or postoffice services like sukanya samvrudhi it shows like transaction has failed due to unsecure network even if your connected to 5G, 4G or home WiFi. 😂

Very poorly implemented. Logsout often. Why do we have to use same SIM where the application is installed. Sometimes if the app is compromised from phone by unknown source ultimately entire account will be in trouble. No sense why should we buy internet for the mobile number we registered..

Worst and useless app. Waste to install it. OTP is not fetching automatically and not allowing to enter manually too. And moreover to speak to the support team need balance. Nowadays mostly everything is unlimited in call packs and they need balance to talk to them which cannot happen.

Very slow app. Every 3 weeks password got expires, and we try to set new password, many details have to fill after that it shows this password can not be able to use. After all when we set new password and try to make a transaction app says "transaction only after 24 hours 😤"

I wonder if this app ever worked for anyone. Every time I try only two things happen. 1. It won't proceed until I disconnect from wifi(which is a really stupid requirement). 2. It says it has trouble connecting.

Single mobile number available. But showing mobile no attached to multiple accounts. It same issue for my and my family and friends member. Screenshot not allowed it declined. Every month need to change PIN no. And after PIN change it declined and redirect to re-registration.

I reduced one star. Just because it always say to change PIN after some months and without changing PIN ,app don't let you login. I mean it's ok for safety reasons but how many PINS you guys want to remember by us. To change PIN everytime it becomes frustrating . You can try other ways like other banks app does. Otherwise It's nice app to transfer funds. I mostly used it to transfer money to my PPF account.

This app doesn't work half the time just like a typical government employee. Very sluggish and slow. Never seen an app with so many bugs. The OTP expires before it even arrives. When I request again, it doesn't detect or let me enter manually. When it detects, 'Server error' pops up. Then the cycle repeats. Fed up with this. Give the time to time update on the App The app is quite slow especially when we try to fetch data from server. Hence, the device battery drains faster while using the app.

I am not able to log in every time because a device location popup appears, even though device location is already enabled. I don't know who the intelligent developer is who made this kind of development. I think this kind of code done and tested by fresher employee

worst app not able to login properly, why do u need sim active state for app login , stupid it is ... no sense or why this much of security .. people should login and operate friendly if any security checks then some security questions or otp ask is fine , instead of being sim in the same mobile and all too much.. worst security policy

Every time I open the app it asks to login but it shows mobile verification, account number, customer id, security questions and then at OTP stage it says you are already registered please login. For God sake where is the login page I just get mobile number verification only. Someone get me out of this loop.

yesterday I updated my phone system . But since then whenever I, IPPB opened the app to login then the screen went completely blank i am trying since yesterday that it may start but the situation is same .please help me out for this problems. Please acknowledge my problem.

one of the worst app in my mobile .... most of the time it's not work it takes the time to load but for what my mobile is connected to the router which gives strongest and fastest internet connection.......

Always app will be having issues. We cannot put amount in sukanya samriddhi it's showing service not available. Very bad service.we cannot put though gpay or any other to ippb sukanya account.we have to put in ippb first and then to sukanya id.
Worst app. I bet, you can't login when you desperately want to complete some transaction. Too many steps and bugs. No keyboard access to enter OTP is new innovative bug

IPPB's transaction and UPI are very slow and sluggish, the biggest problem is when its SMS or OTP comes very late. From account opening to VIRTUAL DEBIT CARD, unnecessary charges are required. The services are very bad.

Whenever I select some services, it says service unavailable. Typical government app, which is useless. I'm trying to deposit money in ppf and ssa, it always throws services unavailable. Total waste of time.

description:
InstaMoney is powered by Innofin Solutions Private Limited, India’s largest Peer-to-Peer Lending Platform and an RBI-registered NBFC-P2P.

InstaMoney provides fast, reliable, and accessible personal loans to over 6 million happy and satisfied users across India. We provide loan from ₹5,000 or ₹50,000, our fully online process ensures your loan is approved and disbursed within just 2 hours. 

Features 
- Instant personal loan from ₹5,000 to ₹50,000
- Interest rate: 24%-48% p.a.
- Tenure: 3 to 6 months 
- Easy process

What makes InstaMoney ideal for every customer? 
- Fast online loan
- Easy application 
- No documentation
- Instant personal loan
- Digital processing and disbursal in 2 hours
- Repayment tenure from 91 days to 180 days
- Lowest processing fees ranging between 0% - 5% of the amount used
- Graduate to the higher loan amount and more products with on-time repayments

Why Choose InstaMoney Over Other Loan Apps?
- Trusted by 6 million users across India
- Over ₹15,000 crores disbursed in personal loans
- Get instant cash loans for medical emergencies, credit card payments, school fees, advance salary, and more
- Loan disbursal in as fast as 10 minutes, with a maximum of 2 hours

Eligibility Criteria
- Salaried / Self-Employed Individuals
- Between the age of 21 - 55 years
- Indian citizen

Easy-to-Apply Process
- Log in to the InstaMoney app, check eligibility and apply for verification.
- Provide required details and documents quickly.
- Check your application status
- On approval, the amount gets transferred to your bank account in 30 minutes.

Example:
The Loan Amount (Principal) is ₹10,000 with an Interest Rate of 24% per annum with a tenure of 5 months.
Interest=₹10,000 x 24% x 5/12 =₹1,000 and the Total Amount payable would be ₹11,000 over 5 months i.e. ₹2,200 per EMI (Equated Monthly Installment).
Processing fee(+GST)=₹500 + ₹90. Assessment fee=₹199 to ₹249

*These numbers are for representation only, and the final interest rate or processing fee may vary from one borrower to another depending on his/her credit assessment.


Contact us
• Email: cs@instamoney.app
• Facebook: fb.com/InstaMoneyApp
• Twitter: @InstaMoneyApp

InstaMoney is owned by Innofin Solutions Pvt. Ltd. an RBI Registered NBFC-P2P (https://rbi.org.in/Scripts/BS_NBFCList.aspx)

Website: https://www.instamoney.app/

Address: Unit no. 1006, 10th Floor, DLH Park, S. V. Road, Goregaon West, Mumbai – 400062, Maharashtra, India.

Security & Protection of Privacy
InstaMoney app follows global standards of high-level data encryption/decryption protocols to protect user data.

However, when I go into the app to do the same, it still shows IN PROGRESS. It was very disappointing and upsetting It's very bad.

I emailed them so many times, but I always get an auto generated response, which doesn't give any option about deleting the account or data. They are frauds, don't download this app. I'm going to report the app to the google play store. Ridiculous!

When I've delayed repayment, I've received numerous calls and messages. Yet, when facing disbursement issues, my attempts to contact support have been ignored. Very pathetic!

Very Very Pathetic Service By Insta Money... No customer care number is given in the app for any urgency

The whole point of getting a loan through this category application is so that we can get it instantly cause of the urgency and not wait for so many days. Pathetic experience.

I have applied for my credit line since 16 days still the amount is not credited to my account. I am simply getting notifications of getting it delayed. While taking the payment you guys do not accept any delays. Your team starts calling to recover the amount and now when your disbursement is delayed then we need to simply wait until it gets transferred. Very bad experience if any one is in urgent need then please do not trust them.

Once you have set up an automated payment, you will not receive any response as you know the entire amount will be taken from your account....They will never refund you for the number you gave them again. They haven't taken any money from your account for a month....The next MI has arrived but they haven't given me any refund. They took 4000 extra from my account and haven't given it back yet... so trust this app.....

The worst app, I am a customer of this loan app, InstaMoney provides a credit limit of 25,000 rupees. I requested 9500 to withdraw on 17-March-2025 and I got an email that it may take up to 7 days. After 9 days, I still don't get any amount and Customer care is saying your disbursement process is on priority. 🤣🤣🤣🤣 I will close my loan by this month, no need to take instant loan in 10-15 days. 🤣🤣🤣 I want to give zero rating but no option to give zero.

No money credited into account even though more than 4 days have passed. no customer care contact available.only system ai generated replies.even after writing many emails no one has replied. Now it feels like it is better to cancel and move to a different app.

My emi got debited twice, and still haven't received the full refund of it. Also it's been more than a week now and they still haven't disbursed the loan amount. There is no customer care support. Pathetic experience. I suggest please don't use this app. Update : Now it's been 12 days .. and no update on the disbursement ! All they are sending is system generated mails.

I recently applied for a loan on InstaMoney after clearing my previous one, but this time, I’m facing multiple issues with funding. Despite following up for 10 days, the issue remains unresolved, even after the promised 7 working days. Customer support is unresponsive, and there’s no proper helpline. The team keeps repeating the same replies without resolving the problem. This has been a terrible experience with false assurances and poor service

My first loan was disbursed quickly, and I repaid it before the due date. However, when I applied for a second loan, it showed as sanctioned for the past 10 days. I inquired about the issue, and was told the loan amount would be disbursed within seven days. But it has been 10 days, my credit limit has not increased, and it still shows as sanctioned.

I am extremely disappointed with the way InstaMoney handled my loan application. It has been over 15 days since I applied, and despite charging me ₹199 as a processing fee, there has been no progress on my loan disbursement. What’s more frustrating is that the moment I inquired about canceling my application, they were immediately ready to cancel it—instead of resolving the issue. This shows a clear lack of commitment to providing timely service after taking the fee. I expect better service

I have applied for a loan and it's been 7 days. The amount is showing that it's sanctioned but I have still not received it in my account. I have tried to register complain many times but always a computer generated message is forwarded that says that the amount will be credited in few days.

I have applied for my credit line since 4 days still the amount is not credited to my account. I am simply getting notifications of getting it delayed. While taking the payment you guys do not accept any delays. Your team starts calling to recover the amount and now when your disbursement is delayed then we need to simply wait until it gets transferred. Very bad experience if any one is in urgent need then please do not trust them.

Absolutely horrible service! I have been waiting for 7 business days, and my request is still not processed. No updates, no response to emails—completely unprofessional and frustrating. Even Money View processes loans within 5 to 10 minutes, but this company takes forever and still fails to deliver. The customer support is the worst—no accountability, no communication, just silence. I regret ever using this service. Avoid it at all costs! I am canceling my withdrawal and closing my account

description:
With Innopay, managing your finances has never been easier! Conveniently pay for a wide range of services, from bills and utilities to subscriptions, all in one place. Experience seamless and efficient payments with Innopay. 

Why Choose Innopay? 
1. Unlimited Cashback: Earn up to 5% cashback on recharge and bill payments. 
2. Multiple Payment Options: Pay using credit/debit cards, wallets, and more. 
3. Secure Transactions: Enjoy safe and encrypted transactions. 
4. Exclusive Offers and Discounts: Save more with special offers on bill payments.  

Download Innopay now and start enjoying these benefits!  

Recharge Services: 
1. Mobile Prepaid: Top up your mobile prepaid balance effortlessly and stay connected with Jio, VI, Airtel, BSNL, and more. 
2. Cable TV: Enjoy uninterrupted entertainment with our hassle-free Cable TV recharge services. 
3. DTH: Stay tuned to your favorite channels with easy DTH recharges for Airtel, Videocon, Sun Direct, Tata Play, etc. 
4. FASTag: Keep your journeys smooth with quick and easy FASTag recharges for IndusInd Bank, HDFC Bank, SBI, Axis Bank, ICICI Bank, etc. 

Bill Payment Services:  
1. Broadband: Pay your broadband bills online and ensure uninterrupted high-speed internet access. 
2. Mobile Postpaid: Settle your postpaid mobile bills for Jio, VI, Airtel, BSNL, and more. 
3. Apartment/Housing Society: Simplify your apartment or society bill payments and utilities. 
4. Electricity: Manage and pay your electricity bills easily, ensuring continuous power supply. 
5. Water: Pay your water bills online and keep the essential flow of water to your home or office. 
6. Gas: Effortlessly pay your gas bills online and maintain a comfortable living environment. 
7. Landline: Manage and pay your landline phone bills, ensuring uninterrupted communication. 
8. LPG Cylinder: Pay for your LPG cylinder refills online and keep your kitchen running smoothly. 

Install Innopay for more payment options: 
1. Loan EMI: Easily pay your loan EMIs on time and avoid penalties with Innopay. 
2. Education Fees: Securely pay school and college fees, ensuring uninterrupted education. 
3. Donations: Support your favorite causes with hassle-free donation payments. 
4. Clubs/Associations: Simplify membership fee payments for clubs and associations. 
5. Insurance: Quickly pay your insurance premiums and stay protected. 
6. Tax Payments: Manage and pay your income and property taxes effortlessly. 
7. Credit Card Payments and Management: Pay credit card bills and manage multiple cards seamlessly. Get exclusive cashback on credit card bill payments. 💳 
8. Hospital Bills: Settle hospital bills securely and without stress. 
9. Recurring Deposits: Manage and pay your recurring deposits effortlessly. 
10. Rental Payments: Securely pay your rent and keep your home stress-free. 
11. Housing Society Fees: Conveniently manage and pay housing society fees online.

websiteContent:
# Innovative  Payment solutions for everyone

Innopay is a fintech company in India with an innovative payments stack and products
to help everyone make or receive payments the right way.

## We support all payment  networks

![Visa](https://www.innopay.in/img/networks/visa.png)![Mastercard](https://www.innopay.in/img/networks/mastercard.svg)![Rupay](https://www.innopay.in/img/networks/rupay.png)![UPI](https://www.innopay.in/img/networks/upi.png)![BBPS](https://www.innopay.in/img/networks/bbps.svg)

![Innopay Mobile App Illustration](https://www.innopay.in/img/herosection/hero.jpeg)

A better
payments stack


Innopay suite of products help businesses to go live and accept payments in a matter
of minutes with no hassles.


[View\\
Products](https://www.innopay.in/products)

> “The app is very useful to pay rent or society or expenses.Most of the very
> interesting things is if any issue happened related to transactions, they
> are quickly responding and as soon as possible they are fixing quickly. ”

![Puspanjali Prusty Profile Picture](https://www.innopay.in/img/testimonials/testimonial_profile_4.svg)

Puspanjali Prusty

![Product screenshot](https://www.innopay.in/img/herosection/better-payments-stack.jpg)

## Our Partners

Here is the list of partners who continue to help
us in our mission of simplifying business payments in India

[Become\\
our partner](https://www.innopay.in/#)

![Cybersource](https://www.innopay.in/img/partners/cybersource.png)![Freecharge](https://www.innopay.in/img/partners/freecharge.avif)![Axis Bank](https://www.innopay.in/img/partners/axisbank.png)![Yes Bank](https://www.innopay.in/img/partners/yesbank.png)![Billdesk](https://www.innopay.in/img/partners/billdesk.svg)![PayU](https://www.innopay.in/img/partners/payu.svg)

## Our mission

At Innopay, our mission is to
revolutionize the way businesses of all sizes handle payments in India. We are
dedicated to providing seamless and secure payment solutions that empower businesses
to thrive in the digital economy.

We envision a future where
every business, from small startups to large enterprises, can effortlessly manage
their financial transactions with confidence and efficiency. We strive to be the
trusted partner that enables this transformation.


Transactions every 24 hours10 thousand


Total Payments processed so far
$50 million


![Payments done right](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580044098914-585ddaff2de5?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=3270&q=80)

Empower your business
payments


With Innopay solutions you can take
your business payments to the next level with ease and confidence.

[Contact\\
Us](https://www.innopay.in/contact-us)

description:
We at Jar think “Everyone can Buy Digital Gold”, No matter how small the amount is. Saving Money is crucial to a financially secure future. Start your Daily Savings Journey in just 45 Seconds with India's Digital Gullak Jar App. Start your Investment in 24K Digital Gold and Grow your Money. You can start Investing in Digital Gold from ₹10 on the 100% Secure Savings and investment Platform.

We’ve helped millions of Indians Start their Daily Savings journey seamlessly and Grow their Investment at the same time. Now, It’s your turn to start investing in Digital Gold through the Jar App(India's Digital Gullak) with just your spare changes.

Now you can buy Gold by checking the Latest Gold Price Today

Jar gives you real-time updates on Gold rates with our 'Gold price tool'. The chart is automatically refreshed and the price is updated every minute. Easily check the Gold price today along with its purity. You can specifically check for a 1-gram Gold rate and 24KT Gold price today as well. Check the Gold Price and Start Saving Now.

Services Available on Jar App -
Digital Gold Savings: You can Save Money automatically in Digital Gold on a Daily, Weekly and Monthly basis. With the Round Off feature, you can Save your Spare Changes every time you purchase something.
Loans: Get an Instant Personal Loan up to 5 Lakh with Jar App with an APR of 18.89% for 3 to 60 Months.
Insurance: Light up your life with Health Insurance, which only takes ₹20/day to give you ₹10 Lakh worth of health benefits and 7000+ Hospitals with Free Doctor visits up to ₹5000.
Jewellery Purchase: Buy Stylish Daily Wear Gold Jewellery from VIBA by Jar, available in 5000+ Unique Designs.

Digital Gold Purchase Charges:
The government charges 3% GST on Digital Gold purchase transactions.
Buy-Sell Spread for Digital Gold is 2% - 3%. For more details: https://www.safegold.com/faq

Digital Gold Partner: Digital Gold India Private Ltd (https://www.safegold.com)

A representative example of Rs 100 Gold Purchase Transaction -
Sample Gold Purchase Rate (per gram) = ₹ 6000
Value of gold to be bought = ₹ 97.09
Government GST Charges (3%) = ₹ 2.91
Amount to be paid = ₹ 100
Gold quantity to be bought (in grams) = (97.09 / 6000) = 0.0162 gm

Partner Registered NBFCs: 
Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Private Limited: https://creditsaison.in/partnercontact
Aditya Birla Finance Limited
https://finance.adityabirlacapital.com/personal-finance
Innofin Solutions Private Limited
https://www.lendenclub.com/
Apollo Finvest (India) Limited
https://www.apollofinvest.com/ 

Terms and Conditions: https://www.myjar.app/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://www.myjar.app/privacy-policy

Personal Loan T&C (Available for selected users)
• Minimum & maximum period for repayment - 3 to 60 months
• Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 30%

For a loan taken, the below charges are applicable:
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 30%
Processing Fees (PF) : 1.5%- 3% (GST applicable)

A representative example of total cost of loan, including principal & all applicable fees:
(Applicable for all above lenders)
Loan Amount/Principal: ₹50000
Tenure: 12 months
Rate of Interest: 15% per annum
Processing Fee: ₹1000 (2% inclusive GST)
Total Interest: ₹4156
Equated Monthly Instalments (EMI): ₹4513
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 18.89%
Amount Disbursed: ₹49000
Total Repayment Amount: ₹54156

In Case of query, please contact us -

Office Address: No. 752, Vasantham Building, 18th Main, 5th Cross Rd, 6th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095

description:
Experience Seamless Banking with the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App

Apply for a 0 balance account online and enjoy hassle-free banking from your smartphone. With the Kotak811 app, you can apply for a bank account, manage your zero balance bank account, make seamless UPI payments, apply for credit cards, and much more.

Download the Kotak811 account opening app now to experience the best in digital banking.

Key Features of the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App:
1.	Apply for an Account Instantly: Easily apply for a new bank account. Whether you’re looking for a 0 balance account opening bank or want to learn about the bank account opening procedure, the Kotak811 app simplifies everything for you.
2.	Savings Account at Your Fingertips: Access and manage your savings account anytime, anywhere with a user-friendly interface.
3.	Hide Transactions: Enjoy enhanced privacy by hiding selected transactions from your bank statements.
4.	UPI Payments Made Easy: The app serves as your go-to UPI app for all transactions, including UPI registration, UPI app download, and UPI online payments.
5.	Fixed Deposits Simplified: Open and manage fixed deposit accounts with ease. Kotak811 is the ideal FD app and FD mobile app for secure investments.
6.	Loans and Credit Cards: Apply for personal loans and manage your Kotak Credit Cards.
7.	Rewards & Cashback: Earn exciting rewards and cashback on your transactions.
8.	Mutual Funds and Insurance: Invest in mutual funds and purchase insurance policies to secure your future.
9.	Bank Statements and Balance Checks: View detailed bank statements and check account balances in a few clicks.
10.	Secure and Convenient Mobile Banking: Enjoy a secure mobile banking app experience with features like biometric login and encryption.

Why Choose Kotak811?
●	Zero balance account application online in minutes with no paperwork.
●	Simplified digital account application process for a fast and smooth experience.
●	A trusted platform to apply for a zero balance bank accounts or any other savings account.
●	Manage deposits with a leading FD app to grow your wealth.
●	One of the best net banking app to cater to all your financial needs.
Additional Highlights:
●	Effortlessly apply for a zero balance accounts tailored to your needs.
●	Your one-stop solution for UPI payment apps, fixed deposits, and more.
●	Trusted by millions as the most secure mobile banking app and net banking app.

Stay Ahead with Kotak811

The Kotak811 app is designed to make banking faster and more convenient for everyone. Whether you want to apply for a zero balance account or explore a wide range of banking features, Kotak811 brings everything to your fingertips. 

FAQs About Kotak811 App:
1.	Can I open an account instantly? The app allows you to apply for a new bank account within minutes through a digital process. Post application our representative visits the customer for the account opening, which usually takes 24 hrs.
2.	What are the benefits of a zero balance account? A 0 balance account ensures no minimum balance requirement, offering complete flexibility.
3.	Is it safe to use the app? Absolutely! Kotak811 employs advanced encryption and biometric authentication to ensure secure banking.
4.	Can I invest in fixed deposits and mutual funds? Yes, you can easily open a fixed deposit account and invest in mutual funds directly through the app.

Download the Kotak811 App Today

Start your journey with Kotak811, one of the leading account opening app for modern banking. Whether you’re exploring 0 balance account opening bank options, looking for a fixed deposit account, or seeking a reliable UPI app, Kotak811 has you covered.

Open your zero balance account now and unlock a world of possibilities!

Disclaimer: Mutual funds investments are subject to market risks, read all scheme-related documents before investing. T&C Apply.

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Sv: The image is an advertisement for a "Free Platinum Debit Card with 811 Super" from Kotak Mahindra Bank. It shows two debit cards with the Kotak 811 logo and the VISA Platinum logo. The card is personalized with the name "ADITYA KUMAR".
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/3l: The image is an advertisement promoting dedicated customer support. It features the text "Dedicated Customer Support with 811 Super" and a stylized phone handset graphic. The background is a gradient of dark red, and the phone handset is also rendered with a dark, shiny appearance.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Ve: The image is a screenshot from a mobile app, promoting "ActivMoney". It shows a user interface where you can earn up to 7% interest per annum. The app displays the ActivMoney balance (₹50,000), activation amount (above ₹25,000) and withdrawal trigger (below ₹20,000).
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/oO: The image is a promotional graphic for a financial app. It advertises the ability to start a Systematic Investment Plan (SIP) with as little as ₹500. The graphic shows a phone screen displaying a section on "Mutual Funds," with the call to action "Invest now." It uses a design with a dark background and a white interface for the app screen.

Kotak 811 is a digital banking app with a user-friendly interface and easy account management. The major drawback is its lack of proper notifications and SMS alerts for bank charges. While the app sends alerts for most transactions, it fails to notify users when bank charges are deducted. This includes charges like non-maintenance fees, debit card fees, and other hidden deductions. Users only realize these charges after checking their statements manually, which can be frustrating. 👎👎👎

I'm not able to make a UPI transaction of 10k to my zerodha wallet. Every time it says you have exceeded the daily limit when this is my first transaction of the day. I feel the previous kotak app was better. So many bugs. It only causes a lot of inconvenience rather than comfort.

description:
KreditBee is an online personal loan app trusted by over 50 million Indians. Get a quick personal loan at attractive interest rates for a hassle-free experience. Apply for a quick online loan and get the amount directly in your bank account. Whether salaried or self-employed, get easy funds - anytime, anywhere.

● Online personal loans from ₹1,000 to ₹10,00,000
● Interest rates - 17% to 29.95% p.a.
● Tenures - 7 to 36 months
● APR range - 17% to 50%
● Low transaction fees
● Quick loans & easy EMI

What makes KreditBee ideal for every customer?
● Quick online loan
● Low interest rates
● Easy application process
● Fast loan approval
● Digital processing & quick loan disbursal
● Easy repayment with manageable EMI

✨Features of KreditBee personal loan app
✔ Quick Approval – Get a personal loan approved in minutes on our loan app
✔ Flexible Repayment Options – Choose to pay online loan within 7 to 36 months depending on your eligibility
✔ Digital process– Enjoy hassle-free documentation with our online personal loan app. Submit required documents online
✔ Full Transparency - No hidden costs
✔ Convenient – Get a quick personal loan anytime, anywhere
✔ Languages – English & Hindi

Why KreditBee?
Loan for All Purposes: From financing big purchases, short or long domestic/international trips, education, shopping,  wedding expenses, and debt consolidation, to emergency home repairs or medical bills.
Flexible Interest Rates: We offer loans with flexible interest rates of 17% to 29.95% per annum.
Security: We only work with RBI-certified NBFCs/Banks.

🤝Our RBI-registered Lending Partners
Krazybee Services Pvt. Ltd.
Incred Financial Services Ltd.
Vivriti Capital Pvt. Ltd.
Northern Arc Capital Ltd.
MAS Financial Services Ltd.
Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Ltd.
PayU Finance India Pvt. Ltd.
Poonawalla Fincorp Ltd.
Piramal Capital & Housing Finance Ltd.
Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Pvt Ltd.
Mirae Asset Financial Services (India) Pvt. Ltd.
Tata Capital Ltd.
* KreditBee is a loan facilitator platform connecting users with our RBI-approved NBFCs partners & Banks.

Types of Loans
👉Flexi Personal Loan: Flexi personal loans with repayment tenure of 7 to 10 months for loan amounts of ₹1,000 to ₹80,000.  PAN card & proof of address are required.

👉Personal Loan for Salaried: Easy personal loans to salaried individuals for flexible repayment terms of 7 to 36 months for a loan amount of ₹10,000 to ₹10,00,000. A PAN card, address proof, & salary proof are required. 

👉Business Loan - Business loans from ₹10,000 to ₹4,00,000 with flexible tenures of 7 to 24 months. Apply for loan using PAN card, address & business proof.

📋Personal Loan for Salaried Individuals (Example)
Loan Amount: ₹50,000
Tenure: 12-months
Rate of Interest: 20% per annum
Processing Fee: ₹1,250 (2.5%)
Onboarding Fee for New Customers: ₹200
GST on Onboarding & Processing Fee: ₹261
Total Interest: ₹5,580
EMI: ₹4,632
APR: 26.92%
Amount Disbursed: ₹48,289
Total Repayment Amount: ₹55,580

📄Eligibility
a) Indian national
b) Over the age of 21
c) Steady monthly income

Steps to avail a loan
1. Install the KreditBee app
2. Signup using mobile number
3. Provide PAN number & check eligibility
4. Upload KYC documents, including address proof & get your profile verified
5. Choose amount and tenure
6. Provide bank account details
7. Request money transfer in your bank account


Queries?
📧Mail: help@kreditbee.in
📱Call: 080-44292200/080-68534522
🏢Address: 4th Floor, Mereside Heights, 1st Main Road, Sakshi Nagar, Pai Layout, Mahadevapura, Bangalore, 560016


With KreditBee, you get a loan app as well as a financial companion that understands your needs. Our customer support team is available to assist you throughout your loan journey. Unlock a world of possibilities and take control of your finances today with KreditBee.

websiteContent:
![Instant Personal Loan approval](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/banner-loan.png)

# Instant Personal Loans

## Trusted by Over 7 Crore Indians

- From 6,000 to 10 Lakhs
- 100% Online Process
- 10 Minute Disbursal
- Direct Bank Transfer

[Get Loan Now](https://www.kreditbee.in/signin)

[![Download KreditBee App from Google Play Store](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/ic-StoreBadge-GooglePlay.svg)](https://a.krdt.be/02Je/d9cddac2 "Download KreditBee - Instant Loan App from Google Play Store")[![Download KreditBee App from AppStore](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/ic-StoreBadge-AppStore.svg)](https://a.krdt.be/02Je/d9cddac2 "Download KreditBee Personal Loan App from Apple Store")![Person standing](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/img_mHero_LandingMascot.svg)

![Wave Image](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/img_mSite_PatternBackground.png)

![Credit Score Banner](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/WebVAS/CSR/Home/ic_CSR-HomeBanner.svg)

## Know your Credit Score now!

Check for detailed report & insights!

[Get Report](https://www.kreditbee.in/csr/login)

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/bg-about-us.png)

About Us

## About Us

KreditBee is a platform that facilitates loan transactions between borrowers and personal loan providers such as NBFCs/Banks. All loan applications are approved and sanctioned by the NBFCs/Banks registered with the RBI. All details are clearly stated upfront during the Loan application.

KreditBee takes pride in being inclusive as an Instant Loan provider, Users can apply for Personal Loans up to 10 Lakhs as per the requirement. The documentation needed is minimal and the entire process starting from registration to disbursement takes an average of 10 minutes. The application process is completely online and on approval, the funds are immediately transferred to the bank account of the applicant. There are a number of unique Loan Offers available with simple repayment plans.

[Know More](https://www.kreditbee.in/about-us)

## What We Offer

![Personal Loan](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-what-we-offer-plse.svg)

### Personal Loan

Need funds urgently? Get a personal loan from ₹6,000 to ₹10 Lakhs with flexible EMIs from 6 to 60 months. Easy online application, quick disbursal, and financial support when you need it.

![Business Loan](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-what-we-offer-bl.svg)

### Business Loan

Expand your business with a loan from ₹6,000 to ₹5 Lakhs, featuring flexible repayment from 6 to 48 months. Quick approval, hassle-free process, and funds to help your business grow seamlessly.

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-what-we-offer.png)

![Two Wheeler Loan](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-what-we-offer-twl.svg)

### Two Wheeler Loan

Finance your dream ride in Bangalore with loans up to ₹5 Lakhs and flexible tenures up to 48 months. Quick approval, hassle-free process, and easy repayment for your convenience.

![Loan Against Property](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-what-we-offer-lap.svg)

### Loan Against Property

Leverage your property as collateral for a loan up to ₹1 Crores with repayment tenures of up to 20 years. Enjoy competitive interest rates from 12%, available across major cities in South India.

![7 Crore App Downloads](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-downloads.svg)

## Why Choose KreditBee?

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-1.svg)

### Lower Interest Rates

Get loans for multiple purposes at lower interest rates to suit your needs

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-2.svg)

### Fast Processing and Disbursal

Apply online, check your eligibility and get money directly in your bank in 10 minutes

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-3.svg)

### Easy Repayment Options

Repay the loan amount in easy EMI with flexible tenure options

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-4.svg)

### 100% Paperless

No paperwork or physical documentation is required, and you can apply and get a personal loan completely online.

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-5.svg)

### Safe, Secure and Transparent

Our loan application process is fully secured and safe and there are no hidden charges.

![About Us](https://ik.imagekit.io/krazybee/kreditbee_in/banners/New_Web/ic-6.svg)

### Collateral Free

No collateral is required to apply for our personal loans.

description:
PLANET by L&T Finance is your trusted companion for instant and secure financial solutions. Boasting over 30 years of trust, it is a reliable loan app that takes the hassle out of traditional borrowing. From instant secure loans for personal goals to specialized options like farm loans and business loans online, this finance app offers everything you need in a single place. For personal loans, business loans, or home loans, PLANET provides a wide range of options for you to avail on its user-friendly interface. So take charge of your finances and enjoy the convenience of competitive rates, minimal documentation, and fast approvals.

Comprehensive Online Secure Loan Services Under One App
The range of loan options makes PLANET the best online loan app available for you:
● Low Rate Personal Loans: Avail loans with low-cost EMI plans, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayments.
● Two-wheeler Loans: Finance your dream two-wheeler in just a few clicks.
● Home Loans: Make your dream home yours with instantaneous approvals and competitive rates.
● SME Loans: Avail curated SME loans for professionals, including online business loans, doctor loans, CA loans, professional loans, and CS loans.
● Farmer Loans: Give your farm the best resources with special farmer and farm loans from PLANET. With offerings like tractor loans and seed loans, get curated agricultural finance solutions.
● Micro Loan: Boost your business with micro-loans for small financing needs, including rural loans, group loans, women's loans, and more.
● Loan Against Property: Utilise your property to get the funds you need with LAP offerings from PLANET. With your property as collateral, get loans at attractive rates and fund all your personal or business financial needs.

Unique Features that Make PLANET by L&T Finance Stand Out

✅ Quick Approvals and Fast Disbursals: Get instant secure loans with disbursals in just 5 minutes on this online cash loan app.
✅ Minimal Documentation: Apply for loans without any excessive documentation, ensuring faster approvals.
✅ Manage Loans Easily: Access your transaction history, EMI schedules, and loan statements.
✅ Flexible Loan Repayment Tenures: Easy repayments on low-rate instant loans with manageable EMIs on this personal and business loans app.
✅ Secure and Multilingual Interface: All online loan transactions are protected with MPIN and biometric logins. Combined with a multilingual interface, this is one of the best instant loan apps and financial service apps.
✅ Versatile Payment Options: Repay with debit cards, BHIM UPI, wallets, or net banking.

Get Started in Just 7 Steps
1️⃣ Download and open PLANET
2️⃣ Allow the app to access your location and perform a credit assessment
3️⃣ Choose your preferred language
4️⃣ Create your account with your mobile number, verifying it with an OTP.
5️⃣ Set a 4-digit PIN to keep your app secure.
6️⃣ Provide location access for better offers localized to you.
7️⃣ Start exploring the many loan offers and services tailored to your eligibility.

Highlights of Our Online Personal Loan Services

● Finance Amount: ₹50,000 to ₹25Lakh
● Repayment Tenure: 12 to 60 months
● Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 10.5% to 26% reducing
● Processing Fees: 0% to 3%

For example:
● Loan Amount: ₹ 10,00,000/-
● Interest Rates: 12% p.a. on a reducing basis
● Tenure: 48 months
● Processing Fee (PF): 2% (₹ 20,000/-)
In this case, the actual loan details will be:
● Net disbursement amount - ₹9,80,000/- (Loan amount – PF)
● Estimated EMI: ₹ 26,445/-
If you have opted for any insurance product, the value of such an insurance product will be added to the loan and the EMI will increase accordingly.
Fee & charges information: https://www.ltfs.com/our-products/personal-loans/fees
Privacy Policy URL - https://www.ltfs.com/privacy-policy

PLANET by L&T Finance - your go-to financial service app for NBFC loans.

For feedback or queries, reach out at ltfs-mobileapp@ltfs.com.
T&C Apply.

A typical NBFC tends to have a high turnaround time (TAT) for even simple requests. Additionally, they often charge fees of ₹200-₹300 for basic services like a foreclosure letter or interest rate revisions. If you have a good CIBIL score and all necessary documents, opting for a bank would be a better choice. Otherwise, you may find yourself dependent on their terms.

description:
About MobiKwik

MobiKwik is a payment app offering bill payments, loans up to ₹2,00,000, and investments in FDs, P2P lending, mutual funds, and digital gold. You can also experience the power of Pocket UPI on MobiKwik, where UPI transactions don’t require a bank account. With Pocket UPI, enjoy enhanced security, higher transaction limits, and unmatched convenience for your digital payments.

Pocket UPI
- No Bank Account Required: Perform UPI transactions safely without linking a bank account.
- Higher Transaction & Wallet Limits: Load up to ₹2 lakhs in your wallet and transact up to ₹1 lakh per day.
- Flexible Payments: Pay to any QR code, UPI ID, or mobile number.
- Multiple Top-Up Options: Load your wallet through UPI, debit card, or credit card.
- No PIN Required: On-device biometric security (Fingerprint/Face ID) for quick, secure payments.
- Streamlined Interface: Keep Pocket UPI transactions separate from bank statements for better tracking.
- Budget Management: Assign a set amount for spending to manage personal or family budgets.

Free Credit Score
-Check your credit score for free every month.
-Get immediate access to your credit score for detailed insights.
-Reliable and accurate credit data sourced from CRIF.

UPI Payments
- Secure UPI Setup: Create a fast and secure UPI handle in-app.
- Universal Compatibility: Send/receive money via BHIM UPI, phone numbers, or direct bank account transfers.
- RuPay Credit Card Integration: Link and use your RuPay credit card to pay via UPI.
- Scan & Pay: Make payments at supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies, and petrol pumps using the MobiKwik Wallet UPI handle.
- Trusted Brand Payments: Pay securely at Reliance Fresh, Croma, Apollo Pharmacy, and more.

EPFO Balance Checker
Access your provident fund details and track employer contributions using your registered phone number.

Track Bank Balance
Safely track multiple bank accounts with LENS. Download statements and analyze spending with smart spend insights.

Fixed Deposits
- Earn up to 9.5% Returns: Invest with Unity Small Finance Bank, Suryoday Small Finance Bank, Mahindra Finance, and more.
- Special Rates: Senior citizens receive an additional 0.5% interest, and females get an extra 0.1%.

Xtra
P2P investment platform in partnership with RBI-approved NBFC Transactree Technologies Private Limited (“Lendbox”) 
- Earn upto 10-14% p.a.
- Start investing with ₹10000
- Payout to Bank accounts
- No account opening or withdrawal fees

ZIP EMI
- Get funds/loans up to ₹200,000 for online shopping & pay back in monthly installments.
- Interest rates from 9%-35.99% p.a. with a tenure of 3-24 months.
- Standard processing fees vary from 2 to 4%.
Lending partners (NBFC): SMFG India Credit Co. Ltd. (Formerly Fullerton India Credit Co. Ltd.) or SMFG India Credit, Transactree Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (Lendbox), Hero FinCorp Limited
Lending partners (Bank): IDFC First Bank Limited

Sample EMI Calculation:
Loan Amount: ₹50,000
Interest rate (APR): 16% p.a.
Tenure: 12 months
EMI: ₹4,537
Total interest paid: ₹4,444
Processing Fees (2%): ₹1,000
Disbursed Amount: ₹49,000 (Principal Amount - P.F.)
Total Cost of Loan: ₹55,444

Online Recharge & Bill Payment
-Mobile Recharge: Quick recharge for Airtel, VI, Jio, BSNL, and more.
-DTH Recharge: Recharge Tata Sky, Airtel TV, Dish TV, and more.
-Bill Payment: Pay for electricity, water, broadband, LPG, FASTag, property tax, etc., covering 300+ billers.
-Credit Card Payments: Settle HDFC, ICICI, SBI, Amex, and other card bills with instant processing and reminders.
-Money Transfer: Send money instantly via IMPS, UPI, wallet, or credit card.

Contact Us
One MobiKwik Systems Limited (www.mobikwik.com/help)
