It seems like the popup payment option is not compatible with older Android versions. Please look into this issue, Mobikwik team. I hope you can fix this in the next update.

I have been extremely frustrated with the MobiKwik app on my Android 15. It consistently crashes within 2 seconds of launching, rendering it completely unusable. Despite multiple attempts to restart the app and reinstall it, the issue persists, making it impossible to access my account or complete any transactions. I had high hopes for the app, but this ongoing issue with stability has been a major letdown. I hope the developers address this problem soon.

MobiKwik is a fantastic digital payments app that makes transactions quick, secure, and hassle-free. I use it regularly for my personal payments, whether it's recharging my phone, paying bills, or shopping online. The interface is user-friendly, and the cashback offers make every transaction even more rewarding. With seamless UPI integration and a secure wallet, it’s a must-have for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient payment solution! 😍🤙

I really love using the PocketUPI feature, it makes budgeting so much easier. But I wish the UI could be improved, especially on the home page, which feels quite cluttered. When I want to make a payment through PocketUPI, I’d prefer a more streamlined experience without being distracted by numerous other options that aren’t relevant at that moment. Also, the app takes slightly longer than expected to launch.

They use to give fake coupon codes every time you try to do rent payment. If you apply any coupon code, there it will show coupon applied but once payment is complete it will show no coupon code used. There is a bug issue from their end and they are not accepting it. Kindly use other digital platforms for reward points. Most of coupon code on Mobiwik are fake. This happened with me 3 times, so that's why I am seriously fed up with their bug issues.

The most deceiving app in terms of giving discounts or cashback. I am using this app for quite sometime now. This app is slowly becoming more and more deceptive by showing lucrative offers on bill pay, recharge or any other transaction. after the transaction you will be stunned to see the cashback. my latest experience Re1 in place of 5% cashback on Re931 upi payment. you will have a hard time searching for terms and conditions. use this app for payments only if no other option available.

Security is my top priority when using any payment app, and Mobikwik does a great job in this area. Every payment requires OTP verification, and I also like the app lock feature, which adds an extra layer of safety. I feel confident using it for all my transactions

Frequently Asked Questions

1. ##### More about MobiKwik








MobiKwik is a mobile wallet and financial services platform that allows users to send & receive money, pay businesses and utility bills, shop online or at stores, and get access to financial products like instant digital loans, make instant settlements towards credit card bills invest in digital gold, mutual funds & fixed deposits, and get extraordinary returns up to 14% p.a on via P2P Lending on Xtra.



Our latest offering Pocket UPI gives users the power to make UPI payments without the need to link their bank accounts.

2. ##### How can I download the MobiKwik app?




You can download the MobiKwik app from the [App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/in/app/mobikwik-recharge-bill-pay/id600002523?mt=8) (for iOS) or [Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobikwik_new&hl=en_IN) (for Android).

3. ##### How to create a MobiKwik account?








1. Open your MobKwik app
2. Tap on ‘Create A New Account’
3. Enter the mobile number that you want to use for MobiKwik and your email address.
4. Tap on ‘Create a New Account’
5. Enter the OTP that you receive on your mobile number and click on ‘Submit’
6. Enter your First Name, Last Name, and DOB
7. Click on ‘Create Account’
8. Your account has been created

4. ##### How to use MobiKwik?








MobiKwik offers a wide range of services including UPI payments, online recharge, bill payments, shopping online or at stores, paying businesses through any QR or UPI ID, and more. To take advantage of India's fastest financial technology services, simply link at least one of your bank accounts to your MobiKwik account.


View All FAQ

![](https://www.mobikwik.com/assets/images/revampMBK/root_page/home-faq.png)

How to transfer money from MobiKwik to a bank account?

Transfer money from MobiKwik to a bank account by following these steps:

- Open your MobiKwik app
- Select 'Send Money to Bank'.
- Enter the Recipient name, account number, and the IFSC code.
- Enter Amount
- Confirm the transaction by clicking 'Confirm payment'.
- Your transfer is now complete.

Please be aware when transferring money from your MobiKwik wallet to a bank account.

How can I complete the KYC process on MobiKwik?

To fulfill your KYC requirements on MobiKwik, proceed as follows using the MobiKwik app:

- Go to the 'My Profile' section.
- Select 'Complete your KYC'.
- Choose 'Start Video KYC'.
- Click on 'Start Journey'.

Ensure you have a valid identity proof document such as an Aadhar card or PAN card readily available.

How to add money to the MobiKwik wallet?

To deposit funds into your MobiKwik wallet, simply follow these simple steps:

- Open your 'Profile'.
- Click on 'Add money'.
- Enter the desired amount and click on 'Add Money'.
- Select your preferred transaction method - bank account, debit card, credit card, net banking, or UPI.
- Enter the necessary account/card details and tap 'Pay Securely'.
- Input the OTP received on your registered mobile number.
- Your wallet will be successfully topped up with the deposited amount.

What is the process for making a UPI payment using the Mobikwik App?

You can now make all your UPI payments via the MobiKwik Wallet without linking your bank account

- Open the MobiKwik app
- Scan any QR code or Enter any phone number or UPI ID
- Input the payment amount
- Select Pocket UPI from the payment options to pay using your wallet balance
- You can load your wallet with up to ₹200,000 using your credit card, debit card, linked bank account or any other mode
- You can also pay using your linked bank account
- The payment is then sent to the recipient

Is MobiKwik safe to use?

Yes, MobiKwik employs advanced security measures to safeguard your transactions and personal information. We use encryption and secure protocols to ensure the security of your data.

Which bills can I pay using MobiKwik?

You can pay various bills, including credit card bills, electricity bills, and other utility bills using the MobiKwik app.

How can I recharge my prepaid mobile using the MobiKwik app?

To recharge your prepaid mobile, open the MobiKwik app, select the 'Recharge' option, enter your mobile number, choose your operator, and enter the recharge amount. Complete the payment to finish the recharge.

What is ZIP EMI?

[ZIP EMI](https://www.mobikwik.com/products/zip-emi-personal-loan) is an instant loan product that allows you to get an instant loan up to Rs 200,000\* and convert your purchases into easy monthly installments, providing payment flexibility.

What is XTRA?

[Xtra](https://www.mobikwik.com/xtra) by MobiKwik is brought to you in partnership with Transactree Technologies Private Limited (“Lendbox”) which is a RBI-regulated NBFC - Peer to Peer Lending Platform.

Peer to Peer(P2P) Lending allows participants to lend and borrow money, cutting out the traditional bank in between.

What is LENS?

LENS is an account aggregator feature that helps you track all your expenses, income, bank balance and other financial details in one place, offering a consolidated view of your finances, and enabling you to make informed decisions.

What is MobiKwik Pocket UPI?

Pocket UPI is an innovation which allows you to make UPI payments directly from the MobiKwik wallet without having to

description:
Use the mPokket Loan App to get Instant Personal Loans of up to ₹50,000 in just a few minutes! mPokket is the best instant loan app for salaried professionals, self employed, merchants, contract workers and gig workers, and students with part time incomes. It is trusted by more than 3.5 crore Indians. Most secure Instant Loan App with 100% digital loan processing. So, if you are short of pocket money or you want to avail an urgent cash loan in case of an emergency or business or travel or for any other purpose, just login to mPokket app.

⭐️Key Features
✔ Instant personal loan of up to ₹50,000
✔ Online cash transfer to bank account in 2 minutes
✔ Flexible repayment options; Repay in Easy Monthly Instalments from 6 to 12 months
✔ Rewards for timely repayments
✔ Processing fee starting from ₹15 + 18% GST depending on the loan amount and category
✔ Interest rates between 2% to 4% per month with a maximum Annual Interest Rate (AIR) of 48% and maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) of 66.1%

✨Why choose mPokket?
✔ Trusted by more than 3.5 Crore happy customers
✔ One of the highest rated online personal loan apps (पर्सनल लोन एप्स)
✔Loans given by mPokket Financial Services, an RBI registered NBFC
✔ 100% digital process with minimum documentation and fast online verification
✔ mPokket offers a safe and reliable system with a strict user data policy
✔ Amount is transferred to your verified bank account only
✔ Best in class customer support

📝Example of a personal loan calculation when you borrow from mPokket
Loan amount: ₹25,000
Tenure: 12 Months EMI
Interest Rate: 24% Per annum
Processing Fee: ₹1,250
GST on Processing Fee:  ₹225
Disbursed Amount:  ₹23,525
Total Interest: ₹3,368
Other fee including GST: ₹29
APR: 36.3%
EMI: ₹2,364
Total loan repayable amount is ₹28,397 excluding any applicable payment gateway charges

🏆Eligibility Criteria
✔ Age 18 +
✔ Should be a resident of India
✔ Should have a minimum household income of Rs.3,00,000 per annum
✔ Should be a salaried professional with minimum salary of Rs.9,000
    Or, should be a student with part time income
    Or, should be self employed / merchant / gig worker or contract worker

📑 Documents Required
✔ Aadhaar Card
✔ PAN Card
✔ For students with part time income, college ID card and bank statements
✔ For salaried professionals, last 3 months’ bank statement, salary slip/joining letter
✔ For self-employed, small business owners, merchants or gig workers, last 3 months’ bank statements, company or business details and business proofs such as Udyam Aadhar, GSTIN, FSSAI certificate etc.

Loans are given out by our RBI registered  NBFC, mPokket Financial Services Private Limited. We store and analyze the transactional SMSs present on the user's device to assess his/her credit worthiness.

👤Support
📧 Email: support@mpokket.com
🌐 Website: www.mpokket.in
🏢 Address: PS Srijan Corporate Park, Tower 1, 1204, Sector V, Kolkata, WB 700091

# mPokket: Your Instant Loan App for Hassle-Free Loans

Ready to invest in your future, but concerned about the financial hurdles along the way? mPokket is your Instant Loan App for quick financial solutions in India. As a trusted credit loan app, we are here to help you navigate the world of personal loans with confidence and clarity. With mPokket's small credit loan app in India, you can access fast and convenient loans whenever you need them.

[![Get it on Google Play](https://files.tryflowdrive.com/org-1fb1c1bd-90d1-4808-8f5c-d1b750d42899/file-77d25670-cdbf-4a33-b435-4f3428a6e241_get_it_on_google_play_button.webp)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mpokket.app&hl=en_IN&gl=IN&pli=1)

Get funds fast with our 7-minute loan approval process

Rating on Google Play

## Loan for Everyone

[Working Students](https://www.mpokket.in/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0) [Working Professionals](https://www.mpokket.in/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1) [Self Employed](https://www.mpokket.in/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)

### Loan For College Students With Part-Time Income

Empowering young college students with part-time income with our instant loan app in India, providing affordable loans for their dreams. We understand the importance of money in shaping your future. Our loan for students program is designed to provide aspiring scholars with the financial support they need to pursue their dreams. With low interest rates and flexible repayment options, our loans ease the financial burden of tuition fees, textbooks, gadgets and living expenses and also day to day activities where the students need not to rely on their family.

[Learn more](https://www.mpokket.in/instant-loans-for-working-students)

![](https://files.tryflowdrive.com/org-1fb1c1bd-90d1-4808-8f5c-d1b750d42899/file-e32e5632-95a2-458c-9586-014c8fa50b08_students_home.webp)

### Financial Support For Salaried Success

We are dedicated to supporting salaried individuals by offering small ticket size loans. We understand that unexpected expenses or aspirations can arise at any time. That is why we provide quick and hassle-free access to funds tailored to your needs. Our small ticket size loans feature minimal documentation, fast approval, and less interest rates. Whether it's for emergencies, education, or personal goals, we're here to help you bridge the financial gap.

[Learn more](https://www.mpokket.in/instant-loans-for/working-salaried)

![](https://files.tryflowdrive.com/org-1fb1c1bd-90d1-4808-8f5c-d1b750d42899/file-eb0b7434-a75b-4948-97a7-73cfed3aa178_professionals.webp)

### Secure Your Financial Ascent

mPokket specializes in extending small ticket size cash loans to self-employed individuals. Recognizing the unique financial needs of entrepreneurs and freelancers, we provide swift access to funds for business expansion, working capital, or personal requirements. Our process is designed for efficiency, with minimal paperwork and quick approvals. We understand that self-employed individuals often require flexible solutions, and our low interest rates and tailored repayment plans are just the right ones for you.

[Learn more](https://www.mpokket.in/instant-loans-for/self-employed)

![](https://files.tryflowdrive.com/org-1fb1c1bd-90d1-4808-8f5c-d1b750d42899/file-9416538b-d0a4-427c-848c-5db03d4650e1_self_employed.webp)

[![](https://files.tryflowdrive.com/org-1fb1c1bd-90d1-4808-8f5c-d1b750d42899/file-3a9e716a-12cb-4546-9cf0-fe7c55870bab_joshtalks_logo.webp)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pWY70wPYmQM)[![](https://files.tryflowdrive.com/org-1fb1c1bd-90d1-4808-8f5c-d1b750d42899/file-0830a516-7310-45cc-93cf-b3c53557ab9d_cnbctv18_logo.webp)](https://tv.visualmediamonitor.com/AllPR-2023/02Feb2023/VMM/AdfactorsPRPvt.Ltd/mPokket/15-02-23/15Feb23-mPokket-StartUpStreet-CNBCTV18-06.49pm-06min.59sec.mp4)[![](https://files.tryflowdrive.com/org-1fb1c1bd-90d1-4808-8f5c-d1b750d42899/file-1381338a-d7ca-433f-91a5-ff5929a6e790_bwpeople_logo.webp)](https://bwpeople.businessworld.in/article/mPokket-Introduces-Don-t-Feel-Like-It-Policy-To-Promote-Employee-Productivity-And-

description:
Angel One is for Everyone. Built on over 25 years of experience, it is trusted by more than 2.5 crore Indians. We're transforming the way people invest and make informed investment choices.

Whether you're a beginner or a pro trader, Angel One app is a powerhouse of capabilities that make investing and trading a truly rewarding experience. Enjoy seamless trading, simplified portfolio analysis, transparency in charges, and lightning-fast trading interactions.

With smart, intelligent, and investor-friendly features, Angel One empowers you to diversify your portfolio and make smart choices. Be it Stocks, Mutual Funds, ETFs, US Stocks, Currencies, Commodities, F&O, Bonds, Loans or Fixed Deposit, Angel One has smart offering for Everyone.

Benefits with Angel One’s share market online trading app

DEMAT Account
● Open free Demat account online & start investing in the stock market
● Easy, safe, paperless KYC for Angel One's free demat account
● Angel One stock trading app onboarding is seamless for online trading

Stocks
● Trade in 5000+ stocks across large cap stocks, midcap stocks & small cap stocks
● Track live price of NIFTY 50, Bank NIFTY, NIFTY Next 50, & Sensex listed stocks like Tata Motors Share, SBI Share, Reliance Share, ITC Share, Infosys Share, YES Bank Share, Tata Steel Share, Adani Share, etc
● 0 interest charges on margin trade facility for first 30 days of trading in stock market

Angel One Online Trading App Benefits
● Smart Orders options like Stop Loss, GTT, Cover Order & Robo Order
● Add funds easily through UPI/Gpay/netbanking to invest in stock market 
● Pledge shares on Angel One Demat account to invest in Share Market

Mutual Funds & SIP Investment
● Invest in Direct Mutual Funds online through Angel One app
● Explore 5000+ Mutual Funds schemes
● Use SIP calculator & start investing via SIP/Lumpsum investments
● Invest in mutual funds like debt funds, liquid funds, small cap, large cap, mid cap, hybrid funds, ELSS mutual funds, etc.

IPO
● Pre-apply to IPOs with Angel One demat account 
● Apply for IPOs via WhatsApp, Get updates on upcoming IPOs and track share prices using our stock trading app

Futures & Options trading (FnO)
● Access all market segments of MCX, MSE & NCDEX through our share market trading app
● One-click simple and easy options trading using Instatrade
● Commodity trading & currency trading are available in F&O
● Expert advice & easy option trading strategies through partner integration - Sensibull

Personal Loan from Angel One's Lending Partners
● Get money instantly disbursed to your account
● 100% Digital
● Loan Amount: Up to 10 lac
● Repayment tenure: 3-60 months
● Interest rate: starting from 11% p.a.
● Processing Fees: up to 4%

Motor Insurance / Vehicle Insurance 
● Exclusive offers on motor insurance policy
● Instant car/bike insurance policy issuance
● 100% digital, no paperwork, fully online motor insurance policy
● Comprehensive Insurance Options to choose from

Privacy policy: https://www.angelone.in/privacypolicy-digital-lending

We’re listening:🤵
● For assistance email at support@angelbroking.com or call 1800 1020
● Website: www.angelone.in
● Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/angelone
● YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/angelone
● X (twitter link): https://x.com/angelone
● Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialAngelOne

Download Angel One trading app for free & start share market investment & trading journey.

description:
The Kotak Mobile Banking App, a best in class App, provides banking on the go, which is a must in today’s digital era.
If you are not an existing Kotak customer, you can open a Kotak Savings account or an 811 digital bank account by visiting your nearest branch.

If you are an existing Kotak customer, you can use the 250+ features of the app to Bank, Pay bills, Invest, Shop and access services.
One of our recent additions to the 250+ features is our new Pay Your Contact feature, where you can now send money to anyone using just their mobile Number

• Bank on the go:
Manage all your financial transactions, send and receive money through NEFT, IMPS and RTGS & UPI, request for a cheque book and much more
• Pay your bills:
Pay your Mobile Recharge, DTH payments and other bills with the online BillPay feature. Also, use the AutoPay feature to remember your monthly bills and pay them automatically from your account. Never miss a deadline again
• Services:
Instant completion on requesting for services such as updation of profile details, switching on/off of your Debit/Credit Card online

There's a lot more you can do with our Mobile Banking App:
• Transfer money instantly using BHIM UPI without the need for any bank information
• Transfer funds easily on the go without registering a beneficiary
• Send money with Pay Your Contact, by just knowing your beneficiary’s mobile number 
• Book train tickets (IRCTC Authorized Partner), Flight tickets, Bus tickets, Hotels. Shop on Amazon, Flipkart, BigBasket, and more in KayMall
• Recharge your mobile & DTH subscriptions with ease
• Purchase and redeem Mutual Funds and keep track of your investments
• Apply for a Kotak Credit Card
• Regenerate your Debit and Credit card PINs
• In case of loss, temporarily switch off your Kotak Debit Card for security purpose
• Pay Credit Card bill online
• Check your Bank Account statement
• Check your account balance
• Pay your bills, open a Term Deposit
• Post opening Account, go to Manage Profile and Click a selfie or upload your photo to set as profile picture

And that’s not all!
Mid-month cash crunch or an emergency? Get your salary in advance!
Kotak Payday Loan is available with just a few taps. Repay the loan when your salary gets credited next month..
Features of Payday Loan:
• Get a loan within seconds starting at Rs.3,000
• Pay interest as low as Re.1 per day
• Avail loan with no documentation
Eligible users can apply from the ‘Apply Now’ section.


Get started:
To get started, you just need your Customer Relationship Number (CRN), your Debit / Credit Card PIN or your Net Banking password to get started. The app will take you through a one-time activation process when you login for the first time.


Kotak Bank App requires following permissions:
- Contacts: This is required to allow you fetching mobile number while mobile / DTH recharge or sharing IFSC/MMID
- Location: This is required for Branch / ATM locator
- Photos / Media / Files / Camera: This is required to let you access gallery / click an image to set profile picture.
- Phone: This is required to let you dial customer contact center
- SMS: This is required to auto activate the device during activation process.
- Read SMS : This will be applicable for select customers and basis customers' specific consent, KMB App will access device level alternate data for credit risk assessment and decisioning towards better product offering.

Please note that your data is safe with Kotak Mahindra bank. We do not share any information with third party without your initiation.

I have been unable to use the Kotak app for the past four days. The app doesn't show any errors, but the touch functionality is completely unresponsive. Other apps and my phone's touchscreen are working perfectly, so this seems to be an issue specific to the Kotak app. I am unable to navigate or perform any actions within the app, which forced me to rely on another bank's app to meet an urgent requirement. Please address this issue at the earliest.. Very disappointed with such service facility!!

Once again the application crashes everytime I open the app. It was working in between but again stopped. Now it is a disaster. I was very dependent on the app. I request IT department to look into this and get it fixed asap. It is very frustrating. Clearing cache, restarting phone and app still crashes. Please fix this ASAP. I have changed my rating back to 1.

I really appreciate the app. I really do. But there are bugs. One big bug is I get notifications to increase my credit card limit, but when I try to apply all I see is Java exceptions for session expiry. And when I go to check again it says I have already applied but it isn't and promps the increase limit notification again after a few days. It's frustrating.

Amazing banking experience. I'm a customer of almost all the leading Banks of the country and I can proudly say that Kotak's App experience is the best. In the years of being their customer, I don't remember visiting the branch in the last three years. Making deposits, breaking deposits, getting statements literally on the touch of a button is what modern banking should be all about. Their deposit interest rates are low though! But the banking experience is unmatched! Kudos to the Kotak811team!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Excellent Mobile Banking Experience! The app is user-friendly, fast, and secure, making banking on the go incredibly convenient. From seamless fund transfers and bill payments to easy access to account details and investments, everything works flawlessly. The interface is clean, intuitive, and well-organized, ensuring a smooth experience. I particularly love the biometric login and UPI integration, which make transactions quick and hassle free.

I have been using Kotak Bank for 1.5 years, and everything was fine at first. I even planned to give a 5-star rating after 2 years, but now that’s not possible. Their customer service is useless—every time I call, I get different answers. The worst part is their "fine on fine" system—if an investment or service link fails, they keep adding extra penalties. I faced this 3 times, paid all charges, and still had issues. I thought it will be best for online service no, I am closing my account soon!

Everytime if there is an update the app stops working, it does not opens up, and even if I update the app the issue still remains the same. I have to uninstall the app then again I have to install it and then it works fine but then it restricts me to do transactions as a security. This is happening for like last 5-6 times once the updates comes everytime I have to uninstall it and then again install it. And then I have to bear these transactions limit. Pathetic 👎🏽

The latest update has made the kotak app almost unusual for the users . The touch functionality is not working properly , making it impossible to navigate or perform basic tasks .I uninstalled and reinstalled like 4 times and getting the same functionality , but the issue persists . This is highly frustrating , especially for an app that handles critical banking activities . Please fix the issue urgently in the next update .tired clearing cache ,then data ,then uninstalled and reinstalled..

App falsely detects safe apps as malicious! This banking app is completely unreliable. It wrongly flags harmless sideloaded apps as "malicious" and refuses to work unless I uninstall them. I shouldn't have to remove legitimate apps just to use my own bank! There should at least be a Skip button. Instead of improving security, this just makes the app frustrating and inconvenient. If other banking apps can work fine without this nonsense, why can't this one? Fix your detection.

Hi Team, Since the recent update, I have been unable to log in to the mobile banking app. I keep receiving an error stating, "Facing some technical issues, please try again." I have been trying for the past three days without success. Could you please assist in resolving this issue? Thanks, Md.Arshad
The app works like a charm and is very easy to use. However, anytime you're upgrading or changing the device, it will give you all the hassles of life. Doesn't allow me to add multiple CRNs now

I am not able to login to my account from past one week using this app. I am getting same message that "please try after sometime". Please help to resolve the issue asap. Update: After following the steps the issue got resolved. Thanks.

Hasn't worked for me for over a year. Now I needed to use it for an emergency and I still can't. I plan on changing my bank and recommend everyone the same. Absolutely useless. Would give it 0 stars if I could. Edit: the solution to the app is as useless. I'm telling you that it hasn't worked for over a year, do you think i haven't tried doing that. Stupid people

The latest update has made the kotak app almost unusual for the users. The touch functionality is not working properly making it impossible to navigate or perform basic tasks.I uninstalled and reinstalled like 4 times and getting the same functionality, but the issue persists. This is highly frustrating, especially for an app that handles critical banking activities. Please fix the issue urgently in the next update .tired clearing cache, then data, then uninstalled and reinstalled but not solve

Kotak Mahindra Bank made it sound like I was guaranteed to get a loan without any hassle. They sent me multiple notifications that I was eligible for a Pre-approved personal loan, which led me to believe the process would be quick and smooth. However, once I applied online, things went downhill fast. The process seemed simple and convenient, but sadly my entire experience has been nothing short of frustrating and disappointing.

Terrible app keeps crashing constantly. I can't even open it or log in because it crashes within 1 second of opening. Specs: Phone: Samsung S24 Ultra OS: OneUI 7.0 (enrolled in beta program) Android version : 15 Also, as a developer myself, the app requires unnecessary restrictions on enabling developer options in the name of security measures. The USB debugging isn't even turned on!!

The credit system is so worthless. I get the OTP to report fraud on my credit card instantly, but when I need to do transaction on the same card which is Lifetime free I will never receive an OTP via SMS, email or any other communication channels. Their system is so useless they just don't remind or inform me a mandate which I verified way before it suddenly charged me an amount and it is a worthless service. I'll get the service for free otherwise. Useless AF!

At first 2-3 yrs app worked very well and there was no issue at all, and then there started a problem app doesn't open at all, every time I have to uninstall and install the app to open and every time I have enter new password and photo, this keeps me irritated😫😫😫😫 where this app members have gone for so many years/ months app doesn't work properly they have not solved the issue I think they gone to hibernation 😌😌😌🥱🥱

The Kotak App becomes unresponsive after some days of installation. It stops working. You have to uninstall and reinstall the app again. 2nd time it happened with me. After installation, the app doesn't allow you to send more than Rs. 5000/day to your contact for first 7 days. It is so annoying. Same thing happens after 2-3 months of usage. The app just stops responding. I just uninstalled and reinstalled the app so that I can make use of kotak banking. Unfortunately I am stuck with the bank.

The app interface is good however what is the use if it doesn't work. The works fine for a few weeks. Suddenly it doesn't open. Then you have to uninstall and re-install it to get it working. Where even the SBI bank app works fine this app is a disappointment.

App is not starting. When i open the app it take some seconds and wipe off to main screen of phone. App font open . I have tried uninstall and install. For some days it's working properly and now again it crashes as same. It's banking app and need to be fixed asap. What should I do in this ?

Bad overall experience, app hasn't worked for me me last 4 days, bank doesn't deliver debit cards to my address allows onlyy old office address even though you can see my current address on app. Worst digital bank experience. Already moved money out of the bank but also my salary account at my current company, only reason that I still have this useless bank account. Customer service can't really help you with anything. Just get idfc account if you want to be digital.

It's been 2 weeks since I can't open this app. It just goes blank on opening.It doesn't even start.I have been facing this problem from 1 year and I had already complaint about,but I hadn't gotten any solution.I request you to do something about it or else I will have to stop using kotak bank app as my primary payment app.

cannot update anything from kotak app. not adding nominee details, unable to withdraw fixed or recurring deposits.. kindly resolve the issue asap.. facing the same issue from quite some time .. thought that by updating app, will suffix the issue but no help.

Improvements are to be done:- 1) Make the app more lite, stable and smooth as it crashes many times. 2) Give a full new makeover to the app as it looks too old. 3) Bring new tools and features to the app. 4) Bring dark mode to the app. 5) Make the apo smart so it can be use by users Smoothlessly. 6) Bring new homepage with new and improve details. 7) Bring new interface with dynamic background. 8)Make the app smart, lite and smooth. 9)Add more new stuff , new contents.10) Bring something new.

description:
Airtel Thanks App puts the whole Airtel world on your mobile! Enjoy a hassle-free experience while making your everyday payments - prepaid mobile recharge, DTH recharge, postpaid mobile bill payment, broadband bill payment, FASTag recharge, and utility bill payments.

Experience 30x faster speed with Airtel 5G Plus. Track your data usage balance, missed calls while out of network, and much more. Scan any QR code to send and receive money via your UPI ID and online wallet. Check out financial services like personal loans, insurance, and free credit card in the shop section (only for Indian citizens).

Get the best entertainment with a free subscription to OTT platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+ Hotstar, and Xstream.

Prepaid Mobile Recharge
Recharge your prepaid number for talk time, 5G data, and more. 
Tap on recharge and select prepaid
Enter the recharge number and select operator
Choose a prepaid recharge plan for your mobile
Complete the payment for your online phone recharge

Add and manage your family’s mobile recharge on the app
Tap on add an existing connection
Select mobile and enter prepaid recharge number
Put the OTP and the number will be added
Get mobile recharge reminders for all added sim connections

Postpaid Bill Payment
Get a new Airtel postpaid connection on the app 
Never miss a bill payment with postpaid recharge
Activate auto-pay for regular bill payments
Add and manage multiple postpaid connections

DTH Recharge
Use Airtel app as your go-to DTH TV recharge app! 
Head to the ‘pay bills’ section in the app
Tap on DTH Recharge
Enter your DTH recharge account number
Select a DTH TV recharge plan from the list & pay your DTH bill online

Broadband Bill Payment
Recharge your broadband connection online
Check broadband data balance
View various airtel broadband recharge plans
Add and manage multiple fiber connections & wifi recharges on the app

UPI Payment
Airtel UPI allows you to send & receive money from one bank account to another instantly
Scan any QR code for UPI bill payments
Pay to any UPI ID from Airtel Thanks
Link your bank account to UPI ID
Use the UPI payment feature to pay online for mobile recharge, utility bill payments, and more
Check bank balance for accounts linked to Airtel UPI
Do safe and secure online transactions with the Airtel UPI payment

Call Manager
Get real-time missed call alerts when not latched to the network
Block unwanted numbers and report spam calls

Online Bill Payment
Electricity, Water, Book Cylinder, Piped Gas, school fees and other utility online bill payments are exclusively available on app
Open the app and tap on pay bills
Explore the available online bill payment utilities.
Select a utility bill payment (electricity, water, piped gas, and more)
Choose an operator and enter customer ID
Review and make online payment

Check Data Usage
Keep a check on your mobile data usage on the app
Check MB data balance for prepaid and postpaid sim numbers

Airtel Payments Bank & Online Wallet
Open an account with just a video call and get up to 6% interest rate p.a. Invest the smart way with DigiGold, fixed deposits, mutual funds & more.
Pay with Airtel UPI and money wallet to avail cashback offers & more

Financial Services
Get Personal loans with complete digital process, instant disbursal and flexible repayment options from Airtel.
Lending Partner: Axis Bank, DMI Finance, Moneyview, Credit Saisson
Minimum period of repayment = 3 months
Maximum period of repayment = 60 months

Privacy Policy: https://www.airtel.in/finance/personal-loan/privacy-policy
Financial services is only available for Indian citizens having valid Aadhaar and PAN Card.
Download the app Now!

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/F8: The image is an advertisement for Airtel. It features a man holding a phone and smiling. The text says "Track your data balance, validity & active connections"
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/5u: The image is a promotional graphic for a mobile app that allows users to recharge and pay bills. The image shows a smartphone with the app's interface displayed on the screen. The interface has options for different types of recharges (prepaid, DTH, prepaid data card, fast tag) and bill payments (postpaid, broadband, electricity, gas, etc.). The app is advertised as a one-stop solution for all payment needs.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/HY: The image is an advertisement for Airtel Call Manager, a service that allows users to block unwanted calls. The image shows a smartphone displaying a call history with an "Unknown" caller and options to call back, message, report spam, or block the number. A red warning triangle icon highlights the potential issue of an unwanted call. The text at the bottom of the image reads, "Block unwanted calls with Airtel Call Manager."
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/xs: The image is a mock-up or advertisement for an Airtel chatbot. It shows a mobile phone screen displaying a chat interface with the chatbot, used for resolving customer queries. The screen features options to track complaints and view requests related to services like DTH, postpaid, and Xstream fiber. The overall visual design includes Airtel's branding with its logo and red color scheme.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/MA: The image appears to be a promotional graphic for a mobile app that offers rewards, cashback, and potentially free subscriptions to OTT (Over-The-Top) services like Netflix, Prime Video, and Disney+ Hotstar. The central element is a smartphone screen displaying what looks like a rewards dashboard within the app. The text on the screen indicates various rewards available, such as data and discounts, and mentions the ability to claim them.

I have the updated app but the data left is still not shown. It has caused trouble in the past and continues to do so. Why is it so difficult to show data left. What am I supposed to do with seeing SMS left and Calls left? It seems like a cruel joke to me. Please do something about it? --- --- The data left is not shown when I click to the check the details. There should be an entry saying 0 GB left. It's not there, causing confusion.

I am very disappointed with the Airtel app and customer service. When I tried to contact customer service, I was informed that I don't have enough balance to make the call, which is frustrating since I've already recharged. Additionally, the Airtel Thank App's chatbot experience is not user-friendly. It repeatedly asks the same questions without providing any real help.

one of the worst service providers app ever used. word of caution — don't use the "free" Airtel Xtreme trial if on Post-Paid. They bill you despite unsubscribing and then lie that you asked ; to which you'd have no proof otherwise.The app has no feedback space to list real issue. The call center takes 10 min to connect to a human then go on a loop finally repeating " you'll have to pay . there's no resolution" . Almost sure it's a scam. Looking forward to changing to some other Teleco

Not the app—the issue is with Airtel itself. The worst telecom company on this planet. Unnecessary messages before a recharge, saying it’s expired though it’s valid for 10+ days. Internet service is slow; I've worked for an internet company, and I promise you, it's not as advertised. It’s rigged. Unwanted calls, bad network range, annoying voice IVR. Plus a thousand more issues.. The lengths they will go to, stooping so low with bad service, is unheard of.

Worst app management I've ever seen. They're giving notifications every minute and sends the otps every second. I've mistakenly added my name , address and they've converted it on postpaid. Tried to connect with on mails plus chat. But they're suggesting to visit airtel store. Like seriously? If you're converting my sim through online why I would go for store again to back it on prepaid???. Update this on priority.

I have been using Bharti Airtel since 2016 and also completely transformed my experience through this Thanks Application. The app's minimalistic UI interface is a major plus & easy to use. Whether it's recharging to paying bills, settings hellotunes & checking data usage, everything is just a tap away. The customer support feature is prompt & effective. All things considered, Every Airtel customer should install this thanks app for smooth & hassle-free experience.

This app is really useful for a DTH customer but there are some problems. First of all, the app is very laggy in the Manage Channels tab and the UI is too complex. Initially, the interface was so simple and easy to understand but now, they have moved features into multiple sections, making it hard to relocate.

I couldn't reach a real customer service person. It always keeps redirecting to a programed voice assistant. I've been using Airtel xstream fiber for >5 years, recently there are a lot of issues regarding connectivity like disconnection, lowered speed, and poor customer service. I would suggest people who are looking for a good fiber connection to wait till they fix these issues or look for something else.

services which they offer as broadband and DTH are exceptional and outstanding. they intentionally force users to upgrade the subscription and still the same kind of service. and the best thing is about their customer support, I am not able to explain it in words it is completely outstanding. i would recommend all the users once try to reach @Airtel support and ask for L2 support. they will keep you on air atleast for 15-20 minutes and yet they inform you that they are still checking.

Extremely Disappointed with Airtel 5G Network I’ve been using Airtel for a long time, but their 5G service has been nothing short of frustrating. The network is highly unstable, with constant disruptions and poor connectivity. It’s disappointing to see such a big telecom company struggle with providing a reliable 5G experience. the connection drops completely even in areas where coverage is supposed to be stronge. They only say we provide best but they are just a waste i never use or tell to use

Recently, I've installed Airfiber connection. I am getting everything fine, but I want to know how much data I've used out of 1000 GB like mobile recharge. I don't know why this feature is missing in your app for broadband wifi. Please add this feature, because this will work as an alarm for a user about data usage. I hope you'll listen my words.

I don’t get it—every time my recharge is about to expire (like right now, with 4 days left), my internet speed suddenly drops. I’m in a proper 5G coverage area, but it feels like I’m using 2G. Browsing is slow, videos keep buffering, and it’s honestly frustrating. It’s like Airtel is trying to push me to recharge early, which is really unfair. If I’ve paid for a full month, I should get proper speeds till the last day, right? This has happened multiple times.

I am very disappointed with the Airtel app and customer service. When I tried to contact customer service, I was informed that my data is consuming instead of getting 5g unilimited, which is frustrating since I've already recharged. Additionally, the Airtel Thank App's chatbot experience is not user-friendly. It repeatedly asks the same questions without providing any real help. waste service

Worst! The app is designed to make it more easier for Airtel to bring in more business, it offers you everything to get a new connection, add ons etc. However, very minimal options to reach out for help or to fix a hindered service. But they definitely send you a message/ mail stating their best team is on the job to fix your issue, and they send it daily.

I am very disappointed with the Airtel app and customer service. When I tried to contact customer service, I was informed that I don't have enough balance to make the Broadband, which is frustrating since I've already recharged. Additionally, the Airtel Thank App's chatbot experience is not user-friendly. It repeatedly asks the same questions without providing any real help. Very bad experience with Airtel. Please don't take the broadband connection.

I have had a frustrating experience with the Airtel Payments app. The app is slow, often crashes, and fails to process payments smoothly. Customer support is unhelpful, and issue resolution takes too long. I’ve faced multiple failed transactions without proper refunds, and the interface is not user-friendly. Airtel really needs to improve this app to provide a better experience for its users.

Unsatisfactory . I didn't expect it from airtel ! I've been a postpaid user for over 11 years. I have been trying to get an Airfiber connection and have visited the Airtel office for the past five days, but no one has given me a clear explanation for the delay in getting my connection. It seems that Airtel is making significant profits, which might explain their lack of interest in acquiring new connections. I think now might be the right time for me to switch to a diff. telecom provider.

Recharges and payments take a lot of time. Good cashbacks are there but service is sometimes too slow and recharges and payments are left pending. They eventually take place though and money is not misplaced. Since last year I am unable to use the Airtel data and their useless customer service is unable to take any action. I have a one year pack which is going to expire soon and in this one year I could not use the data at all. Customer service in Thanks app is just frustratingly useless.

with Airtel stream. It was my bad experience, I prefer to everyone don't try take wifi from Airtel. the big problem is you can't check your wifi connection on airtel app. also when you will connect with customer care agent. they don't have a proper knowledge about it. they will just say our application is going to update so that's why you are facing the this problem. But at the end it will be not solved.

Unsatisfied. I am a regular user of Airtel, using prepaid and broadband. For the last three days, on bill payment particularly for gas bill payment there is no option of paying through credit cards. This is a bug from Airtel's end. I am very disappointed with this kind of service. I have been following up with the team through email and phone calls, but no proper response received. Even they don't have proper system for resolving the issue. It appears that there is no proper resolving mechanism.

I recharged data on my prepaid Airtel no. However, even after I got the confirmation, the data has not been credited to the number. Neither has the money been refunded. Not only the app, I also found Airtel lacking in its quality of network and customer service. They just convince customers to take their connection and after that it's headache for the customer. Facing the same problem again. Faced the issue four times. Fleecing customers.

App doesn't provide all the options or services required by any user. New chat option is so bad that it wastes 90% of time for a user to raise any issue or to get any info. Also manage my wifi option is pathetic. It doesn't works for most of the time. Merging the band (4G & 5G) is the worst thing that airtel does. Manage wifi doesn't shows all the bands. Also it doesn't shows the correct band to which my device is connected.

The Airtel Thanks app is useful for managing mobile accounts, recharges, and offers, but it has major drawbacks. Many users face issues with network problems, eSIM upgrades, and technical glitches, but the app does not provide effective solutions. The interface is decent, but when problems arise, the support system within the app is frustrating.Customer Service Experience: Airtel’s customer care is unreliable when it comes to resolving complaints. Many users report that representatives either...

Back Key Functionality is not user friendly, Once clicked on any feature this app makes sure customer avail it. I n my case I clicked on postpaid section then back key was not working only 😒. then without my consent otp generated automatically applied automatically, I felt cheated 🙃. Beware of giving app permission to this app. Permissions can be reverted from App->settings in phone . hope it helps one who read this comment.

Some parts of the app do not seem to work at all. For example I am completely blocked from creating a savings account because the payment options do not pop up for adding your initial amount, at the end of journey. Not to mention the horrible customer care who closed the support ticket with a default response without actually looking into the screenshot / actual issue. Atleast get a feedback? Drop us a mail about the status of support ticket? These are the basics in current IT world.

worst and useless app.chatbot will raise your ticket regarding the issue and nothing happens.it is a waste

description:
Navi, your all-in-one financial superapp designed for diverse financial needs, offers a range of services for your convenience. From lightning-fast UPI payments to smart investments in mutual funds and gold, quick cash loans, reliable health insurance coverage, and effortless home loans, Navi has you covered. Download the Navi app and unlock a world of possibilities for your financial well-being.

1. Navi UPI
Simplify money transfers with Navi UPI (NPCI Approved).
Navi UPI Features
✅ Instantly transfer money to anyone, anytime
✅ Pay bills and recharge online
✅ Conveniently scan and pay at any store
✅ Seamlessly make online payments on various apps
✅ Enjoy hassle-free payments with Navi UPI Lite, no PIN required

2. Investments
Discover diverse investment opportunities with mutual funds and digital gold.
Navi Mutual Fund Features
✅ Diversify with Direct Index Funds for better growth
✅ Flexible SIP options: daily, weekly, or monthly
✅ Zero commission & one of lowest expense ratios for cost-effective investing
✅ Fastest redemption order payout in the industry
✅ Invest till 3 PM and get the same-day NAV for better returns

Remember, mutual fund investments are subject to market risks; read all scheme related documents carefully.

Navi Gold Features
✅ 24K Digital Gold
✅ 99.9% purity
✅ Investment starts with just ₹10

3. Navi Health Insurance
Safeguard yourself and your family's financial future with Navi Health Insurance.
Navi Health Insurance Features
✅ Coverage up to ₹3 crore
✅ Health insurance premiums starting at just ₹413* per month
✅ Experience quality healthcare at over 12,000+ network hospitals*
✅ Cashless claim settlement within 20 minutes*
✅ Benefit from 100% coverage* of hospital bills through a paperless process

4. Navi Cash Loan
Access instant cash loans of up to ₹20 lakh
Navi Cash Loan features
✅ Enjoy competitive interest rates up to 26% per annum
✅ Choose from flexible loan tenures ranging from 3 to 84 months
✅ Experience a fully digital loan process with instant fund transfer to your bank account
✅ Qualify with a minimum household income of ₹3 Lakh per annum

Example of How Navi Cash Loan works:
Loan Amount = ₹30,000
APR* (ROI) = 12%
EMI = ₹2,800
Total Interest Payable = ₹2,800 x 12 months - ₹30,000 = ₹3,600
Total Amount Payable = ₹2,800 x 12 months = ₹33,600
*Note: These numbers are for representation purposes only. Final APR will depend on the customer's credit assessment.
*APR (Annual Percentage Rate) is the total cost you'll pay for borrowing money over a year. It includes the interest rate plus any fees charged by the lender. APR gives you a clear picture of how much a loan will really cost you. For Navi, APR is equal to ROI (Rate of Interest) as we don't charge any additional fees.

5. Navi Home Loan
Book that dream home with home loans up to ₹5 crore with flexible EMI options and a sanction offer letter within 5 minutes
 Navi Home Loan Features
✅ Loan Amount up to ₹5 Crore
✅ Interest Rate up to 13%
✅ Loan Tenure up to 30 Years
✅ Zero Processing Fees
✅ Up to 90% LTV
✅ Navi Home Loan is available in Bengaluru, Chennai & Hyderabad

6. Referral Program
Discover endless rewards with Navi's referral program! Share the Navi app with friends and family, and unlock exclusive rewards for every successful referral.

About Navi
- Navi app is developed & owned by Navi Technologies Limited, founded by Sachin Bansal and Ankit Agarwal, in December 2018.
- Cash Loans and Home Loans are provided by Navi Finserv Limited, a Non-Deposit taking systemically important NBFC registered & regulated by the RBI.
- Health Insurance is offered by Navi General Insurance Limited, registered with the IRDAI as a general insurer.
- Navi Mutual Fund, registered with the SEBI, offers multiple mutual fund schemes to investors.
- Navi UPI is NPCI approved.

I no longer want to use the Navi app after my recent experience. Yesterday, I sent an emergency payment of ₹500, but the transaction failed. The amount was deducted from my account, and despite sending an email to customer support, I still haven't received a refund. This kind of delay is unacceptable, especially during emergencies. The lack of proper resolution has made me lose trust in the app. I wouldn't recommend using Navi due to their poor user support.

My personal experience was amazing. The app is very user friendly and intuitive. I was not successful in several other so called top rated apps but this one was very straight forward and quick with a not bad interest rate. They are charging 40.92% intrest rate. Worst not at all acceptable for last 3 years i am trying no useful. After 3 years they have given 240000/- with interest rate of 2.9 % per month that is 34.8% per year but now they are saying with 2.9 per month is 40.92% per year how I don't know. I have paid 12 months of emi 10200/- after 12 months my current outstanding is 219000/- appx and inthe form of 98000/- appx they have taken as intrest and reduced only 21000/- appx as principal amount.

Very frustrated and not happy with the services never install this app. If installed then better to uninstall this app. Unuseful. This app is not fair with reliable customers. Even when customer pay on or before time they used to reject the new application.Inspite of retain the existing customer and good customer they send un useful promotional messages. when paying on time dues they doesn't retain the customer. how I can say that this app is reliable..

I have been using Navi app for the past six months and have made all my payments up to date. But after the last payment I was unable to apply for the next loan and it says try again next time. Very cheap, even after paying everything on time. They like it... Very bad experience. In an emergency situation like this. If we are unable to get a loan after making all the repayments it is very bad. WON'T RECOMMENDED OTHERS TO USE THIS APP.

The application boasts a clean, modern user interface and facilitates smooth, rapid transactions. However, the absence of a dark mode feature represents an area for improvement. Development of this feature is recommended.

Was very disappointed with how the selling of rcb tickets were handled. Tried to book for an hour from the moment the tickets went live and I barely see seats available (as if everything is sold out within 10 seconds) and every time I do select seats, it says limit exceeded. And this issue isn't just for me. Many people on X have faced the same issue.

The Navi app is decent but nothing exceptional. It functions similarly to many other apps in the market. Initially, when you make transactions, you receive attractive rewards. However, after a few transactions, the rewards significantly decrease, often dropping to less than ₹1, such as 20 paise or 60 paise.

I have been using the Navi UPI app for months, but its reward system is disappointing. The app advertises exciting rewards, but in reality, they are mostly for new users or available for just one day. Regular users like me, who make frequent transactions, hardly receive any benefits. My Monthly Transactions on Navi UPI (I spend money with this navi app over approx 2.lakhs but in first Day they 19₹ but amazing fact is over spend 2.lakhs + but they only gave me 65₹) * ( It's Algorithm )
Interface is good and easy to use.. But something is missing like locking the app with biometric and pin.. There is google play redeem code is not available...we need it so try to add this feature.

2 stars as I am using their service currently and the process was easy too. However with timely resolutions keeping customer's best interests into consideration is absent in this organisation. So if you ever face any technical error, do not rely on them for a sound resolution. You only get fake assurance.

It seems that this app doesn't have authentic web portal, when I browse the plans and details to see , it dominantly push to mobile app. why this cannot work on website?? just be cautious for any fraudulent and malicious programs.. i cannot just go and install the Navi app without knowing what they serve.

I’ve been using this app for TWO YEARS, hoping to get a loan, but it has been a complete waste of time. Every time I apply, they either reject me or say I don’t qualify, even though my credit score is good and my details are up to date. They keep asking for more documents, but nothing ever happens. The app constantly sends notifications about "pre-approved offers," but when you try to apply, it’s the same story—REJECTED! If you’re looking for a real loan, don’t wwaste your time here.

Absolutely terrible experience! I recharged my account, but neither did I receive the balance nor did I get my money back. It has been a whole week now! I contacted their support team twice, and even then, they had nothing useful to say. This is by far the worst app ever! No calls, no proper response—nothing! I even emailed them once, but they didn’t bother to reply. And doesn’t every company have a helpline number? Well, not them! No calls from their side

I would never recommend this app because it shows in the advertisements that you will get some navi coins after each transaction but in real most of the time i get a message "oops this time you got nothing" It gives the navi coins in 1/15 transactions.. It's a terrible 😞 experience using this app..

I am very thankful to Navi team for helping me during hard times. This is second time I took loan assistance from you and the service is excellent and very fast. No time wasted everything is digital and saves all the time. Thank you so much for amazing services and keep up the great work 👍 Another point, if you are good at payments and good credit score then it's very easy to get loan services.

I've used smartphones for decades but rarely review apps—until now! Navi Finserv changed that with its seamless experience, lowest gold rates, affordable insurance, and zero-charge loans. The UPI payments are super fast, and cashback rewards make transactions exciting. I even bought insurance from Navi, and the process was so smooth! If this app stays genuine, transparent, and user-friendly, it could dominate the finance market for years. Highly recommended to everyone!

As your customer, I am very happy with your service. I tried so much, but all of you together with your customer care staff cancelled my policy. I tried so hard to get my payment done, but my KYC was not getting updated. So I kept sending documents and everything but to no avail. Your customer care executive only wants 5 ratings, but has nothing to do with client's problem and has no solution for it. Thank you very much!

I've written n no of mails to provide email logging in option in the app but there's no use coz its been 1 and a half yr and I haven't been able to login to my account

Hi @Navi, I got a very bad experience, My payment failed and I am not getting any refund though my money is deducted and none from support is responding. Is this a joke or what. description:
Groww is India's No.1 Stock Broker 🏆, trusted by more than 10 Mn+ active investors.

Groww offers products for investing, trading & payments. Invest in Mutual Funds, NSE & BSE-listed Stocks, IPO, Futures & Options (FnO), ETF, SGB, trade in share market.

🚀Groww offers:

👉Mutual Funds for lumpsum & SIP investing
👉Stocks, IPO & Intraday Trading
👉Futures & Options Trading (FnO)
👉Sovereign Gold Bonds (SGBs)
👉Recharges, bills & UPI payments

Reasons why Indians love investing on Groww:

• Free Demat account
• 0 AMC & no hidden charges
• 24*7 customer support

⭐STOCK MARKET TRADING & INVESTING

• Open Free Demat account
• Track financials and manage your portfolio of shares listed on NSE & BSE stock exchanges like Angel One, 5Paisa Capital, Infosys, HDFC Bank, SBI, ITC, Reliance, Adani & Tata
• Apply for upcoming stock market IPOs like Swiggy, Hyundai Motor & Bajaj Housing Finance
• Live trading in NSE & BSE stock exchanges with Groww Demat account
• Track stock market news & indices like NIFTY, SENSEX & invest using features like Stock Screener, GTT orders, Technical Indicators, calculators & Stop-loss for investing
• Invest & trade with Demat Account in BSE & NSE stock markets including Intraday trading
• Trade using TradingView, advanced charts & build robust portfolio
• Set alerts to track share price movements for trading & investing decisions
• Get up to 4x margin with MTF (Margin Trading Facility)

⭐ADVANCED FUTURES & OPTIONS TRADING

• Trade better in F&O with Safe Exit, Option Chain, Instant Pledge etc.
• Use advanced charts to make informed futures & options trading calls
• Analyse BSE & NSE stock price patterns with multiple indicators & TradingView charts
• Trade NIFTY futures, put options & call options from the option chain
• Use Basket Orders during option trading
• Add money via UPI options like Gpay, Paytm & PhonePe for Futures & Options trading
• Check pledge balance & get trading margin using Instant Pledge
• Track NSE & BSE indices & charts for NIFTY, GIFT NIFTY, NIFTY MIDCAP, BANKNIFTY, FINNIFTY, SENSEX, BANKEX, NIFTY NEXT 50 etc to make informed trading calls
Track top global Indices like NASDAQ, DOW JONES and more
• Create & execute option trading strategies
• Trade above freeze quantity in Options with Iceberg Order
• Zero Pledging charges while trading in FnO

⭐DIRECT MUTUAL FUNDS INVESTING

• Invest in Direct Mutual Fund options using screener
• Pay 0% commission on investing in Direct Mutual Funds with Demat account
• Invest money via SIP or lumpsum in Mutual Funds offered by AMCs like Zerodha Mutual Fund, SBI Mutual Fund, Quant Mutual Fund, Axis Mutual Fund etc using SIP calculator
• Import & redeem external Mutual Funds investments
• Switch external regular mutual funds to direct mutual funds & earn 1.5% extra returns
• Estimate portfolio returns with SIP calculator

UPI, BILL PAYMENTS & RECHARGES
• Pay bills, manage money & Recharge FASTag
• Check bank balance & send money to friends

PERSONAL LOAN (available for select users)
• Tenure: 3 to 60 months
• APR: 13-48%

Registered NBFCs & Banks (lenders)
• IDFC First Bank Ltd
• Aditya Birla Finance Ltd
• Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Pvt Ltd
• Groww Creditserv Technology Pvt Ltd

Groww is the DLA for the above lenders operating the Groww platform and services therein with assistance from other LSPs

Example
Tenure-12 months
Rate of Interest-15% per annum
Processing fee-₹1000 (2% inclusive GST)
Total Interest-₹4156
EMI-₹4513
APR-18.89%
Amount Disbursed-₹49000
Total repayment amount-₹54156

version.changelog:
Here’s us keeping up with our promise of bringing you new updates from time to time.

Some features to look out for in this update:

Mobile Terminal for Intraday: Monitor positions, check orders, and place trades from the charts.

This is an overall review. The app interface is excellent. Very hasslefree to use and quite good for someone who is not that savvy. Other than that, most of the support people seem very disengaged and casual. They don't possess the knowledge and are more keen on closing the tickets rather than resolving the issue. Apart from that I don't know how safe it is and twice it happened that the gains didn't reflect on my funds. When raised a complaint, the support team couldn't reply properly.

I have been using the app for more than a year now, and recently it was not quick during the starting hour of equity trade, because of which I lost a considerably huge amount!! And no response given to my previous request "just try adding a percentage pie chart in one's equity investments, in what sectoral did the invested amount is into, just like we get to see in mutual funds investment details, nifty fifty etc". Also think about adding an option for investors into foreign markets.

Whenever there's Market gap while opening, or Market is moving fast. They won't work fine. Sorry, But the app has issues while the moment described, not always so, clearing data doesn't work or better to say isn't required. they show wrong data too. It's better to not use it.

Not at all user friendly app. Very confusing and difficult to manage and track things in the app. For investors it is still ok but for traders it is not at all recommended as you won't be able to use charts and indicators with ease in this app. Also the withdrawal process is worst amongst the all stock broking apps as this app does not have same day withdrawal feature which I think is a biggest drawback. Do Not go by the rating on Google play store, it does not seem to be organic.

So much loading after last update, not opening properly after fingerprint. Watchlist is not updating after saving the new order 😬 . In Home page, give our total asset tab which should show the total investment amount in both stocks+ mutual funds. Watchlist update is not saving properly. Showing old data after editing & saving also.

Groww is a game-changer for investors! The app is user-friendly, perfect for beginners and pros alike. It offers seamless stock & mutual fund investments with insightful analysis to guide decisions. UPI integration ensures hassle-free transactions, and the educational resources boost financial confidence. With responsive support, Groww makes investments simple, efficient & enjoyable. I highly recommend this app, so good, it's very easy to use and the interface for is so smoothly designed.

the app is user friendly and anyone can easily navigate and do the work they needed. would recommend it for all. but in the last version we had an option to go back to the spot chart from the positions directly but it got removed in the updates. that option was very helpful and I am not sure why it got removed.

Title: Excellent App for Investing & Trading! I have been using the Groww app for a while now, and it has truly exceeded my expectations. The user interface is clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate, making it perfect for both beginners and experienced investors. One of the standout features is the seamless stock and mutual fund investment process. The app provides real-time market data, insightful analysis, and easy-to-understand charts, which help in making informed investment decisions.

I have been using Groww since 7 months and it's a great app for investment. The platform offers seamless mutual fund investments, stock trading, and SIP options. The user-friendly interface makes investing hassle-free, while real-time tracking ensures transparency. I love the zero-commission feature and fast withdrawals. I Highly recommend this app for anyone looking to grow their wealth and investments with ease.

App shows redeemed in bank account, but nothing happened. 7-8 days later, I got a cheque of redemption amount, but the name was wrong. Customer care offers a template response every time 'I can't do anything because these are external funds, is there anything else '. I am hoping to get a resolution with SEBI.

previous interface of chart in which orders position was better, new interface is quite annoying, I m considering that another broker if interface is friendly . boring one because I cannot track chart as well as order at the same time, if open the orders the chart hidden , extremely confusing 😕

hey i pay lot of brokerage in f n o trading daily and groww is my only broker, recent update is a good and useful one pls add and fix few things 1) buying and position not showing in land scape chart mode 2) while placing order buy/sell , a complete new window opens for typing order , it should be easy and fast order typing (in a small window or box moving with price line)while seeing the chart 3) for fast entry, exit , sl and target should be made easy just by clicks or diagram on chart

I have used Groww now for quite a time now. Groww is quite a good app for managing investments. I've primarily used Groww for Stock and Mutual Fund Investments and the experience is quite wholesome. But for past few days I've been facing issues with the loading of the app. On opening the app sometimes on entering the pin or fingerprint authentication it goes into infinite buffering mode and after so much time I have to close it or restart again. I request Groww Team to please look it up.

it will be better if they provide subscription like kotak or other platforms where they reduce brokerage by taking a small amount of money at the beginning..... but in my opinion the best user friendly app ever saw... and too much smoother than any other apps

Great app, and after the update, it's even better! The orders section and position right in front of you with the chart is amazing. Just one thing— I don't think the Genie granted your second wish, because whenever I click on the position, my chart starts to flicker. Sue him if you can, lol!

Groww is a great application for trading, investments, SIP and more, anyone can use it but, for new beginners it can be confusing and hard to navigate, or you can watch there youtube channel for everything. overall great App.

Groww Team, please, take note of what to improve about the UI. Open Nifty50 or any index chart. You will see 3 buttons- F&O Position, Chain, and Order. When you touch "F&O Position" button, a pop-up dialogue box opens up. The other 2 buttons do not function like this. Make other 2 buttons like this. If you make other 2 buttons like the " Futres & Option" button, it will attract all users from everywhere. Hope you understand what to improve and what changes you are supposed to bring to UI.

Before using this app, please check its problem... 1. In the morning when the market opens the app doesn't work properly, a bug occurs. 2. If I am withdrawing my withdrawal amount then the time is 3pm of the day or the amount has not been withdrawn till the next day. 2 days hold or reverse the amount in grow wallet. 3. If the app stops at any time while trading, a bug may appear and this can lead to your loss.

I've been using it since more than 3 years, it was best app, used to work smoothly on weak internet connection as well. But in recent days it has became worst. Doesn't open up on data connection and needs strong wifi connectivity. No matter you are on 4g or 5g, it doesn't show up anything and keeps on lagging. After recent update it is the same story.

I have been using the Groww app for the past 6-7 months to invest in stocks and mutual funds, and overall, my experience has been excellent. The app is user-friendly, provides insightful data, and makes investing seamless. However, today I faced an issue while trying to recharge. My previous recharge expired, and when I attempted to make a new one, I kept getting the error message "The biller is down." I tried 7-8 times, but the same issue persisted. I hope the Groww team looks into this...

: Enhancing grow App Accessibility for the Visually Impaired Dear grow Team, I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to suggest enhancements to the grow app to make it more accessible for visually impaired users. The following improvements would greatly benefit users who rely on screen readers and other assistive technologies: 1. **Screen Reader Compatibility**: Ensure all elements, buttons, and icons are properly labeled and compatible with screen readers like TalkBack.

Worst customer support and index search doesn't work in app. I raised an issue that I was facing search issue through call and via email but none of the support team resolved the issue also while searching the index options won't show in the search results. If SEBI updates any expiry dates or lots this app is not fast enough to update to the latest and this brings the investors loss. Sadly I will have to switch for some other brokage apps

I've been using this app for a year now, and it has a user-friendly interface that's easy for everyone to navigate. However, I have two feature suggestions that competitors' apps already offer: 1.Trailing Stop Loss: The ability to trail stop loss by a defined difference would be a valuable addition. 2. Instant Order on Option Charts: Allowing users to set stop loss and target orders directly on the option chart would greatly enhance convenience. Adding these features would be the cherry on Top.

Recently the app has become sluggish and buggy on my Samsung s21 FE. Even with the frequent updates the issue persists. Looking to switch to other app as brokarages and other charges are already higher compared to competitor apps. The smooth and intuitive UI seems to be a thing of past.

description:
More than 10 Million businesses trust Paytm for their payments

Accept Payments Everywhere

Paytm for Business app is the fastest & easiest way to collect payments from customers. If you are a merchant, run a small business, a startup, a freelancer, a shop or a delivery service; then accept payments for your business from millions of Paytm customers. 

All Payment Methods Accepted

Accept payments using any UPI app, Debit/Credit Card, Net-banking & Paytm Wallet. merchants can also accept payments from mobile number, QR code or card machine 

Request Money through Payment Link

Create payment links on Paytm for Business app & collect payments over chat or email with Payment Links. 

Accept Payments with All-In-One QR Code

Get Paytm All-In-One QR Code & start accepting payments for your store. Receive payments from all UPI Apps, Rupay Cards & Paytm Wallet

Print or order a QR code & display it next to the cash counter or a prominent place in the shop to show the code and collect payments. 

Track Payments Real-time

Get notified via SMS & push notification every time you receive payments. Check all merchant payments and transactions, initiate refunds, see bank transfers, get useful insights & watch your business grow all within one app!

Instant Bank Settlements

Select the frequency of the settlements or manually settle the amount yourself & get money in your preferred bank account!

Door to Door Shipping: We have tie-ups with major courier partners & assure on-time delivery across the country.

Business Loans
Avail unsecured loans upto Rs 10,00,000 with tenure of 3 to 36 month. Simple and digital loan journey, apply at your convenience without any paperwork. There are no prepayment charges and you can use multiple repayment modes.  Loans can be availed by new credit customers at an attractive APR from 15% to 46%. E.g. loan amount of Rs 10,000 @18% rate of interest for 3 months and 2%PF, total interest payable will be Rs 301, and PF of Rs 200 + GST will be applicable.

Our partners are (NBFC):
- Clix Capital Services Private Limited - https://www.clix.capital/our-partners/
- SMFG India Credit Company Limited (Formerly known as Fullerton India Credit Company Limited) - https://www.smfgindiacredit.com/digital-lending-partner.aspx?tab=partner_details
- Piramal Capital and Housing Finance Limited - https://www.piramalfinance.com/about-us/lending-partners
- Aditya Birla Finance Limited  - https://personalfinance.adityabirlacapital.com/pages/individual/platform-partners.aspx

All loans are subject to T&C (sample): Read Here

Personal Loans
Important: Paytm for Business is a facilitator between you and the lending partner.
Get Loan amount starting from 10K to 2.5 lac
Repay loan within 3-60 months
Annual percentage rate (APR) (per annum monthly reducing): 10.5-48%
Loan Processing fee: 0- 6%
Please Note: Personal Loans are only available to Indian citizens within the territory of India
Lending partners (NBFC):
- Aditya Birla Finance Limited - https://personalfinance.adityabirlacapital.com/pages/individual/platform-partners.aspx
- Clix Capital Services Private Limited - https://www.clix.capital/our-partners/
- Hero Fincorp Limited - https://www.herofincorp.com/partners

Example:
Loan amount: 100000, Interest 23%, Processing fee 4.25%, Tenure 18
Loan processing fee: Rs.4250
Stamp duty charges: applicable as per law
EMI per month: Rs.6621
Total interest: Rs.19178
Disbursal amount: Rs.94785
Amount Payable: Rs.119186

Website - https://business.paytm.com

The app is called "Paytm" and the interface shows a user has a pre-qualified loan of up to 5 Lacs. It provides information about the loan amount, interest rate, daily installments, and tenure. It also gives tips to increase the loan amount.

The app offers content in 11 languages, and the screen displays a list of language options with radio buttons for the user to select their preferred language.
