I have tried contacting them but all they do is make us wait I have waited for 20-25 min 3-4 times but still couldn't reach them. please delete my account.

worst service provider, if you complaint through their chatbox it suggests you to dial the helpline number, when you call in helpline number, it doesn't provide you any option to speak with consumer support associate and at the end they send you a link which takes you back to the that chatbox again and the cycle continues, it's been 3 years since my soundbox stopped working, i have complaint many times about the issue through tickets and all but they didn't replace it and still charging for it.

3rd class service, customer support is only for names, not for any resolution; only the bot is replying automatically. The bot recommended calling customer care; when I call the customer care number, then the call is automatically cut, and a message is recommended to use bot support in the app. Only repeat the same circle every time.

support is too bad. very worst experience. first of all fix your app issues like verifying the Udyog Udyam certificate upload issue. it's not even taking pdf and when I upload image , a full hd image still not verifying. raised ticket but support not get back to me. very frustrating. it's better idea to shift to PhonePe. I will wait for couple of hours else shift to different providers.

Think twice before opting for Paytm's speaker service! They claim that 300 transactions will waive the fee, yet despite receiving over 900+ transactions, they still charge me ₹125 per month. Misleading promises and unnecessary charges—Paytm keeps moving the goalpost. On the other hand, PhonePe is far more reliable, charging only ₹25-₹50 and actually sticking to their word. Don't fall for Paytm's trap—choose wisely!

The app is asking for an update even after updating the app. Urgently update the app message screen keeps coming when you open the app and it doesn't go away no matter where you click on the screen. You cannot check your payments or anything else as long as the update app message is displayed...Not at all expected from Paytm.

I never received soundbox and I didn't use the service of soundbox but still they are charging rental fee of ₹59 per month from nowhere. If I use the service then I will ready to pay for it but if I am not why I give monthly rental fee for this. And also I raise a ticket from app but no one reply on that ticket. Wrost experience. Wrost customer support.

worst customer care support. such a fraud company without request sent the soundbox and charge more amount than informed even didn't use it single time. I requested multiple times to deactivate and return my soundbox, but didn't consider my request. After all try, I requested to deactivate my account also but no actions. I'll complaint in RBI and NPCI. i could see many of them facing same issue.

I'm extremely disappointed with the service provided by this app. Despite my repeated requests for account deactivation, I've received no help. To make matters worse, I'm still being charged unwanted deductions. I've been left with no choice but to share my frustrating experience on social media platforms and seek legal assistance to address the mental stress caused by their unprofessional behavior and lack of customer support. I hope this public feedback will prompt the case.

Extremely disappointed with this service! I requested multiple times to deactivate my merchant account, but they completely ignored my requests. Instead, they continue charging rental fees despite my clear communication that I no longer need the service and won’t be paying further. Customer support is unresponsive, making it impossible to resolve issues. This is highly unprofessional and unethical. If a service is no longer required, deactivation should be smooth and hassle-free.

Looks like app is having many issues. Today my settlement amount not credited to bank account even though the transaction showing as successful. When I try raise a ticket, it's not even creating a ticket. Also not showing any details after giving transaction I'd. And there is no other option for contact. Worst support service.

Third class service provide by Paytm. I ordered a single sound box when I opened the account. I had received its delivery. After a few days two sound boxes started appearing inside the app. But I had only one sound box. Subsequently two sound box charges were deducted from my account. Related to this, I spoke to the company and did not get any kind of response from there. Then I asked to close the business app and from there told them that you have to pay charges for sound box lost.

customer service is very bad. they don't give any option for closing account. I am trying since 4-5 months for closing my paytm business account but no solution I found. they are just changing. My location has changed. I want to close account. close my paytm account immediately. don't charge unnecessarily otherwise I will report for this. I closed my shop that's why I want to close my paytm account.

Title: Worst Experience with Paytm Business! Paytm Business is a nightmare for merchants! They charge high fees on transactions and have hidden deductions. Customer support is non-existent—they don’t answer calls or emails. Trying to deactivate services? Forget it! They make the process impossible and continue deducting charges. Settlements are also delayed, causing cash flow issues.

Don't use paytm merchant. First they will send the soundbox without telling anything and then they will charge ₹59/month. They will not take it back even after trying multiple times. Their customer care is bizarre. Sometimes you don't get them via call and in the chat they reply out of context thing, without properly understanding what is written in the ticket or complaint. It's totally chaos. I would rare 0 star if possible.

Issues after recent update. Date and payment mismatches. When applied Filter it is not showing exact sum of amounts rather showing some random amounts which is causing lot of audit issues. Fix it asap or rollback the update.

I haven't applied for the soundbox, yet it was delivered and activated. For two months, I've been requesting deactivation, but haven't received a proper response. Instead, I'm being asked to raise a ticket on Paytm. After raising the ticket, I was told it would be closed, but the request has been open for 15 days, and I'm still being charged. This experience has led me to believe that this company engages in fraudulent practices...

No option provide 0 rating. Their customer support is very unprofessional, toll free number never reach to actual agent, i waited 61 mins in queue. Also, they deduct money without concent, add plan to my account without my concent and charging money for that. And after raising case with customer care, they called me but not deactivating the plan and convincing me for something else. They gave me mentle stress. I have all the call recordings and will file a legal complaint for the time they waste

I am giving Only one star because Negative star feedback option nahi hai ! This is the worst app I have ever seen in my life. This company is running at a loss, so they charge users for a soundbox, even when the customer does not have one—like me. Why has the company been deducting money from my account for the soundbox for the past three months, even after I have complained more than twice? The support service is extremely poor, making it the worst app for business payments due

description:
PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card & debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline & online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds & buy insurance plans on PhonePe. Get Car & Bike Insurance on our app.
Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment, investment, mutual funds, insurance & banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking.

Things you can do on PhonePe (Phonepay) App:

Money Transfer, UPI Payment, Bank Transfer
- Money Transfer with BHIM UPI
- Manage Multiple Bank Accounts– Check Account Balance, Save Beneficiaries across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks.

Make Online Payments
- Make online payment on various shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra etc.
- Pay for online food orders from Zomato, Swiggy etc.
- Pay for online grocery orders from Bigbasket, Grofers etc.
- Pay online for travel booking from Makemytrip, Goibibo etc.

Make Offline Payments
- Scan & Pay via QR Code at local stores like kirana, food, medicines etc.

Buy/Renew Insurance Policies with PhonePe Insurance App

Health & Term Life Insurance
- Compare/Buy Health & Term life Insurance with monthly premiums
- Coverage for individuals, senior citizens & families

Car & Two Wheeler Insurance
- Browse & get India’s most popular bike & car insurance
- Buy/renew your car & bike Insurance in less than 10 minutes

Other Insurance
- PA Insurance: Insure yourself against accidents & disablement
- Travel Insurance: Get international travel insurance for business & leisure trips
- Shop Insurance: Insure your shop against fire, theft, natural calamities and burglaries.

PhonePe Lending

Get pre-approved personal loans ready to be disbursed into your bank account through seamless & digital loan onboarding journey. Attractive interest rates, easy repayment options & single click self serve modules are some of the salient features being offered.

Repayment Period: 6 - 36 Months
Interest Rate: Max 30% (Reducing)

Example:
Principal Amount: ₹100,000
Interest Rate: 15% p.a. (Reducing)
Processing Fees: 2%
Tenure: 12 Months
Total interest amount payable: ₹8309.97
Total processing fee amount payable: ₹2000
Total cost to the user: ₹110,309.97

Mutual Funds & Investments App
- Liquid Funds: Get higher returns than savings bank 
- Tax-Saving Funds: save up to ₹46,800 in tax & grow your investment
- Super Funds: Achieve financial goals with expert help on our app 
- Equity Funds: High growth products curated as per risk appetite
- Debt Funds: Get stable returns for investments without any lock-in period
- Hybrid Funds: Get a balance of growth & stability 
- Buy or Sell 24K Pure Gold: Assured 24K purity, build gold savings on our app

Recharge Mobile, DTH
- Recharge Prepaid Mobile Numbers like Jio, Vodafone, Idea, Airtel etc.
- Recharge DTH like Tata Sky, Airtel Direct, Sun Direct, Videocon etc.

Bill Payment
- Pay Credit Card Bills
- Pay Landline Bills
- Pay Electricity Bills
- Pay Water Bills
- Pay Gas Bills
- Pay Broadband Bills

Buy PhonePe Gift Cards
- Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline & online outlets and across the PhonePe app.

Manage your refunds
- Manage & track refunds from your favorite shopping websites on PhonePe.
For more details, Visit www.phonepe.com

Permissions for App and reasons
SMS: to verify Phone number for registration
Location: a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions
Contacts: for phone numbers to send money to and numbers to recharge
Camera: to scan QR code
Storage: to store scanned QR code
Accounts: to pre-populate email ID while signing up
Call: to detect single vs dual sim & let user choose
Microphone: to carry out KYC video verification

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/py: The image is an advertisement for the PhonePe app. It shows a smartphone displaying the app interface with two people in the background. The text highlights that 50 crore Indians trust PhonePe for payments, and that the app has 500 million registered users.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/IG: The image is a promotional graphic for a mobile payment app. It showcases the app's bill payment and recharge features. The app allows users to pay bills instantly, including utilities like water and electricity. The image displays a phone screen showing the app interface, along with illustrations of people.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/2k: The image is an advertisement for buying 24K gold with 99.99% purity through the PhonePe app. It shows a woman holding a phone displaying the app's interface, which highlights features like "Gold Savings," "Buy 24K Gold with ease," and displays a price chart. The ad emphasizes the benefits of investing in gold through the app, such as high purity, buying and selling options, and insured storage. Gold coins are also present in the background for added context.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/J5: The image is a promotional graphic for an insurance app. The app allows users to get insurance in a few clicks. The image showcases different insurance options like vehicle insurance (bike and car), health insurance, and life insurance, as well as other insurance types like travel, accident, and super top-up. The graphic features a woman holding a child under an umbrella, presumably to represent the coverage offered by the app.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/p5: The image is an advertisement for a payment method using QR codes. It features a person walking with groceries, a smartphone with a QR code, and the text "Pay via QR at 3.7+ crore stores across India." The visual suggests a convenient and widely accepted payment option.

The recent Ul update is a complete disaster. I used to recommend PhonePe to everyone for its quick and user-friendly design, but now it's unrecognizable and frustrating to use. What was once a smooth, pleasant experience has turned into a confusing, cluttered mess. It's honestly heartbreaking as a loyal user to see such a drastic and needless change. If this doesn't get reverted or improved, I'll have to look for a new UPI app myself. Please bring back the old UI. :-(

PhonePe is a decent UPI payment app for quick money transfers, bill payments, and recharges. It has a simple interface and works with most banks. Sometimes, transactions take time to process, which can be frustrating. Cashback offers and rewards are nice but not always useful. Overall, it’s an okay app for digital payments.

The new UI is the sole reason I am not gonna use your app anymore, you haven't provided the option of dark mode and rolled out this new UI, also what's with such huge icons if I wanted to see huge icons then I can simply change the setting in my Phone, I don't need your app to do that for me. you have just made some common mistakes and I wish people don't adapt with this UI and you go back to the old interface cause this is just too complex.

"PhonePe's new UI is not user-friendly. The previous design was simple and easy to use, but now the new layout makes navigation a bit confusing. It takes more time to find basic options, and new users may find it difficult to adapt. The old UI was much better and more convenient. Please consider improving the user experience!"

I think Recently app UI got updated. New look and feel is very bad. New look is not at all intutive. Feels like they took 3 steps backwards. Additionally amount Text is looking grey on my mobile which is unreadable. I haven't changed anything on my mobile. Previous app version was looking lot better. I am not against improving stuff. But guys you have gone 3 steps back not forward. Thinking about switching to different app if previous UI not available.

I know I'm not the first person to give this feedback but the new UI is a disaster. I don't know what you did in the background and if it was a tech stack upgrade but it spoiled everything. Using the app without the dark mode is the most unpleasant experience. The previous version itself was amazing and we all got used to it very well. As a user I don't see a need for a new UI. You have tried to fix something that was not broken. Please bring back the old UI.

I have using this app for online payments from long time now. But the issue is that in the new update the UI has changed quite a lot and it doesn't even stand a chance against a previous UI. Why the hell do you people changed the user interface it was so good if you keep as it is. Hope you take this review in consideration and make the proper changes accordingly.

I’ve been using PhonePe for a long time and always liked its smooth experience. But after the recent update, the UI has changed a lot, and it doesn’t look as polished as before. It feels less user-friendly, and the new design is not as appealing. On top of that, dark mode is missing! It was a very useful feature, especially for reducing eye strain in low-light conditions. Many apps provide this, and PhonePe had it before, so why remove it?

I've been a long-term user of PhonePe and I really liked the User Interface compared to other UPI apps. But, the recent update has completely changed it and it seems unnecessary. Particularly, the dark mode is missing and the screen is too bright in my opinion, which strains our eyes. At least, keep it an option to switch between light and dark modes or to adapt to system appearance.

I absolutely hate the New UI update. I understood that you are trying to improve some navigations and decided to declutter the UI. But, you don't fix something that isn't broken. The prev UI was amazing. I and a lot of others are used to the Dark mode from the prev UI. If the dark mode wasn't ready for the new version, you should have waited another month or more, so that the transitions to the revamp was smoother for the users. Totally avoidable discomfort.

The recent UI update is a complete disaster. I used to recommend PhonePe to everyone for its quick, intuitive, and user-friendly design, but now it's unrecognizable and frustrating to use. What was once a smooth, pleasant experience has turned into a confusing, cluttered mess. It’s honestly heartbreaking as a loyal user to see such a drastic and needless change. If this doesn’t get reverted or improved, I’ll have to look for a new UPI app myself. Please bring back the old UI, or you’ll lose many

Unfortunately, the new design has made navigation quite inconvenient. Since PhonePe is used by both literate and illiterate users, sudden drastic changes can make it challenging for those who rely on symbols for navigation. Even as a regular user, I find it difficult to adapt. The previous UI was intuitive and user-friendly, but this update feels abrupt and less accessible. If usability doesn't improve, I might consider switching to alternatives like GPay, BHIM, or CRED.

The second update has arrived, and PhonePe has become even more professional and refined. Kudos to the team! However, some areas still need improvement. The loading animation and transitions when opening windows have noticeable bugs and occasional lag, affecting smooth user experience. Given the app’s growth, this is the perfect time to enhance the UI for a more seamless navigation. Looking forward to better updates. Keep up the great work!

While I understand that updates aim to improve user experience, I find the new interface to be more complex and frustrating to navigate . I kindly request you to consider reverting to the previous interface or providing an option to switch between the new and old layouts for users who prefer the simpler design. This would significantly enhance usability and maintain a seamless experience for long-time users like myself.

The updated UI is confusing. UPI Lite amount is barely visible with the small text. Key details, once at the top, are now moved to the bottom, while unimportant elements clutter the top. Where’s the black theme? 'Manage Payments' is placed lower, though it’s more useful than services like insurance. It’s frustrating to waste time searching for where everything is now.

PhonePe has one of the best UI and seamless services. However, when it comes to customer support, it’s a nightmare! My acc. was suddenly blocked and suspended without any explanation, and despite following all recommended steps, it remains unusable. past 4-5 months, I have been trying to reach customer care, but there's no proper support—with no real assistance. No live chat, no direct contact, just frustration. If you ever face an issue, don’t expect a quick resolution. Extremely disappointe😞

The latest update has introduced several critical issues. The app interface is now forced into a light color scheme, and the dark mode option is missing. Auto-payment management is also broken, as the feature is no longer visible, and the settings menu is inaccessible. This update has severely degraded the user experience. Please release a fix that restores the previous functionality and addresses these bugs.

The new UI update is a step backward. The lack of a dark theme is frustrating, especially for users who prefer it for better readability and battery efficiency. The old icon was much better and had a recognizable identity, but the new one feels bland and uninspired. The overall design changes make the app less appealing and harder to use. Please bring back the dark mode and the old icon! Don't give work again to this UI/UX designers.

I’m giving this app 1 star solely because of the recent UI update. It’s extremely confusing, hard to navigate, and makes basic tasks take longer. The interface needs a complete overhaul to make it more user-friendly and efficient. Please revert to the previous design or improve it significantly. I switched to super.money as my primary app to make payments.

I've been using PhonePe for more than seven years now and it's been my favourite. But ever since I accidentally closed my wallet while trying to withdraw the money, it's become less convenient. Wallet was the best part of PhonePe and it got even better after a full-KYC. I really found it very convenient to pay no matter how small the amount was without having to worry about those small transactions reflecting on my bank statement. Please provide us with an option to reactivate our closed wallet.

I kindly request the restoration of the previous user interface for the PhonePe application. I understand each user may have their own preferences, but I’ve grown accustomed to navigating the older interface effortlessly. The updated interface feels unfamiliar and, frankly, gives off a concerning vibe that suggests it might be fraudulent. Due to this unsettling experience, I am considering deleting my account, as it now seems that the software might have been hacked.

Best And Superfast App...But, not working properly from the last month. I can scan any barcode and make the payment through it. But, when opt for mobile transfer to any person, my keyboard does not pop up. Not at all. Please help, as I tried everything. I cleared its data, cache, and even unistalled & reinstalled the app. But, all in vain. I have not been able to understand the problem even after looking for it on google & Youtube.

My humble request to you PhonePe team, please bring back the old UI. Personally, I don't have problem with it. but my parents are not that much technical they are struggling now to find the mobile recharge option. They actually did it by themself in previous version just because it was simple and easy to find the option. But it became more complicated. we need to do 3-4 More extra steps. I quit other payment app just because phonepe was so easy to use. But now this update is worst.

The latest iteration of this app has proven to be the most frustrating payment application I have ever encountered. In previous versions, a standard internet connection sufficed for checking balances and processing transactions of up to 50,000. However, the current version fails to even launch, making it a tedious process to check balances and complete payments. Navigating through the app has become unnecessarily complicated. description:
The PhonePe Business App is your gateway to a digital payments acceptance network spanning 3.8 Crore merchants! You can set up your business account & accept payments, track transactions, receive settlements, apply for a loan & much more.

Once your account is activated, you can instantly download the payment QR sticker & start accepting digital payments at your store. You can also order free QR stickers & have them delivered to your store, across India.

Key Benefits of PhonePe Business App

Easy payment acceptance:
Use the PhonePe QR to accept payments from all BHIM UPI apps. The PhonePe QR also supports other payment modes like Credit & Debit Card & Wallets.

Get instant help:
Resolve queries using our user-friendly Chat Bot in the Help section. You can also reach out to our helpdesk on the PhonePe Business app.

Direct settlement into your bank account:
Money is transferred safely & directly into your bank account instantly or next morning. You can also use our ‘SettleNow’ feature to receive money in your bank account any time during the day.

Real-time transactions & payments tracking:
Check your transactions & settlements easily in the History section on the PhonePe Business app.

Get Instant Loan for Merchants:
The PhonePe Business app provides online loans to MSMEs. Get a loan on PhonePe & move a step closer to growing your business.

Merchant Loan Highlights:
- Attractive interest rates with up to 30 months tenure
- Instant digital loan with 0 paperwork
- Online loans from INR 50,000 to INR 5,00,000
- Easy repayment option with EDI - Easy Daily Installments
- EDIs deducted from daily transactions collected via customer payments on PhonePe
- 100% trustworthy loans, offered by RBI-regulated PhonePe lending partners authorized to offer credit products
- Multiple lenders & option to select the best offering at competitive interest rates
- Low processing fees & no other hidden charges
- Daily updates about your Loan on the PhonePe Business app
- Option to foreclose Loan any time 

Online Loan Eligibility:

The eligibility criteria for business loans for merchants are:
Accept payments on PhonePe QR for more than INR 15,000 per month
Be an active merchant, accepting payments on PhonePe QR for 3 months or more

*Merchant loans are offered at the discretion of our lending partners & the criteria above may change on a case-by-case basis

Documents required:
Details to be shared are as follows:
- Date of Birth
- PAN
- Aadhaar Number

*Business or Bank account details are NOT needed for loans up to INR 5 lakhs; may change as per our lender policies.

Steps to avail:
- Choose loan value & interest rate
- Enter details such as Date of Birth, PAN, & Aadhaar Number
- Click a selfie, & complete KYC digitally
- Set-up Auto-pay on your account

More about the loan offerings:
- Min. Tenure: 3 months
- Max. Tenure: 30 months
- Max. rate of interest charged: 30% flat p.a.

Example: For total cost of the Loan, including the principal amount & all applicable fees:
- Principal loan amount: Rs. 15,000
- Flat Interest Rate: 18% p.a.
- Processing Fees: 2%
- Tenure: 3 months
Then,
- Total interest amount payable: Rs. 675
- Total processing fee amount payable: Rs. 300
- Total cost to the user: Rs. 15,975

Our RBI registered NBFCs partners
- Innofin Solutions Pvt Ltd
- Aditya Birla Finance Limited
- PayU Finance India Private Limited

Upgrade customer payment experience at your store with PhonePe’s payment devices.

PhonePe POS Device:
Place an order for your POS Device on the app & accept payments via UPI, Debit & Credit Card, Wallet, & other modes. Pay nominal monthly rental & enjoy industry-leading MDR rates. Learn about charges on the App.

PhonePe Smart Speaker:
Order a SmartSpeaker on the app, install it at your store & get instant payment notifications in select regional languages. Surprise customers with payment alerts in the voice of celebrities.

description:
How do you make every single online transaction rewarding? Well, that's exactly what we built POP for. Every part of our UPI and credit card app is designed to reward – from earning 2% POPcoins on everyday UPI transactions to getting 10% back on online shopping with our RuPay credit card – you earn POPcoins on every payment, guaranteed.

Welcome to POP, where every payment pays you back.

We are not just another online payment app, we aim to be a one-stop destination for all payments and shopping needs of young India. 

Why juggle multiple apps when everything you need is right here? Make secure online UPI payments and earn 2% POPcoins, and put those POPcoins into good use at the POPshop where you get 500+ brands at extra discounts (1 POPcoin = ₹1, always!), or level up your rewards with the YES BANK POP-CLUB Credit Card – India's most rewarding RuPay card that gives you 10% POPcoins back on every online transaction. 

From earning rewards to saving extra on shopping, we've got you covered all in one place.

What can you get at POP?

⚡ Super Quick UPI Payment Experience
- Say goodbye to UPI app payment-lagging anxiety and make fast payments with POP, your most rewarding UPI app
- Create your unique UPI ID, as unique as you
- Scan and pay at lightning-fast speed - no more awkward eye-contact with vendors while your payment processes

💳 YES BANK POP-CLUB Credit Card
💳 YES BANK POP-CLUB Credit Card: India's most rewarding RuPay credit card has an exclusive partnership with YES BANK
- Earn massive 10% back in POPcoins as credit card rewards on every online transaction
- Seamless payments with tap, swipe, or click using your RuPay credit card
- Zero joining fee with ₹5000 worth of welcome benefits

🎯 Daily UPI Rewards with POPcoins
- On. Every. Single. Transaction. You heard it right!
- Earn 2% POPcoins as UPI cashback on all your UPI payments
- Use POPcoins across fashion, healthcare, skincare, electronics, and more
- 1 POPcoin = ₹1, always!

🛍️ Shop and Earn at POPshop - Your Rewards Destination
Redeem POPcoins at 500+ D2C brands
Explore products under ₹999, ₹499, and even under ₹99!
Try before you buy with POPminis - sample-sized products at amazing prices
Daily refreshed deals with 30-80% savings

Why Choose POP?
→ Send money and get 2% POPcoins on every online payment. Not sometimes, not maybe – every single time! (that's the beauty of being designed to reward)
→ With our RuPay credit card, earn cashback on UPI in the form of POPcoins: Earn 10 POPcoins per ₹100 on your online spends, 2 POPcoins per ₹100 for offline spends. Simple, like all things should be.
→ Zero joining fees for both UPI payments and credit card 
→ The YES BANK POP-CLUB UPI Credit Card welcomes you with ₹5K worth vouchers you'll actually use (no random vouchers that expire tomorrow!)
→ Do quick payments with UPI money transfer on POP and save your time
→ 500+ D2C brands that young India actually shops from - fashion, lifestyle, travel, electronics - you name it! Each purchase = more POPcoins in your pocket
→ More bang for your buck: use POPcoins at POPshop for valuable extra discounts (psst... 1 POPcoin = ₹1, always!)
→ Fresh deals that'll make you go 👀 every 24 hours (including stuff under ₹99!)
→ Skip the seasonal sale FOMO - we've got 60% - 80% off running all year round!

Looking for online payment apps that actually reward you? Download POP, India's most rewarding UPI payment platform and credit card app. No random luck, no useless cashback – just real, valuable rewards on every transaction.

For more details about POP’s online payment apps and features, visit popclub.co

Frequently Asked Questions
Q: How long are POPcoins valid?
 POPcoins are valid for 365 days (1 year) from the date of credit. 

Q: Can I transfer POPcoins to another account?
 No, POPcoins cannot be transferred between accounts.

Q: Where can I check my POPcoins balance?
Check your POPcoins balance in the POP UPI app by clicking the coins section at the top right corner of the app

The rise of digital payments has brought several innovations, and Pop-Up UPI is one of the latest features aimed at making transactions faster and more seamless. This service allows businesses and individuals to generate quick, temporary UPI payment options, making it useful for events, pop-up stores, and one-time transactions

If frustration, disappointment, and getting robbed had an app, this would be it. description:
Ram Fincorp Personal Loan  offers tension-free, easy, and instant personal loans right at your fingertips. Not only do we provide you with the fastest disbursal ever possible but also low-interest rates. The loan will be credited to your bank account through us, your trusted NBFC in around 30 minutes!

We are a RBI registered NBFC committed to offering personal credits to salaried professionals. We stand for catering to your individual financing needs in an easy way by including innovation to the credit buying handle, in this manner giving you moment get to reserves in a straightforward and straightforward way.

We provide loans that are available at affordable interest rates due to a minimal risk profile. Moreover, at Ram Fincorp Personal Loan we pride ourselves on providing the lowest interest rates to our borrowers. We ensure that our borrowers are not facing any unnecessary financial burden due to hefty interest rates.
Banking is experiencing a wave of digitization across the world. However, often some banking products such as personal loans require physical interactions. At Ram Fincorp Personal Loan, we have developed a full-stack solution to digitize the entire personal loan process. Now you don't have to wait in line to avail of a personal loan!
Our mission is simple: we want to build a one-of-kind, effortless loan buying platform that allows customers to get a loan easily and affordably. We strive hard to make our customer’s life easier by providing them quick access to money in a simple way.

LOAN MODEL

Ram Fincorp Personal Loan provides personal loans ranging from INR 5,000 to INR 2,00,000 based on your
requirement
Loan Amount: - 5,000 to 2,00,000
Interest Rate: - Up to 36% per annum
APR: 36% MAX
Age: - 21 to 55 years
APR 36 % Max.
Late payment fee - as applicable (Charged only, if repayment is delayed)
Processing Fee: - Up to 5%
Loan tenure: - 90 days to 365 days
Pre-closure charges – As applicable

Sample Loan Calculation

Loan amount: ₹ 30,000 at interest rate of 30% p.a.
Loan Duration: 3 Months
Total personal loan interest = ₹ 2,250
Processing fees (PF) + GST = ₹ 500 + ₹ 90 = ₹ 590
Total Deductibles (PF + GST): ₹ 590
In-Hand Amount: Loan Amount - Total Deductibles = ₹ 30,000 - 590 = ₹ 29,410
Total repayable Amount (Loan Amount + Interest): ₹ 32,250
Monthly EMI Repayable (Loan Amount + Interest / No of EMI's): ₹ 10,750
PF + GST are deducted upfront during the loan disbursal.

Advantages Of Ram Fincorp Personal Loan
● Customised Personal Loan
● Secure Data System
● Instant Approval And Disbursal
● Transparent Process
● Flexible Repayment Options
● Minimum Documentation

Eligibility/Document Required
● Individuals with a minimum monthly income of Rs. 30,000.
● Indian residents/citizens who are 21 years and above
● To apply for the loan applicants would need pan cards, aadhar cards, salary slips (for the
last 3 months), salary account bank statement (3/6 months) and address proof.

Security And Privacy Policy
To guarantee the security of the information shared by our clients, we have a highly secure
and encrypted system. To read our privacy policy click here:
https://www.ramfincorp.com/privacypolicy

Terms & Conditions
Ram Fincorp Personal Loan is a unit of R.K. Bansal Finance Private Limited (NBFC), which is registered with 
the RBI. Visit :- https://www.ramfincorp.com/conditions

Contact Information
● Contact Number:- +919899985495
● Official Mail ID:- info@ramfincorp.com
● Official Website:- https://ramfincorp.com/
● Registered & Corporate Office Address:- 4338, Padam Singh Road, Karol Bagh
New Delhi - 110005

Beyond expectations. Beyond limits.

## Testimonials on Google Play Store

![](https://www.ramfincorp.com/images/avatar.png)

##### Harmandeep Hayer

###### A good app for people with bad credit

Truly a blessing for people with bad credit score but a good intention to pay the funds in time. Helped resolve my much needed financial crisis. Although the Interest rate is a bit on the higher side but that's the price to pay for having a bad credit score. Thank you Ram Fincorp. I will keep editing this review with further updates.

![](https://www.ramfincorp.com/images/avatar.png)

description:
Build your credit score to 750+. Join over 5 Million Indians building their credit score with GoodScore. Check your credit score, get a detailed credit report and expert advice to build your credit score.

Get access to your detailed credit report and a complete account by account analysis of your credit profile from our team. This analysis will be given to you in the form of a detailed video & step-by-step plan – where we will provide important tips and suggestions to help you achieve your ideal credit score.

GoodScore’s credit score is powered by Experian and CRIF High Mark - 2 of the 4 credit bureaus authorized by RBI.

How does GoodScore work?

The information on your credit report summarizes how you manage credit, including payment history, credit accounts, outstanding balances, defaults, credit utilization, credit mix and loan enquiries – all of which are important factors that impact your credit score.

We analyze all your active and closed credit accounts for payment patterns and credit behaviour and offer personalized guidance to help you make the right decisions as you work towards achieving your desired credit score.

GoodScore helps you understand the factors that affect your CRIF and Experian credit scores and gives you a personalized video recording on how to manage your credit.

Our credit score builder service includes the following:
✅Monthly tracking of your credit score and detailed report
✅Identifying areas which are affecting your credit score
✅Tips on how to manage your credit score
✅Monthly review of financial decisions and steps taken

Check your credit score:
You can check your Experian and CRIF High Mark Credit Score any time on the app. Experian and CRIF High Mark are among the four major Credit information companies in India.

We’re also working towards onboarding the other 2 credit bureaus namely CIBIL & Equifax through which you can check your CIBIL score soon. We’ll update you as soon as these credit bureaus are available on the app.

Benefits of using GoodScore:
Your credit health will always be in your control with GoodScore:
✅Check your credit score and credit report on the go
✅Get personalized insights through a detailed video
✅Keep track of all your loan and credit accounts under one tab
✅Set reminders for bill payments & EMIs

When you have a good CIBIL score, you’ll become eligible to get loans & credit cards from India’s top banks like HDFC Bank, SBI, Bank of Baroda, PNB, ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, IDFC First Bank, IndusInd Bank, Bandhan Bank, RBL Bank, Federal Bank, etc.

Are CRIF and Experian credit scores different from CIBIL?

CRIF, Experian and CIBIL are different platforms owned by different credit information companies. However, all 3 companies are approved by the Reserve Bank of India.

The parameters chosen by CIBIL TransUnion, Experian & CRIF High Mark are majorly similar. All 3 companies have a similar mechanism to calculate the credit score. They use repayment history, credit mix, new credit and outstanding debt to make the credit report.

Having a good credit history in CIBIL will have somewhat similar results with CRIF High Mark and Experian as well.

[Important Note: Goodscore DOES NOT provide any credit repair service. The information provided in the app is for educational purposes and is only a personalized guidance based on a customer's credit report]

App permissions and reasons: We need SMS permissions for transactional messages only. This permission is taken to help users keep track of their bills & loan payments and provide timely reminders. None of the information is shared with any third party or institution. We have a highly secured & encrypted system to ensure the safety of information shared by our users.

Contact us
Phone number: 080-69819392
WhatsApp: +91-7619697249
Email: goodscore@rupicard.com
Address: 57/4, Vajram Esteva, 2nd Floor, Marathahalli-Sarjapur Outer Ring Road, ORR, Devarabisanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103

description:
Yono Lite SBI is Mobile Banking Smart Phone application for SBI Customers in English, Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Bengali, Odia, Assamese, and Kashmiri languages. 

Yono Lite is SBI’s retail internet banking-based application for your smartphones. A safe, convenient, and easy to use application with a host of features to help users manage your finances on the move. 

Please complete the one-time registration process to start using the application. 

New Registration process: 

- A message will be shown on the screen regarding initiating an SMS to +917208871299 from the mobile device for validating user's mobile number. Users has to send this app generated encrypted SMS manually. Users have an option to retry sending SMS to an alternate number 8422833333. 

- Click on ‘Proceed’ button and an SMS containing a unique code will be sent from the device to a predefined number. Kindly note that for sending SMS will incur standard SMS charges as per your telecom SMS plan. 

- On registration screen, please enter Username and Password and click REGISTER button. 

- Accept the Terms & Conditions for registration by selecting the check box and click ‘Ok’ button. 

- An activation code will be sent to the registered mobile number. User has to complete the activation by inputting the Activation code in the app. 

- User can now login to Yono Lite application. 

Features: 

 
My Accounts 

•	Detailed account information (Transaction / Deposit /Loan / PPF / SSA accounts) 
•	Mini Statement (Last 10 transactions) 
•	mPassbook (upto 150 transactions) 
•	View /Download statement 
•	eStatement Subscription 
•	PPF Accounts 

Fund Transfer 

•	Funds Transfer within Self Accounts 
•	Third Party Transfer within SBI 
•	Inter-Bank Transfer (RTGS / NEFT /IMPS) 
•	Quick Transfer to Unregistered Beneficiaries using QR Code 
•	IMPS Transfer (using IFSC & Account Number or Mobile Number & MMID) 
•	Transfer to mobile number or email id using mCash 
•	Schedule Transactions

The decision to disable the app for Android versions below 12 is disappointing and non-customer-friendly. It seems like a quick fix rather than addressing potential security concerns at the server end. The app's security should primarily be managed on the server side, ensuring that users on older Android versions can still access their accounts securely. Forcing customers to upgrade their devices is a frustrating inconvenience, especially when there are better, more inclusive ways to improve.

websiteContent: ### 400 Response Code

description:
YONO SBI lets you Bank, Shop, Travel, Pay Bills, Recharge, Invest, avail IRCTC ticket booking, use UPI to transfer money, book movie tickets. With YONO SBI, convenience has a new name. 

Download YONO SBI, our mobile banking and lifestyle application from Google Play Store Only and experience its best-in-class features. Do not use any other websites. 
 
Registration process: 

YONO is supported on Android 11 and above from 01-01-2025.
Please read the OS version as "11 and above" in What's new content as well as under details in "Required OS" field at "More Info" and "Compatibility for your active devices". 
The OS version under these sections will be updated 11 and above shortly.
 
•Install/update new version of App from Play Store and open. 
•Allow all required permission (location, make/ manage phone calls). 
•Select SIM of CBS Registered Mobile Number (RMN) and allow for SMS permission and submit NEXT 
•An encrypted SMS with a unique code will be sent from the device to Bank’s VMN (Virtual Mobile Number) to verify the customer. Kindly note that for sending the SMS standard SMS charges are applicable as per your telecom plan. The SIM should have active outgoing SMS facility. In some devices, the user may have to allow sending the SMS from the outbox.  
•If there are multiple CIF's attached with same mobile number, system will prompt for the account number and DOB for finding out a unique customer by the mobile number. 
•If the customer is already having online banking facility of SBI, App will automatically prompt to proceed to register on YONO SBI app with existing user credentials (Online Banking User ID and Password). After entering User ID and Password, customer will receive an OTP on Registered Mobile Number. User has to enter the OTP in the app to complete registration with an optional setting of MPIN. 
•If the existing SBI customer is not having Online banking credentials, App will prompt to proceed to create INB credential using "Account Details" and "ATM Card" based registration process.  
•If Non RMN SIM is selected, user will land on account opening screen. If customer claims that selected SIM is already registered with bank, user needs to visit nearest branch with KYC for validating the mobile number in bank account. 
 
What YONO SBI offers you 
 
YONO SBI, SBI's latest mobile banking offering is an extension of our trusted banking legacy which gave India secure digital products such as YONO Lite and SBI Net Banking. YONO SBI puts India's largest range of products and services at your fingertips. 
 
•India's largest shopping marketplace -Exclusive discounts and offers for SBI customers across merchants who offer shopping, vacation bookings, flight and bus ticket bookings, train ticket bookings through IRCTC, food delivery and much more 
 
•Quick Transfer-Immediate fund transfer to new beneficiary up to Rs.50,000/- per day 
 
•One view- Link and view your relationships with all State Bank entities (Credit Cards, Life Insurance, General Insurance, Travel Insurance, Accident Insurance, SIP, Mutual Funds or investments) in one app 
 
•Your friend in need-Get Pre-approved personal loans on the go within 2 minutes, with no documentation at branches. 
 
•Liquidity on the go-Use this one click facility to avail overdraft against Fixed Deposit 

•Experience convenience: Request Cheque Books, ATM Cards/Debit Cards or use the emergency services to change ATM PIN, block ATM cards/Debit cards or stop cheques, through YONO SBI

Other pre log in features: 
• ATM/Branch Locator 
• Forgot MPIN? - To reset Login MPIN 
• View Balance - View account balance & recent transactions 
• Quick Pay - Make quick & simple payments.  
• YONO Cash- Cardless Cash Withdrawal 
•Loans - Apply for Home, Car, Education & Personal Loans 
•Investments - Open Investment account and make investments 
•Best Offers - Best Online Shopping offers 
•Lock App - To lock app access  
•T&C-Terms & Conditions 
•Privacy Policy 
•Helpline - Call on Helpline No.

YONO SBI app is full of issues. First, the internet bug is frustrating—it often fails to connect even with a stable internet connection. Second, the processing speed is painfully slow, making simple tasks take forever. Apart from these, there are many other bugs that make the experience even worse. Also, the app lacks proper security features. Please add an option to unlock the app using mobile fingerprint or lock screen for better convenience and safety.The app really needs an urgent update

There is no autopay feature for credit card bills from savings account. They have two passwords for more security. while the entire world has a mpin, one password and an otp, they like to be different and have one more password. A profile password and an internet banking password. once you change either of them, the app refuses to accept the new password. The only solution is to delete the cache and data, re-register for internet banking on the yono app. This needs to improve as it's not smart.

I'd given a low rating (of 1 star) feedback about 2 years ago. since then there have been multiple revisions of the app, and it has improved a lot. my main problem with repeat login failures has been fixed. so I've revised the rating now. happy with the app. one suggestion. it would be useful if the app allows authentication via fingerprint on those mobile devices where it is available.

Now, if I want to continue using the app, I am left with no choice but to purchase a new smartphone that supports the latest Android versions. This situation places a

So your reason for this issue is not valid. Also in case you don't allow older version of Android, then display proper message rather than displaying Unable to process, please try after some time.

Suddenly having issues with Android version. Application owners must think if upgrade will be possible by all users or not. Even though it's for security upgrade, not users can afford to buy a new phone just because we are not able to update the android version for yono. Kindly provide a patch for the older version and help improve customer experience with the older android version.

👎 I’ve been using this app for a long time, and it was great—until the developers decided to drop support for older Android versions. Not everyone can afford to buy a new phone just to keep using a single app. Many of us still have perfectly working devices, and it’s frustrating to be forced out simply because of an arbitrary update. This is incredibly disappointing and shows a lack of consideration for regular users who don’t upgrade their phones every now and then.

It was a nice app with smooth interface,easy to navigate and provided a lot of options but the recent update jas prompted users to upgrade their Android versions. I hope the developers can understand that not everyone can afford to buy a new phone or a phone with 4-5 years security patch every 4-5 years. I hope there can be a simpler version for such Android users who are unable to use it due to lack of their recommended Android UI.

Extremely disappointed with the latest update! You've suddenly made the app incompatible with Android versions below 12, leaving long-time users like me high and dry. This move reeks of planned obsolescence, forcing users to upgrade to newer phones. The security excuse doesn't hold water, as the app worked perfectly fine on Android 9 and above before. Come on, SBI! Make the app available for at least Android 9 and above. This decision seems more like a ploy to push sales of newer phones.

description:
UPI payments, Bill Payments, Recharges, Loans, Fixed Deposit, Insurance & more
Shriram One is your trusted financial partner for everyday needs. Explore our comprehensive suite of services, including:
• Investments – Fixed Deposit, Fixed Investment Plan 
• Loans – Personal, Business, Two & Four wheelers, Used Car, Commercial Vehicles and Gold Loans
• Insurance – General - Two Wheeler & Four wheeler Insurance; Life Insurance – Savings, Retirement, Child & Protection Plans
• Bill Payments – Make Prepaid Mobile Recharge, pay Electricity bill and other utility bill payments on Shriram One
• UPI – Scan & Pay any QR, Send or receive money via UPI, Split Expenses and more
• Shriram One Exclusive – Discover exclusive offerings like Digital Gold, Shriram One Care and more
• Other Offerings – Access 10+ financial calculators, view vehicle info, popular services – book travel tickets, hotels, check cricket score, play games and more

Investments
Our investments are tailored to meet your needs, they offer attractive interest rates, flexible tenures with a high degree of safety
• Shriram Fixed Deposit: Invest in Shriram Unnati Fixed Deposit for steady savings, growth and generate inflation-beating returns. Maximise your savings with Shriram Finance high-yielding Fixed Deposit. Invest and earn interest rate up to 9.40%* p.a. (inclusive of 0.50% for Senior Citizens and 0.10% for Women Depositors)
• Fixed Investment Plan: Easily start your FIP by investing just ₹1,000 per month
• Digital Gold: Invest in the timeless value of gold with Digital Gold. Buy, sell, or hold gold digitally & securely

Secure UPI Payments
Shriram One UPI enables you to scan any QR to send/receive money instantly to anyone. check a/c balance, set autopay, track your UPI expenses and transaction history, request money and more.

Bill Payments and Recharges
Recharge your mobile (Prepaid and postpaid), DTH, Landline, FASTag recharge, loan repayment, Insurance, credit card bill payment, broadband, cable TV, water & electricity bills

Loans
We offer customized loan solutions. Obtain a personal loan to support your dreams or get a business loan to fuel your entrepreneurial ambitions.
• Personal loan: Apply for personal loan up to ₹15 lakhs. We offer flexible repayment options (12 to 60 months), with no collateral at competitive interest rates (11%* to 36%* APR). 

Example
Loan Amount of ₹1,00,000 for 24 months may have an interest rate of 12% p.a. (1% p.m. for 24 months - interest rate calculated on reducing balance method) with EMI ₹4,707, the total interest payable would be ₹4,707 x 24 months - ₹1,00,000 = ₹12,968
The processing fees (excl. GST) is ₹2,000 and the disbursed amount - ₹1,00,000 - ₹2,000 = ₹98,000
Total Amount Payable: ₹4,707 x 24 months = ₹1,12,968
Total Cost of Loan = Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹12,968 + ₹2,000 = ₹14,968
The total amount payable will be ₹1,14,968 (incl. Processing Fee).

*Note: These numbers are indicative. Final interest rate & APR will depend on the customer’s creditworthiness and assessment

•	Two-Wheeler Loan: Get your dream two-wheeler with ease. Apply for a two-wheeler loan, enjoy flexible repayment options and competitive interest rates.
•	Business loan: Grow your business with a Shriram Business Loan.
•	Commercial Vehicle Loans: Get financing for your transport business and grow your fleet.
•	Used Car Loan: Get instant loan up to 85% of your vehicle's value, from ₹1 lakh upwards.
•	Gold Loan: Get fast and easy access to cash by pledging your gold with us.

Insurance
We offer a range of insurance products. Our offerings in general insurance encompasses motor insurance - Two-wheeler, Four-Wheeler, Commercial Vehicle Insurance and more. We also offer a broad range of life insurance products such as savings plans, Child plans, Protection and retirement plans.

description:
Introducing the enhanced HDFC Bank MobileBanking App, your one-stop solution to a seamless and secure banking experience. Experience the convenience of doing 150+ transactions through our MobileBanking app. Download now for effortless banking, fund transfers, card management, loans, investments, and many more. 

 🔒 Instant Access: 
Experience hassle-free logins via biometric options and a 4-digit login PIN, ensuring the security of your accounts.

 💸 Effortless Transactions: 
Make quick transfers using UPI, ensuring real-time fund transfer. Safeguard your account with the ability to block debit services against fraud. 

🔢 Banking Simplified: 
Get a consolidated view of your account balances, fixed/recurring deposits, credit card bills, and utility bills—all in one dashboard. 

🏦 Deposits Made Easy: 
Book FDs and RDs effortlessly with just a tap, providing a smart way to save money anytime, anywhere. 

💳 Manage Cards Seamlessly: 
Easily apply for credit cards, pay bills, manage cards limits, including blocking or hotlisting lost or stolen cards—all conveniently accessible from one place.

📈 Investment Tracking: 
Track & manage your investments, demat account and effortlessly engage in mutual funds transactions.

📱 Bill Payments On-the-Go: 
Pay utility bills, DTH, electricity, gas and mobile bills instantly. Set up automated monthly payments for added convenience. 

🔄 Quick Money Transfers: 
Transfer funds effortlessly between HDFC Bank accounts or other accounts via IMPS, UPI, NEFT and various payment methods. 

🔒Security Enhancements: 
Your financial security is our top priority. We are continually enhancing the security features for the safety of your account and transactions. With Device Registration for login from a single trusted device and RASP (Runtime Application Security Protection), we protect you from frauds involving remote control apps, data leakage, and screen mirroring.

We have an enhanced layer of security known as Mobile Number Verification. This feature ensures access to your MobileBanking App only through devices with the SIM card of your bank-registered mobile number, significantly boosting protection against cyber fraud and enhancing your account's security.

Please Note, you need to -  
• Ensure the SIM card of your bank-registered mobile number is in your Mobile device. 
• Maintain an active SMS subscription for mobile number verification. 
• Have your Debit Card details or NetBanking password ready for one-time verification.

👥 Smart Features: 
• One Touch Share: Share payment receipts effortlessly. 
• Set Up Favorites: Simplify frequent transactions by setting up favorites.
• EVA ChatBot Support: Chat with EVA for instant query resolution—accepts both text and voice inputs. 

📌 Additional Services: 
Download e-TDS certificates, Apply for Loans, Recharge & Buy FAS Tag, Savings Accounts, Credit Cards, Buy Insurance & Forex Cards. 

📥 Download Now & #BankTheWayYouLive: 
Continuous app updates and upgrades ensure you have the latest features.

🔗 Important Disclosures: 
By downloading the HDFC Bank MobileBanking App: 
*you consent to the installation of this app and its future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting the app from your device, 
*you are agreeing and providing consent to have read and understood the privacy notice of HDFC Bank. To know more about the privacy notice, please click here. 
https://www.hdfcbank.com/aboutus/terms_conditions/privacy.htm

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/rx: The image is a promotional graphic for HDFC Bank, advertising the ability to open a "Smart Savings Account" from anywhere. It shows a mock-up of a smartphone screen displaying the account opening process. The screen prompts the user to enter their Aadhaar-linked mobile number and date of birth. The call to action is to "Get OTP."
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/iV: The image is a promotional graphic for the HDFC Bank mobile app. It showcases the login screen with options for fingerprint, 4-digit PIN, and password. The text emphasizes the app's security features, highlighting mobile number verification, biometrics, and PIN. The app's name, "HDFC Bank Now," is also visible.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/nZ: The image is an advertisement for booking Fixed Deposits (FDs) and Recurring Deposits (RDs) easily. It features a phone screen displaying an app interface. The interface shows information about fixed deposits, including an overview of the principal amount and options to view interest rates, open deposits, and other related actions.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/bu: The image appears to be a promotional graphic for a mobile banking app. It showcases the UPI (Unified Payments Interface) feature, highlighting options like sending money, requesting money, scanning & paying, and splitting bills. The text "Scan & Pay, Send Money and Block Debit on the go." reinforces the app's convenience and functionality. The phone screen displays a HDFC bank UPI interface.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/Ms: The image is a mobile phone screen displaying information about a SmartEMI application. It shows that the user has successfully applied for SmartEMI, along with details like the card type, reference number, loan number, loan amount, tenure, rate, and monthly installment. The screen also provides options to download a repayment schedule, mark the process as "Done," or go to an overview. The overall theme suggests a financial application or banking service.

The app has been very annoying for me. It randomly pops up "we will now verify your sim linked to bank" when I don't even change the sim and has been very inconvenient for me who is living abroad and is unable to send SMS. It stops me from doing my transactions and I have to go out of my way to operate netbanking on browser.

In a nut shell, the app is deteriorating down to ad-hoarding-board. Toooo many pop-ups. Why?? Your customers use this to perform transactions not to opt for your new offering. Even after clicking "Dont show this again", the pop comes back in few seconds. Some pop-up are so annoying that no matter where you click it takes you to " Apply Now" page (outside of the app. Please stop so many pop ups before your consumers start looking for other financial services/banks.

After a recent upgrade. It is so frustrating to navigate the App. There is an Ad pop up at every stage. You should stop this. It is very like Spam Ad in my domain. Making a transaction is a pain. You have to keep closing an Ad at every step. Literally at each and every stEp. Why is the bank so desperate to push it's products . TRust ME to approach hdfcbank for any other financial assistance. STOP THIS AD POP UP. SEE RESPONSE FROM BANK. A TEMPLATE ANSWER. SO EASY TO UNDERSTAND THE ISSUE HERE

Keeps throwing error that you are in a low network area. The app oddly disconnects phone from wifi and then throws this error. If I try to log in immediately after this error then it shows that last session ended incorrectly and asks to wait for few minutes. Not sure how this bug made its way into production version of this app. Shows that barely any testing was done before releasing it.

No change made yet. Nightmare to use. I'd like to give zero stars. The net banking app looks cheap now, with repetitive notifications that no one wants to see - i waste time deleting them from the app inbox. We come to the app for specific transactions, not to have popups on personal loan and other spam. We don't want you to remind us that you give loans. We'll ask you if we need one. For now, just give me a smooth, clean transaction experience with no spam notifications and popups.

Not happy with the App. Always shifts to landscape mode by default in my One plus pad. In some cases the App does not open. The 4 digit pin is not working and not sure how to change it. So using password. The My card app is better. Also unnecessary pop ups keeps disturbing. I am using other banking apps. They are far better.

Dear HDFC, I have been using this app for a long time. However, I never feel such uncomfortable and frustrated due to your endless promotional pop ups. is this banking app or any third class random website. for every click there will be a promotional pop up. I don't understand why a reputed bank like hdfc gives such poor customer experience instead providing a secure n safe UI environment.

Kindly show available balance on every transaction on email and SMS sent. This method is used by many banks. But, in HDFC banking, it's missing. Hope it will be implemented asap. Also, on login mobile banking appl., unwanted advertisement and promotion appears. Kindly remove those for smooth and prompt banking. Thanks

Not an HDFC but an Ad posting app. right from login there is ad for every single click. the close button is also not shown and they just need you to somehow click the ad and show unwanted pop ups and schemes. it's such a troublesome to use the app. account holders are left with no choice but to use and tolerate this frustrating ad pop ups and non sense. its a pain to use the hdfc mobile app

Have you seen reviews where so many users complaining about popup and ads. Have you done anything about it or just copy paste a response? Come on guys. Please look in to this matter. This is a very series matter. Every click opens up a popup. I will not send any email to any one. Please check this issue

Congratulations to the developers . They have successfully managed to lock me out of the app. Since the new update, the app requires to verify the mobile no. nd I wasted few days trying to get verified. The app sends some SMS in the background nd all I see is a screen that waits for 30 secs for confirmation nd then it fails every single time. I already complain 3-4 time on email but no solution I send them all screenshot of proof of sim balance and app error but no solution very bad experience

App crashes everytime I open it. Tried installing twice but it doesn't work after opening only once. Also, I'm not receiving any sms updates of amount being credited. It's a hassle to check bank statements everytime. Plewse fix it. It's getting on my nerves and finding it really annoying.

Pathetic user experience. I am writing this just to let you know that even the developers are working hard to make this app user friendly and easy to use. Your annoying and repeating ad has made it difficult to navigate. Each step one pop up of new offerings. Useless strategies to showcase offerings. I have told few of my friends who were thinking to opt HDFC account for their corporate to not join due to this bad user experience they have to go through all the time whenever they open the app

I am facing the strange issue. App suddenly stops working and the only thing I need to do is uninstall and reinstall the app again, then it works, that too for few days and the same thing happens few days after installation and I have to repeat the same process again. I am using Nothing Phone 1.

Pathetic app. Doesn't let me open the app. I once enabled developer option which now disabled but due to this it is not letting me access the app. The app should always scan whether developer option disabled or not. Always saying your phone is rooted/usb debugging enabled which is not in my case.

Worst banking app with loads of pop ups. At every click, you will get a promotional pop up which destroys the banking experience. Even if I comment, I may get feedback back asking me to mail to their support. They cannot act on multiple complaints raised on their app review feedback.

am writing to formally escalate an issue regarding the Regalia Gold credit card upgrade that was initially offered to me by HDFC Bank. I was provided an offer for a free upgrade to the Regalia Gold card, but due to some reason, I could not complete the transaction at that time. However, when I recently contacted my Relationship Manager (RM) regarding the same, I was informed over the call that the free upgrade is no longer available to me. This is highly disappointing, as I was never informed

Why NRIs have to pay for international SMS charges in name of sim verification, often??? Is it your new business along with telcos????? Feedback: much stable and lesser missing features than previous versions. Still, for better UI/UX experience, please check axis bank and idfc bank apps, it will give you more unique ideas for many improvements.

I have been using this application for many years, but since some time this app has stopped working automatically, I have uninstalled and installed the application 3 to 4 times, After reinstalling the app, it opens for some time but then stops opening again.

Third class app. it's annoying to just pushing so much popup offers ad in app. This app is personal net banking not to show so much offers. one can't use app for purpose. There is also no option for opt out of it.

11 days ago I redeemed a unipin e voucher from my reward points gained by hdfc credit card but they haven't delivered the voucher yet. I mailed them asking about the same but didn't get it yet. This is very disappointing and not expected from HDFC. Worst experience ever!!

I've been using this app for few years now. It is simple, good and easy to use. Safe too. But since the past few weeks the app sometimes takes too long to open and works real slow. It is especially annoying when you're trying to make a UPI payment at an outlet. Add to that, there are always ads covering most of the app which some times pop up and makes you click on it and then opens the browser! It is really bad that a banking app does this. Hope you realise this and remove these ads. Thank you.

I've been using this app for its convenience, but recently it's been bombarded with excessive pop-up ads, disrupting transactions and causing accidental clicks. This leads to errors and wasted time, making it difficult to use for daily operations. It's especially challenging for elderly users or those less tech-savvy. I hope the developers reconsider the ad strategy to restore the app's original user-friendly experience and avoid these interruptions.

After the recent updates, facing issues while opening the App. The first time it opened successfully and then I registered but after sometime when I was trying to open the app it took some time to open but failed. Tried multiple times, cleared cache , cleared the associated archived file, did everything but the results are the same. I had to install it again. Then again after a couple of days, same issue occurring.

Using your mobile banking app feels like being stuck in a never-ending sales pitch! The constant bombardment of ads and promotional messages is not only annoying, but it's also ruining the otherwise seamless banking experience. I signed up for banking, not an ad marathon. Let's dial down the promotions and focus on delivering a smooth, ad-free user experience.

description:
Download the Stashfin app today and unlock your financial superpower!

Experience the convenience of instant paperless loans at competitive interest rates with Stashfin Personal Loans of up to ₹5,00,000. Grow your wealth by investing in Corporate Bonds, safeguard yourself against digital fraud with comprehensive insurance, and enjoy exclusive deals and rewards from top brands.

1) Stashfin Personal Loan and Credit Line:
Get Instant Personal Loan up to ₹5 lakhs
24*7 access to funds from ₹1,000 to ₹5,00,000
Interest free period of up to 30 days
Pay interest only on the funds you use
Tenure: 12 months - 36 months
APR: 21% p.a to 45% p.a	                      

2) Investment in Corporate Bonds 
Earn high returns of up to 15% p.a
Investments start with just ₹10,000
Interest is credited monthly to your bank account
Low volatility compared to stock market

3) Insurance
Insurance plans for what’s often ignored. Protect your digital wallet  and safeguard against online frauds 
Wallet Protection
Income Protection
Loan Protection
Travel Insurance
UPI Fraud Protection
Device Protection

4) Credit Builder
Stashfin's Credit Builder is designed to help individuals with poor credit scores or no credit history improve their creditworthiness. It caters to people who may have been denied loans through the Stashfin app or other financial institutions due to their low credit scores.
Small Loan Amounts: Offers manageable loan amounts tailored to the individual's financial situation
Regular Repayments: Encourages timely repayments to demonstrate financial discipline
Credit Score Improvement: As users make consistent payments, their credit history is reported to credit bureaus, potentially improving their credit score over time

5) Vouchers
Use vouchers to save more and enjoy a lifestyle upgrade while managing your finances smartly
Shop & Save: Get shopping vouchers from top e-commerce and retail platforms
Dine & Delight: Enjoy delicious treats with dining and food delivery vouchers
Entertainment Perks: Access subscriptions and movie deals for endless fun

How does Stashfin Work?
Download the Stashfin App and register with your phone number
Fill in your details and upload verification documents
Once verified, the final loan application status can be checked on the App
Once approved, E-sign the loan agreement; the approved amount will be disbursed to you within 5 minutes, followed by an SMS notification on the registered number

Eligibility Criteria to Apply for Instant Personal Loan, you should be
an Indian Citizen
above the age of 18

Documents Required for Instant Personal Loan-
Address Proof (any one of Aadhaar Card/Voter ID/Passport/Driving License)
Identity Proof (PAN ID)

In some cases, you may be also asked for,
Bank Statement
ITR/ GST Paper

Sample EMI calculation: 

Loan Amount: ₹52903
Tenure: 18 months
Rate of Interest: 21% per annum
Transaction Fee: 2.15% (₹1137)
Platform Fee: 2.5% (₹1323)
GST on Transaction & Processing Fee: ₹443
Total Interest: ₹9227
EMI: ₹3452
Amount Disbursed: ₹50000
Total Repayment Amount: ₹62129



About Stashfin's Free Credit Period
Stashfin offers a one-month interest-free credit period, so if the loan is repaid within 30 days, no interest is levied on the borrowed amount

About Stashfin
Stashfin is the digital lending application ("DLA") operated by EQX Analytics Private Limited. It acts as a lending service provider ("LSP") for Akara Capital Advisors, a Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) duly registered with the Reserve Bank of India (RBI)
Stashfin also serves as a facilitator for bonds with SEBI-registered Online Bond Platforms (OBPPs), specifically GripInvest and Aspero

Call: +91-9289108544 | 0124-6981222

description:
Simplify business payment transactions (credit/debit) with Khatabook. 📕
100% Free, Safe, and Secure for all types of businesses.
 
Khatabook app is trusted by crores of Indians to grow their vyapar in simple and smart ways.

How can you use Khatabook to facilitate & track payment transactions with your customers?
• Khatabook QR: Khatabook QR can be used in your shop to collect payments from customers. You can view the report of all payment transactions on the app.
•Khatabook Payment Links: Send payment links seamlessly to your customers and remind them to pay-back their dues. With every new khata transaction, customers automatically receive an SMS from the merchant’s phone number. Note: We use Send SMS permission to send these automated transaction messages directly from the merchant's phone number.
•Multiple Payment options for payment recollection: Customers can use any of our easy payment mode options- UPI, Debit cards, Credit cards, and digital wallets- to pay the amount back to the merchants.
•Automatic Khata updation: The Khata book ledger is automatically updated once the customer makes a payment back to the merchants.
•Khatabook Coins: Merchants can also purchase Khatabook Coins on the app via multiple payment modes. Khatabook Coins can be used to unlock automated IVR calls and bulk messages as instant payment reminders.

Unlimited accounting features to help grow your business faster than before: 
• Save time in accounting with easy-to-make bills and GST reports for GST Filing 
• Use this as a billing software for retail shops, kirana, garment vyapar, and more
• Manage your inventory better and track your stock in/out and profit reports, low stock alert 
Business Loans and Other Services
With due diligence, Khatabook collects the consent of the user who wishes to apply for a loan. Khatabook provides business loans through a completely digital process at low interest rates without any security or guarantee through our NBFC partners. Loan amount ranges from INR 10,000 to INR 5,00,000 excluding PF. 
The loans can be repaid in daily installments (EDI) with loan tenure ranging from 3 months (minimum) to 24 months (maximum). The simple interest range of the loans is from 15% - 24% depending on the credit quality of the borrower. Processing fees can range from 0%-5%.

Example: For Loan amount = INR 10,000, 💵 Tenure = 3 months and Interest rate = 24% per year, the interest portion will be INR 600 (10,000*3/12*24%). 💵The repayment amount including interest will be INR 10,600 which translates into EDI of INR 118 💵Processing fees is 1% (inclusive of GST). The processing charges will be INR 100. 💵 Disbursed Amount = INR 10,000 - INR 100 = INR 9,900 

 Khatabook’s Partners for Loans:

description:
Access a variety of financial services in one app! With the Moneyview App, you can:
✅ Seamless money transfers using Moneyview UPI
✅ Get personal loans up to INR 10 lakhs
✅ Invest in 24K pure gold and fixed deposits (FD)
✅ Get home loan up to 5CR in a few steps
✅ Apply for Credit Cards from top banks
✅ Check your CIBIL score and credit report for free

*Note: Terms and Conditions Apply!

Moneyview App offers:


1. Moneyview UPI
Introducing Moneyview UPI - Revolutionizing the way you transact using UPI.

✅ Enjoy effortless payments via multiple methods like Scan & Pay, UPI ID, & Self Transfer
✅ Easy to use interface
✅ Superior Customer Support to assist you around the clock

PSP Bank (UPI Partner):
☑️ HDFC Bank

2. Personal Loan*
Moneyview for all your loan needs - Apply for personal loans starting from INR 5000 to INR 10 lakhs & get quick approvals! Whether you are salaried or self-employed, Moneyview is the perfect personal loan app for you and your financial needs. 
*Loan will be approved and disbursed by Moneyview lending partner.

What makes us better?
✅ Custom Loan Amount: From ₹5,000 to ₹10,00,000
✅ Flexible Repayment Tenure: From 3 months to 5 years
✅ Interest rate: Starting from 14% per annum
✅ Annual Percentage Rate (APR): From 17% to 45%*
✅ Hassle-Free: 100% Paperless application process
✅ 100% Transparent: No Hidden Charges, No Surprises!

3. Invest in 24K Pure Gold
Moneyview Gold offers 24K pure gold investment starting from Rs 10.
Invested Gold is stored in 100% secure lockers in partnership with Caratlane.

Why Invest in Moneyview Gold?
✅ Invest in Lumpsum or SIP
✅ Buy Anytime, Sell Anytime
✅ 0% hidden charges
✅ Easy Payments with UPI

4. Invest in FD
Compare & Invest in Fixed Deposits of Top Banks & NBFC partners.

Why choose FD from Moneyview?
✅ Deposits up to Rs.5L insured by DICGC
✅ Book FD without opening a bank account
✅ Easy Withdrawal
✅ FD with RBI-approved Banks & NBFCs
✅ Start with as low as Rs.1000
✅ fully digital & secure

5. Motor Insurance
Buy or Renew your Motor Insurance starting 1.5/day*. Select quotes from Top insurers and choose the best coverage for your bike or car!

✅ Cashless Claims
✅ No Vehicle Inspection
✅ Accident Cover of up to ₹15L

Our Lending Partners:
☑️ Whizdm Finance Pvt Ltd
☑️ Aditya Birla Finance Ltd
☑️ DMI Finance Private Ltd
☑️ Clix Capital Services Pvt Ltd
☑️ Credit Saison India
☑️ Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Private Limited
☑️ Piramal Capital & Housing Finance Ltd
☑️ INCRED Financial Services Ltd
☑️ Northern Arc Capital Ltd
☑️ Vivriti Capital Ltd
☑️ Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company Ltd
☑️ Oxyzo Financial Services Pvt Ltd

Example of how Moneyview Personal Loan works:
✅ Loan Amount: ₹50,000
✅ Tenure: 12 months
✅ Interest Rate: 20%
✅ Processing Fees (incl. GST): 2.5% [₹1,250 + ₹225 GST]
✅ Monthly EMI: ₹4,632
✅ Total Interest Payable: ₹4,632 x 12 months - ₹50,000 Principal = ₹5,584
✅ Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 25.85%
✅ Disbursed Amount: ₹50,000 - ₹1,475 = ₹48,525
✅ Total Amount Payable: ₹4,632 x 12 months = ₹55,584
✅ Total Cost of the Loan: Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹5,584 + ₹1,250 = ₹6,834

*Note: These numbers are for representation purposes only. The final interest rate & APR will depend on the customer’s credit assessment, as decided by Moneyview’s Lending Partner(s).

☑️ Responsible Lending:
Moneyview has partnered with RBI-registered NBFCs/Financial Institutions.
Our policies and services are compliant with extant applicable laws. We are a founding member of the Digital Lenders Association of India http://bit.ly/DLAI_Mem and adhere to the DLAI code of conduct http://bit.ly/DLAI_C

Queries:
📧 Mail: care@moneyview.in
🤙 Call: 080-69390476
🏢 Address: No. 17, 3rd Floor, Outer Ring Rd, Bellandur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560087
