### FAQs

What is Moneyview?

Moneyview is a digital platform providing accessible financial services to all. It leverages technology to offer customized financial products like loans through its lending partners, digital gold, fixed deposits, motor insurance, and cards through its partners. The platform also enables users to track their credit behavior and get in-depth analysis.

Is it safe to use the Moneyview app?

Moneyview is ISO 27001:2022 Certified for Information Security Management Systems and uses 256-bit data encryption for data management. The information a user provides is secured against data threats, making the Moneyview app one of the safest loan apps.

How does the Moneyview app work?

The Moneyview is simple and easy to use. Download the app from the Google Play Store and log in using your mobile number. Once logged in, you can access a host of personal finance products.

description:
IL TakeCareYour personalised all-insurance app for a simplified life with a stress-free future.
Being prepared with the right insurance will help you cope with any uncertainty in life. “Nibhaye Vaade” is a deep-rooted culture in ICICI Lombard’s IL TakeCare online insurance app. With just a few taps, explore bike insurance, health insurance, home insurance, and travel insurance, along with fitness and wellness options. Easily buy insurance online for all your insurance needs
How does IL TakeCare app make your life easier?
Car Insurance & Bike Insurance
Get comprehensive car insurance and bike insurance policy in minutes. Buy insurance online or renew insurance policy with a few taps. Our motor insurance extends to EV bikes. Enjoy the convenience of online insurance and a hassle-free experience for vehicle insurance.
Health Insurance
Buy health insurance online for yourself or a family medical insurance in our app. Beyond medical insurance policy, we offer valuable health assistance features. Add your Mediclaim policy to the medical insurance app to get 24/7 access to online consultations from your home.
Travel Insurance
Worried about the unexpected on your adventure? Get ready with our comprehensive trip insurance on our user-friendly travel insurance app. Avail benefits like medical assistance, baggage loss coverage, and passport theft protection on our online travel insurance options.
Home and Property Insurance
Our home insurance app makes it easy to buy home insurance online and secure your most valuable asset. Our property insurance protects you against unforeseen events like fire and special perils, burglary, and more. Manage your home insurance policy, and easily file a claim.
Wellness App and Fitness Tracker
Alongside managing your insurance policies, our insurance app seamlessly integrates with your fitness tracker and set personalized wellness goals. This wellness app empowers you to take control of your health and make informed decisions for a brighter future.
Features & Benefits

Quick & Easy Claims - Our insurance app allows you to register your health insurance policy. Submit directly through the app & motor claims easily.
Online policy renewal - Manage your entire insurance portfolio: car, health, travel, and more - all within the app. Renewing existing policies or purchasing new ones takes just a few taps.
Wellness and Fitness Tracker - Track your diet, exercise, sleep, and step count with our health services app.
Cashless Hospitals Network - Search from a wide hospital network based on current location, city, pin code and specialty-wise. Find the care you need fast!
Online Doctor’s Consultation - Talk to a doctor anytime & get prescriptions online.Cashless Garage Network - Bike and car insurance policyholders can access a comprehensive list of cashless garages through the app.
InstaSpect - Fast claims, easy process! Use the mobile app's self-inspection feature for car & bike claims to record a video of your vehicle without the need for physical inspection.
Motor News & Views - Be the first to hear the latest information on vehicle launches, reviews, analysis & more on this online car insurance app.

Our insurance app is designed to manage your coverage effortlessly. Buy insurance online, renew policies, file claims, and access valuable wellness features - all in one convenient place. Download the IL TakeCare app today for a simpler way to handle all your insurance needs.
If you have any queries related to any insurance, call our toll free number - 1800 2666 or get in touch with our customer support team.
Email: customersupport@icicilombard.com
Website: www.icicilombard.com

Very bad experience I'm unable to add my existing health policy that is linked to my company. If you want to reach out to an agent it is also very hectic pressing so many numbers and even after that first talk to bot which doesn't know how to respond in most cases. It has been two - three days and still not able to add my policy

Worst app i have used. I tried booking health checkup request, it always says failed. Then i booked online from laptop and tried to check my booked appointment that was also not updated even after 3 days. Any time app gets crashed and fails to open. Worst experience with the app.

I am having a very bad experience with this app randomly the insurance disappears and randomly appears which is frustrating but the main frustrating is that it tells to complete the KYC but I am unable to complete KYC as it says KYC failed it then tells that you can also upload selected document photo then also same error please check the above issues and please fix it

I am unable to book a consultation nor able to order medicine. Contacted multiple times with call center, removed and added policy again but same problem exists. Need to talk to technical team who can sort the issue. 22-Mar-25 I don't know whether u have seen my request which was raised to customer support, everytime they tell to remove and add policy. no one is able to sort my issue. It's pathetic support without understanding the customer issue you simply respond for the name sake.
very slow loading app. kyc process is not getting completed in the app. despite multiple attempts it shows error. policy doesn't get easily updated. worst possible experience.

ICICI Lombard neither treat there customer properly nor look into there grievances. They don't have any proper system of checking the details you submit at the time of taking insurance policy, but once you start to claim for insurance, they remember each and every paperwork is proper or not and that too after your bike has been repaired, and after that if you contact there customer care then they just don't speak properly and back off from paying insurance claim.

one of the worst app and worst support is provided by ICICI. they took hefty amount for insurance as compared to other companies and the service and support is so bad. This application is so bad we cannot book physio in time, we cannot get medicine in time, we dnt get OPD booking in time.

I've bought my Car insurance from agent . But the policy is not reflecting in App. Tried multiple times to add the policy. But it is not getting added... Always it shows error. And customer care team too is very unsupporting. No help from noone. Really very bad experience untill now.

I had the worst experience with ICICI Lombard Insurance while trying to file a claim. The process was unnecessarily complicated, customer support was unhelpful, and they kept delaying my claim with vague excuses. It feels like they intentionally make it difficult for customers to get what they rightfully deserve. I do not recommend this insurance company to anyone. Stay away if you value your time and money!

App has issues, like renewal of policy is a pain as it doesn't show all details when you start to renew.. you have to rotate phone to get the whole page & still after entering DOB we don't get link below to go further to renew ..since years this is not rectified

Very very bad app. Even after repeatedly booking OPD appointment it gets cancelled. And you should book one day prior for OPD,which agents don't say us before payment of insurance. Appointments don't get booked and we can't go directly and claim l. What an illeterate I'm to take this insurance.

It was a good experience for me on IL take care app. I asked for weight loss and about fitness, Dietitian Samrudhi helped me and gave me diet to follow on daily routine and also told me to do exercise and get proper sleep. This app have exclusive features which helps alot. They provide good facilities and doctor will connect with you ASAP. whatever conversation you had with your doctor or any prescription that they suggest that will be send to your registered email id.

Worst service . I have already 3 years insurance of icici Lombard and it will expire soon so I have installed this app to see the plans . It's shows error every time I want to see plans and after getting your contact details from app they will mentally disturb you with continuous calling.

not good service provider . they comitte good at the time of insurance selling. but they do not have any good network garage at in big cities also. my vehicle from 6th March at garage but not able to getting from reparing done till date. it's horrible. suggest di not take icici insurance at any cost...........
Worst app I have seen. The app starts with a Nice UI showing lots of facilities. But if you try to use any of the features, it either crashes or just silently fails with a loading wheel.

Extremely hard to work with , keeps on failing to upload documents in the required section but the same doc can be uploaded in other sections. Even after uploading the docs , the claim fails saying docs are missing when I can see the same docs in this app.

Worst app ever in 2025, they are being handled by school kids who doesn't know 1. How the specific location not being taken once , it always goes to mumbai his/her home location for doctors 2. It never gives direct access to upload prescription/ accept it 3. Mother of bugs in every stage..it will not go back 4. Hospital list never updates I've sent multiple mails, you need to first understand the problems raised by each user and try to fix it. If majority are complaining then its a serious prb

this application is not at all accessible for visually challenged people. how am I going to pay my bike insurance now. and the web link also is not accessible. March 29 is my renewal date. and the customer care is not at all understanding what I am saying.

Pls don't buy insurance policy from ICICI,It's a fraud company. Firstly they will make you buy the claim by informing the various features and doing misleading sales.But once you apply for a claim they will reject on the ground of irrelevant reasons that were never discussed during the policy purchase The customer support team and grievance escalation levels within thecompany are also not useful and as they never try to understand the issue and communicate the same reason with an automated email

This app has one of the worst chatbots in the world. It acts like a mentally retarded person repeating the same options again and again. I expected that after one or two iterations, it will send me to a human agent. But no such luck. AI is supposed to be Artificial Intelligence and not Atrocious Incompetence.

This definitely needs so much of improvements 1. Cannot select a hospital if it's a hospital chain as the branch name or address is not easily visible 2. Switching between apps makes you to re-enter details again from the beginning

I cannot book a health checkup as it couldn't find my details due to technical issues. I can't upload my aadhaar details due to some technical reasons. Can't fetch my abha details. Maybe its just an app to just consume my storage and steal data🤔
Claim settlement for cashless bill is worthless. Please do not submit bills in Bulk. submit it the day you receive it.

this insurance company give the services very bad and no response on your claim. So please everyone don't trust on this insurance company. thanks 🙏 your reply very bad because I already complaint share with your customer support email id but response not solve my problem. So please don't tell anyone your customer support email id because he is not working everyone. thanks for your response 🙏
bad
need to improve a lot
this app's advertisement is a scam where it shows that the app predicts critical health issues with complete accuracy just with a selfie. isn't that misleading and scam

I faced multiple issues while renewing my policy. Initially, I was recommended to purchase ICICI WYN, which was later discontinued, and I was asked to switch to ICICI Elevate. During renewal, I received no support and had to follow up extensively. After payment, I was told KYC was needed, but no one reached out. Later, I was falsely informed that calls were made. Due to poor service and miscommunication, I have discontinued my policy. Please improve your support.

Very bad app, list of issues. 1. Takes hours to open the app. 2. App crashes all the time. 3. You can't save the claim, because of any reason if you switch to other app like searching files etc..you would have to start over and fill all the details again. 4. Very difficult to attach files, it crashesh frequently. And many more, looks like some student have made it as college project learning technology first time. Pls resolve all these issue, it's important application. And why no web version?
worst app. everytime it says your request cannot be fulfilled.
very bad. don't purchase there policy.

The details available in the Policy details section are inadequate..It should have all details about the add ons like Room - Any or Restoration - Unlimited similar to what Policy bazaar app provides...

my app is not working from many days. im unable to open it. it only showing app logo and I'm keep waiting to open. I re-install app but same problem happen. I'm using Android 15. please solve this problem as my corporate policy with your company.
very bad response
After update, app got super slow.. open it today n enjoy it tomorrow.

Pathetic mobile application... no contact details mentioned in the app to connect or talk on my policy, or serving customer queries.. ICICI LOMBARD objective is only to sell a policy.. before sale ICICI LOMBARD sales team called me several times a day. after sale it's very difficult to find a single person to connect for any service. I have renewed my 6 years old policy online every time but surprisingly I can see my policy mapped to an agent whom I never know neither he knows me either. Kousik
very poor service.. not user frindly
very late reply information.

The app takes a very long time to process, which is frustrating. Sometimes, I have to restart it multiple times just to get it to load properly. It needs better performance optimization. Hope the developers fix this soon.
Great application il take care

description:
Bajaj Markets App from Bajaj Finserv Direct Ltd. is a one stop solution to all financial needs. This online loan app offers 100+ financial products by 80+ top financial institutions in India. With this personal loan app, you get quick loan approval & fast disbursal. The Bajaj Markets loan app offers Instant Loan, Credit Score, Credit Cards, Investments, Insurance & Personal Finance Manager all in one instant loan app. Download Bajaj app & discover the ease of getting funds with Bajaj Finserv Markets instant loan app. 

Loans
Need an instant loan? Try Bajaj Finserv Markets loan app & check CIBIL score for free. Get an instant personal loan with an interest rate starting at 9.99%. Partners at Bajaj Markets App approve instant personal loan requests fast. Bajaj Finserv Markets easy loan app helps you connect with the best lenders on our trusted loan app. Bajaj Markets App offers Personal Loan, Home Loan, Business Loan & Gold Loan.

Start your financial journey with not just instant personal loans but products like Cards, investments insurance and more on this personal loan app. 

Partners on Bajaj Markets loan app are:
Personal loan:
Bajaj Finance Ltd., Muthoot Finance Private Limited, Bhanix Finance & Investment Ltd, YES Bank Ltd, Incred Financial Services Limited (Formerly KKR India Financial Services Ltd), India Infoline Finance Limited, Mpokket Financial Services Private Limited, Krazybee Services Private Limited, L&T Finance Limited (Formerly known as L&T Financial Holdings Limited), Social Worth Technologies Private Limited, Payu Finance India Private Limited (Formerly Known as Sidvik Leasing Pvt. Ltd.), Finnable Credit Private Limited, Whizdm Innovations Pvt. Ltd., Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Private Limited, Upmove Capital Private Limited, Federal Bank Limited.

Business Loan:
Aye Finance Private Limited, Ambit Finvest Pvt. Ltd. [Formerly - Ambit Retail Finance Pvt. Ltd.], Epimoney Private Limited & Indifi Capital Private Limited (Formerly Riviera Investors Private Limited) on our small loan app.

Apply for an instant personal loan of up to ₹35 lakhs from Bajaj Finance after Credit score check on this instant personal loan app. Take an instant loan without collateral on Bajaj Finserv Markets App.

Download Bajaj Easy Loan App for a Bajaj Finance Personal Loan & get quick approval with instant personal loan. Our partner Bajaj Finance offers personal loans starting at 10% with repayment tenure of 8 years. You can also compare loans from multiple partners for a Bajaj Markets personal loan of up to ₹50 lakhs on Bajaj Finserv Markets small loan app. 

• Annual Percentage Rate (APR) between 9.99% - 27%
• Repayment tenure between 4 months - 72 months
Eg: Loan amount: 1,00,000, Interest 14%, Processing fee 2.25%, Tenure 60 Months

Loan processing fee: ₹2,250
Stamp duty charges: applicable as per law
EMI per month: ₹2,327
Total interest: ₹39,610
Disbursal amount: ₹1,00,000
Amount Payable: ₹1,39,610

Eligibility criteria - Instant online Loan approval for Indian citizens between 21-58 years of age on our instant personal loan app.

Cards
Choose from a range of 30+ online credit cards. Consider our offerings: SBI Credit Cards, Axis Bank Credit Cards, Rupicard, Indusind Bank Credit Card, Bajaj Insta EMI card & more. 

Solve all your investment needs on Bajaj Finserv Markets App. 
Bajaj Finserv Markets App offers several options for growing your wealth, like NPS & US stocks. With Bajaj Markets App, you can open a Demat account & easily invest in mutual funds & FDs.

This instant loan app also offers a wide range of insurance policies like health, home, car & life insurance. You will find pocket insurance as well on this instant personal loan app.
	
Data Safety & Deletion - You can request that data be deleted by contacting us via “contact@bajajfinservmarkets.in”

 Address: 4th Floor, B2 Building, Cerebrum IT Park, Kumar City, Kalyani Nagar, Pune – 411014

The app's main purpose is to allow users to check their free CIBIL (Credit Information Bureau (India) Limited) report.

description:
PayRupik is an online instant personal loan platform trusted by over 5 million users, provides you instant credit in minutes. 
It is a loan product of Sayyam Investments Pvt Ltd which is a registered NBFC under RBI. You can avail loan amount ranging up to ₹20,000, process is fast, easy and safe.

If you are looking for a friend who can easily borrow money without making excuses, PayRupik is your best friend.

Production:
Loan Amount: from ₹1000 to ₹20000 
Minimum Loan Tenure: 91 days
Maximum Loan Tenure: 365 days
Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 35% per annum
Processing Fee: from ₹80 to ₹2000 depend on the loan tenure and amount
GST: 18% on the processing fee in accordance with the law and policy of India

The representative example:
For the loan amount is ₹6000 and the interest rate is 25% per annum and the tenure is 120 days, then the interest payable is calculated as follows:
Interest = ₹6000 x 25% / 365 x 120 = ₹493
Processing Fee = ₹100
GST = ₹100 x 18% = ₹18 
The total repayment amount in 120 days shall be ₹6000 + ₹493 + ₹100 + ₹18 = ₹6611
APR = (₹6611 - ₹6000) / ₹6000 / 120 x 365 = 30.97%

Why choose PayRupik?
✔	Transparency: PayRupik is an online loan product from RBI-certified NBFC which is guaranteed to be transparent. 
✔	Instant Personal Loan: Loan amounts are disbursed directly into your account within 15 minutes. As the process is 100% online, you can get funds anytime, anywhere.
✔	Efficient: We process your instant loan application instantly in a fast way. No paperwork and no problems as we prioritize your needs.
✔	Security: Your data is safe with us. It is transferred over a secure HTTPS connection to the server, and we do not share it with anyone without your consent except the Lenders. 

What should you do first?
1. Download and install the PayRupik App.
2. Create an account.
3. Upload your KYC documents, which includes your ID, address proof, and PAN card.

Eligibility:
You must be an Indian national.
You must be over the age of 18.
You must have a steady source of income on a monthly basis.

Minimal household income eligibility:
Annual household income is above Rs. 3,00,000/- (Three lacs) by all sources and means.
The term ‘household’ shall mean an individual family unit, i.e. husband, wife and their unmarried children who are above the age of 18 years.

Contact us if you have any questions:
service@payrupikloan.in or 0224-8930118
Agyathuri, Chamajali, Amingaon Guwahati Kamrup, Assam 781031

The app is seamless and the inteface is very user friendly. Money is credited into your account immediately. But don't be fooled, this app is extremely predatory. The interest rates are extremely exorbitant, far above market rates, and the repayment terms/tenure are atrocious. They will pile fees after fees onto your loan and bleed your wallet dry, literally. Please don't repeat the mistake that I made and install this app. You have been warned!

I took a ₹24,000 loan from this app, but the interest rate was very high. Though the process was quick, the one-month repayment schedule caused issues. A single-day EMI delay led to a late fee and a severe CIBIL score impact without prior notice. I strongly urge others to consider better loan apps with smoother processes and fairer policies. Additionally, their customer support is terrible. Despite calling multiple times, I received no response. I highly recommend exploring better alternatives

When needed the most, they reject the application without any clear reason. Just two to three days before the repayment due date, they start harassing with repeated calls throughout the day. Even after making timely payments, they still reject the next loan. Their customer care service is unprofessional, and the interest rates on loans are excessively high. I Suggest please not use this app

## About    PayRupik

![](https://www.payrupikloan.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/amico-10.svg)

PayRupik, your go-to digital loan platform, ensures a hassle-free application process for a range of loans at your fingertips. With transparent procedures, our app, available on Google Play Store and App Store, offers paperless approval, swift disbursal, and customizable loan options. No collateral is required, and all transactions are facilitated with Sayyam Investments Pvt. Ltd. (NBFC), registered with RBI, ensuring clarity and reliability throughout the loan journey. Experience a seamless and efficient borrowing process with PayRupik.

### Receive the loan amount directly to your account within 30 minutes.

### Personal small loan service

Aims to provide individual customers with fast and flexible financial support. It can provide a simple application process, a fast approval mechanism and a reasonable repayment plan to ensure that customers can obtain the funds they need in the shortest possible time.

![](https://www.payrupikloan.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Icon-2.svg)

### Salary loan service

Salary loan is our loan product specially designed for working-class people. It is suitable for customers who have stable income but occasionally have funds turnover needs. Based on the customer's salary statement and credit history, we provide corresponding loan amounts so that customers can reasonably arrange loans and repayments based on their monthly income.

description:
What is BHIM?

BHIM (Bharat Interface for Money) is a UPI enabled initiative to facilitate safe, easy & instant digital payments through your mobile phone. 

Requirements: 
Before you register on the app, please ensure the following:

You have linked your Mobile Number with your Bank Account and the same is used for accessing BHIM. 

Your phone should have an active SIM linked to your Bank Account. 

In case of Dual SIM, kindly ensure that you’ve selected the SIM card linked to your Bank Account. 

You have a valid Debit Card for your Bank Account. This is required to generate UPI PIN. 

Supported Banks:  
Visit our website https://www.bhimupi.org.in/our-partners to find out if your bank is live on BHIM

More about BHIM:- 

• Transaction limit is Rs. 1,00,000 per transaction and per day 
(Please note that your Bank’s Transaction Limit may vary from BHIM’s limit.)

• BHIM app is compatible with Android 6.0 and above. 

Terms & Conditions:- https://www.bhimupi.org.in/terms-conditions

For more information, visit https://www.bhimupi.org.in/

Stop. Think. Act. You will never be asked for a pin to receive money. Use UPI PIN only if you want to pay or check account balance. Enjoy your BHIM APP safely.

screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/uq: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app's language selection screen. The screen displays a list of supported languages, including English, Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, Marathi, Tamil, Urdu, and Kannada. The app boasts support for 20 languages in total.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/1r: The image appears to be a promotional screenshot for an app. The interface is a mobile banking or payment application, possibly showcasing the personalization options available for the home screen. It highlights features like scanning, paying with voice, sending money, and managing credit cards. The user interface includes features like "Scan & Pay," "Pay with voice," and different payment options. The presence of "RuPay Credit Card" suggests that the app might be targeted toward users in India.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/rh: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app interface. It appears to be a payment or banking app, as it displays options for managing UPI (Unified Payments Interface) and linking bank accounts. The interface shows a user's profile with their name, phone number, and UPI ID, along with a QR code for payments. The app's features include downloading the QR code, sharing it, and linking or managing bank accounts.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/0_: The image shows a mobile phone screen displaying a "Bill Pay" application interface. The app allows users to pay various utility bills such as DTH, water, mobile postpaid, landline postpaid, broadband postpaid, electricity, gas, LPG gas, life insurance, loan repayment, FASTag, and cable TV. The app is categorized into "Top Categories" and "Other Categories". The app is branded with "B" logo.
screenshots.https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/UD: The image is a mobile phone screen displaying an interface for UPI LITE X, a payment system. A pop-up message prompts the user to enable UPI LITE X (Offline). The pop-up explains the benefits, such as offline payments via Tap n Pay and not requiring internet connectivity. There are buttons to "Cancel" or "Enable Now."

UI is great and Unique........👍 But, Some bugs and need to improvement.. 1. Scanner without open biometric lock ( It works only when not biometric lock is enabled) 2. Take Too long time to launch App.. 3. Prepaid Recharge not available other than BSNL and MTNL 4. Scanner take too long time to launch camera... 5. Need Details on Shareable QR code.. (Like UPI id and Name) 6. Request Money option not show... 7. If failed with biometric lock no one option to open app (even passcode)

I am changing my review from 1 star to 3 stars because of the new update. It looks stylish and I am going to test this app before switching from Google pay. BTW they still haven't updated the keyboard. It looks ugly and It's very hard to use. What would you change something which was working perfectly before.

Forget password issue not resolved Many time open same interface. New password option not available call krne k bad bhi koi help nahi huye. call computer operated hota h to apni problem to sunta hi nahi

The app after update is not working properly. Even after having full delegation in UPI circle it is asking permission from primary user and also it is not giving option of paying from UPI circle after redirected from some app.I hope issue will be fixed as soon as possible.
new look is awesome 👌

The app is good. The redesign in the latest version is a welcome upgrade over the old version. My only gripe is that version 4.0.0 is not yet available on all my devices. 2 of my devices are still stuck at version 3.8.7. Hope that the updates can be rolled out soon.

One basic function of every UPI app is that after the payment, the "transaction complete" page remains active until you cancel it....sometimes you have to wait to show the transaction to the shop vendor because he may be busy....but the app automatically removes the transaction page immediately after the transaction completes....after each transaction, you have to visit the transaction history again to show to the vendor.....i can't believe that developer miss this simple feature...pls, fix it.

The new update of the BHIM (Bharat Interface for Money) app is truly remarkable. The improved UI (User Interface) looks modern and user-friendly. The addition of dark mode is my personal favorite feature. I had been eagerly waiting for this option, and now using it feels great. However, there is a significant drawback related to accessibility. The TalkBack feature, which is essential for visually impaired users, is not functioning properly in most parts of the app. This makes it extremely diffi

New UI is slow, buggy, hides a lot of important things, it contains too many distracting and moving elements. It asks for app pin too frequently, even when you're using the app and in middle of something. Frequent payment contacts are suddenly gone, the "send to mobile" shows irrelevant contacts and wrong UPI ids / bank accounts. Overall, this is an unnecessary downgrade that appears shiny but reduces actual functionality.

BHIM 4.0 delivers a modern, well-structured UI with smoother transactions and useful features like Spend Analytics, Split Expenses, and Family Mode for Expense Tracking. Users appreciate the improved speed and Scan & Pay efficiency. However, some issues persist: contact search glitches, green screen in history, missing prepaid operators, and a camera bug on the second launch. A request for an alert sound before payment announcements was also made. Despite minor bugs, the update is a significant.

After the latest update aesthetics have changed and looks modern. on mobile data, it always says "something went wrong" and not even log into the app (unusable). On WiFi it works fine however should we carry WiFi along with us ? 👎. Will change ratings once the basic functionality of usage is fixed. Update - Cleared the App cache and it's working as expected on mobile data.

I have been using the BHIM app for a long time, and it has always been a great experience! The new features in the BHIM app are amazing! UPI Lite makes small payments super fast, and enhanced security makes transactions even smoother and safer. The app is smoother, more user-friendly, and works flawlessly. A must-have for digital payments in India! 🚀👏

I decided to use this app to make payments for all my credit cards, but it turned out to be a terrible experience. I attempted to pay my credit card bill through the BHIM app. The amount was debited from my account, but the transaction failed. Now my money is stuck! After searching online, I found that the refund will take 2–3 business days (not guaranteed). Why can't the reversal happen immediately? My payment is due tomorrow, and because of this issue, I’m left in a tough spot.

your new update ver 4.0 is looking smart. Now I didn't feel sluggish in the new version. App now came to the level of private app like phone pay paytm etc.. only bad i feel is UPI Pin entry screen , which is not comfortable with finger width. Most of the time fingers touch both digits simultaneously as they have lower widths between two digits. Expected to rectify this issue also

The recent update presents a refined user interface with a modern, clean, and aesthetically pleasing design. Its lightweight and smooth operation enhances user experience, solidifying its position as India's leading UPI application. But some bugs to be rectified. Contact details not showing when searching to pay & When I visit history & click on a transaction, green screen appears( Sometime).

The UI has been upgraded in this update, which is cool and unique. However, I'm facing an issue where mobile prepaid recharge operators are not showing up from the start. Only MTNL and BSNL are visible, with no options for other operators. To fix this, I request that you: Add mobile prepaid plans along with the operator options in this application.

Thank you for the excellent UI update. However, I noticed two bugs: 1. Major bug: The camera doesn’t open on the second app launch (show dark screen), even with permissions granted. It only works on first-time permission or from a killed state. To access it, I must open Photos, then close the pop-up. This seems like a threading issue. 2. Medium bug: On the final transaction screen, the payment code buttons are too small. Please increase their size to at least medium for better usability.

The new UI of BHIM 4.0 is excellent! Every page looks well-designed. The light and dark theme feature is a great addition. Some highlights: Scan and Pay works seamlessly, even in low light. Improved Payment Speed transactions feel much faster. Transaction List & Details View — well-structured and easy to navigate. New Features like Offers, Split Expenses, and Spend Analytics are a great addition. Overall, and great update! Looking forward to further improvements. Great Job, BHIM team

Finally, a Game-Changer for BHIM! I've been a long-time BHIM app user, and this latest update is simply amazing! The app now boasts a smooth, beautiful, and well-organized UI, making transactions effortless. BHIM has always been the most secure and feature-rich UPI app, often introducing key UPI features before others. The only drawback was its UI and processing speed, but with this update, both issues are perfectly resolved. Kudos to the BHIM team for this fantastic upgrade

This app is phenomenal now, this is hands down the best upi app. Along with new dark mode ui this is the best, no one can beat this. Plus point, they don't have any hidden charges like the other apps, and it's a government one. Even they optimised the app to run smoothly on every phone. The animations become smoother and it's just felt complete. THANK YOU NPCI...

The new UI is fresh looking & beautiful. Few issues I had with older design e.g the amount was having smaller text, now the amount is written in large text, easy to show at shops. Dark mode is a welcome addition, though there is a bug. With theme set system default, dark mode doesn't work often even if system wide dark mode is applied. A issue I'd in previous versions continues here as well. The successful payment page closes automatically within few seconds which interrupts cashback generation.

The new UI UX is great and far better then the previous one. This definitely enhance the user experience! Still the new UI UX is not well furnished. I own a SM-A556E mobile phone, which comes with capable processor and GPU. Still on this model of mobile phone, BHIM app lags sometime which absolutely degrade the user experience. Please, team make this new app well furnished to every budget segment phones starting from <₹10000 to expensive flagship mobile phones.

Everything is good except Mobile recharge & other bill payment functionalities. 1. It doesn't capture the proper circle and the mobile service provider. If your number is old tata or reliance then it will show you an error and the circle is BSNL...that sucks. Gpay performs better. Please update your database. That's why govt is far behind capturing the market. 2. When you added bill payer in favourite, it doesn't show up while making the payment. Everytime you have to add, that's frustrating.

very good interface now. but the music when money sent or recieved really unprofessional. We all know we are indians. That is why we even use this app. so no need of more ethenic musics. use professional and simple music for a great future application. thank you. I thought about writing this only due to that music.

BHIM 4.0 UI is just WOW! Super impressive and it looks so beautiful. App overall functionality is excellent. Well done to the team who have put their efforts. Loved it! Just one feedback.. I got scanner button on the login page for quick payments however the moment I enabled biometric authentication, I no longer get scanner button at login page. I have to login to the app to get scanner.

The new UI looks great, and speaking out the payment received feature is also a good addition. It would be nice if it can play some alert sound before announcing the payment received information. The alert sound will gain users attention and they will not miss the announcement. it's a small feature request, maybe the dev team can think over it. By the way, good work with the UI, but the mobile prepaid recharge section is still not usable, I hope it will be improved.

Why Favourite UPI Contacts removed in the new design even after requesting? searching for even favourite UPI contacts every time is frustrating and might also add a security risk of typing wrong and similar IDs for elders. Elders can't remember UPI IDs and can't transact without Help. Mostly works, rarely fails. Please add favourites in "send to mobile" and "send to Bank/UPI ID". It will be easy to select from there itself. Or add a new option "Send to Favorites/Quick send." It will be useful.

The latest update is excellent! ⭐🚀 the new UI looks like a pro💎🔥. Spend Analytics 📊 feature—it’s incredibly useful for tracking expenses. However, it would be even better if it were placed at the top of the interface ⬆️ so we can see it immediately upon opening there app without scrolling. The worst is the ❌ lack of a direct prepaid recharge option for 📱Jio, Airtel, and other telecom providers. Having to use third-party platforms for mobile recharges makes the experience inconvenient😕.

BHIM UPI -An Immersive digital payment experience. in recent BHIM UPI update The most striking improvement is undoubtedly the refreshed user interface (UI) and user experience (UX). The payment confirmation tune is a standout feature, evoking a pleasant, almost nationalistic enthusiasm with each transaction. Fast, reliable payments are now coupled with a truly enjoyable user flow, making BHIM UPI a top choice for seamless digital transactions. The tune is memorable and culturally resonant touch.

Whenever I try to approve a payment, excessive ads interfere with the process, causing repeated failures. This is both frustrating and time-consuming. The app’s overall rating on Google Play has dropped significantly due to these issues. If the developers truly want the app to function smoothly, they must restore the ad-free experience it had in the past. Please fix this issue! As a smoother, ad-free experience is essential, especially for critical transactions.

description:
Looking for an Indian Stock Market app with advanced features? Upstox is the one for you!🚀

Join 1.3 Cr+ users growing their wealth right on Upstox! 💜

Modes

1. Upstox Pro for Traders:
Currency, Commodity, Equity, Options & Futures trading

🔍 Discover
• Advanced Option Chain analysis tool with customisable data points like PCR, Max Pain, India VIX, etc.
• Curated Smartlists - ‘Most Active’, ‘Top Traded’, ‘OI Gainers’, ‘Losers’
• Futures Heatmap to identify trends

📊 Analyse 
• TradingView & ChartIQ charts comprising 100+ indicators, 80+ drawing tools
• In-depth OI analysis tools available for BSE’s SENSEX,  and NSE India’s NIFTY 50 and BANKNIFTY indices
• Accurate FII + DII data

📈  Boost Trades with Advanced Order Types
• Invest in Futures & Options by placing 20-leg basket orders in one click
• GTT and Trailing Stop Loss to automate and manage trading risks
• Ready-made Options Strategies, a safer way to trade in Options
• Margin Pledge to get up to 90% collateral margin against a stock or ETF investment online, for F&O trading
• Margin Trading Facility to get 4X leverage for Equity Delivery orders
• 5X leverage for Equity Intraday


2. Upstox for Investors:
Access Stocks, Mutual Funds, ETFs, Bonds & IPO 

👉 Stocks
• Choose from 5000+ Stocks via curated lists - Gainers, Losers, Movers, Shakers, sectoral companies Automobile, Banking, and other sector and theme-based lists 
• Prices synced with the live Stock Exchange data
• Get information about a company’s fundamentals like PE ratio, dividend yield, etc
• Switch between Delivery and Intraday order types for Stock Trading
• View Analyst Ratings
• Invest better with a 6-point investment checklist

👉 Mutual Funds & ETFs
• Explore Mutual Funds across 15+ categories
• Invest at zero brokerage fees
• Find Ready-made Baskets
• Invest in Mutual Fund SIPs starting at just ₹100.
• Save up to 2% with our Direct Plans.
• Calculate returns via our SIP calculator.
• Get ETF details like tracking error, liquidity, fund size, expense ratio, etc.

👉 Sovereign Gold Bonds
• Backed by the Government of India.
• Earn 2.5% interest.
• Enjoy tax-free returns on maturity
• Invest without commission 

👉 IPO
• Know all about the recently-listed IPOs & Pre-apply for top upcoming IPO
• Conveniently pay with UPI via GPay, BHIM, etc.

 What’s More?

1. Demat account facility
• No charges for opening a Demat & trading account
• 0 Demat account maintenance charges.
• Online Demat & trading account opening with PAN, Aadhaar, eKYC
• 0 brokerage charges on Mutual Funds, IPO, SGBs.
• Nominal charges of up to ₹20/order on Equity, Futures, Options, Currencies & Commodities trading online.

2. Learn about Demat accounts with UpLearn, buy life insurance, get market recap, sector, portfolio & watchlist news

3. Govt. backed Fixed Income Investments - Bonds, Treasury Bills, State Development Loans (SDLs) & Non-Convertible Debentures (NCDs)

4. P2P lending
5. Fixed Deposits

About Us: Upstox Securities Private Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of RKSV Securities India Private Limited and RKSV Commodities India Private Limited is an associate company of RKSV Securities India Private Limited.

In 6M if we can zoom out to view 1 year's chart, then in 1Y, I think we need to be able to zoom out to view at least a 2-3 year's chart on the phone screen. This broker lacks a lot of basic feature. 1. No Holding breakout: when u buy a stock at 2 different prices it does not show the holding breakout. Instead it just shows the average price 2. Bad user experience: when u open charts it takes time to load and adding symbols are not seemless. I prefer angel one and zerodha better than this broker

you didnot add unfreeze lots option in index option. it's difficult to trade with heavy lots at a time in trading in upstox. and you didnot allow market order when I take entry in stocks options. it allows only in limit order. immediately u can add this features in upstox otherwise I will leave the upstox and take the dhan demat account

it has been quite useful in my investing journey and i have been using the set price function to it's limits . just one suggestion if you could add the watch list in the homescreen so we can get the results quicker it would be beneficial

super.money: Your go-to App for Credit Cards, UPI, Fixed Deposits, and more.
Basically, you name it, we’ve made it super.

So, what can you do with super.money?

💸 Pay with superUPI - the most rewarding UPI App out there!
Earn up to 5% cashback on your online payments.
Shop on Flipkart, Myntra, Amazon, Swiggy, Zomato, BlinkIt, Cleartrip, MakeMyTrip, BookMyShow, Ola, Uber, Rapido, and more—all while getting real cashback!

💳 Get superCard - the credit card on UPI that’s made for everyone!
Issued in partnership with Utkarsh Small Finance Bank, this card is all about no judgment—only rewards.
→ Boost your credit score while enjoying exclusive benefits.
→ Available for everyone, starting at just ₹100.
Yes. Everyone gets it!

💰 Invest with superFD - the coolest Fixed Deposit out there!
Here’s what you get:
→ Up to 9.5% interest rate
→ Instant FDs with trusted banks backed by RBI
→ Insured up to 5 Lakhs by DICGC
→ Withdraw anytime after 7 days, if it’s not your thing

✅ Access superCash - Instant pre-approved loans!
→ Pre-approved loans from multiple lending partners
→ Low-interest rates starting at 10.49%

Why choose super.money?
→ Approved by NPCI & RBI for top-notch reliability
→ Partnered with trusted banks like Utkarsh Bank, Axis Bank, and IndusInd Bank
→ Powered by Flipkart for the ultimate e-commerce experience

✨ Ready to get rewarded for everything you do?

➡️ Download super.money now and unlock the SUPER experience!

False Advertise ⚠️ Got a WhatsApp message from them that said I'm eligible for the SuperCard but after log in the App its showing I'm on waiting list, sit tight! They're just Spamming people to attract them on their platform that doesn't have basic features like Bill payments (no mobile recharge, dth, cc bill payment). Nowadays every UPI platform has their own bill payment system, why anyone would pay from 2 separate app for the same transaction unless you like collecting coins of ₹1, ₹2.

App was great at the start, even redeemed the cashback at the start. but now the app won't even go past the password, i keep clicking the continue button but it doesn't seem to work so I'm currently stuck at the lock screen of the app and so please fix this issue and I'll give a better rating when it's done. the issue has been going on for 2-3 days now

The app and card are useful but have issues. I paid ₹475 at a pharmacy, the amount was deducted, but the transaction got stuck. The merchant didn’t receive the money, so I had to pay in cash. The deducted amount settled with the merchant after 24 hours, and now I have to travel 18 km to get my money back. This is inconvenient and frustrating. If it happened out of state, recovering the money would be impossible. I hope such issues are resolved soon.

The UI is great...and the functionality is really smooth and easy to use. Since, in its early stages evenly it doesn't get stuck in between which I like the most and the interesting part of it is getting cashback after every payment. I would recommend it definitely!

Extremely Bad Experience Review: I had a very frustrating experience with Super.money. My friend sent me money, but I never received it. Despite multiple attempts to resolve the issue, there was no satisfactory solution. I strongly advise others not to use this app, as my experience was disappointing and stressful. I would not recommend this app to anyone.

Hi, I’m facing an issue with the SuperMoney app after updating to version 1.4.2. The App PIN feature is not working properly. Even though I have enabled the PIN in settings, the app opens directly without asking for it. My device is a Redmi Note 7 Pro running Android 10. I have tried disabling and re-enabling the PIN, clearing cache and data, restarting the device, and even reinstalling the app, but the issue persists. Please look into this and provide a fix as soon as possible

I had a terrible experience with your service. I paid my credit card bill, and the amount was deducted from my bank account, but the Super Money application is showing that the transaction failed. I also contacted PhonePe's customer support (since I made the payment using my PhonePe UPI ID), and they confirmed that the payment was successful. However, your team is saying that it failed. What is going on? I also raised a ticket earlier but haven't received any response from your side. 😡

I had a terrible experience with the Super Money app. My money was deducted from my account, but the app still shows that the transaction was not completed. To make matters worse, when I tried contacting customer support, they didn’t even bother to pick up my calls. This is extremely frustrating and unprofessional. I need my issue resolved immediately! If this is how they treat customers, I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone. Please fix the issue ASAP!

The app is developing at a good pace, and I have some feedback 2 share. Currently, d note is only visible when we tap on "View Details" after a transaction is completed. However, I suggest that the note should be displayed directly on the transaction confirmation page (Payment Successful page). The reason for this update is that if I send money to someone, they can immediately see the reason mentioned in the note and understand it without additional steps. This will help reduce effort.

One of the best app I have used for UPI so far which gives cashback in real cash and not in the form on useless vouchers. Also to add a conversation view of payment history would be much appreciated. Also during online payments it is not auto detectable on many platforms. I encountered with Google play it does not support Autopay. You can also include recharge and bills and other options to complete rely on this app for me.

I had a very disappointing experience with the Super Money app. The app does not function properly, and its service is extremely poor. Whenever I attempt to create a deposit, the app gets stuck, preventing me from completing the transaction. I also reached out to customer support via email regarding this issue, but I have yet to receive any response. It seems that significant improvements are needed to enhance the app’s functionality and overall user experience.

Support isn't good they are closing tickets without resolving the issue. I want to increase my credit limit last 7 days it's showing ₹10,000 without any reason. I am have mailed also the response and resolution is too slow for customer experience. update - after multiple mails their answer is same you have to deposit amount shown to you. the experience is very bad no proper support system to address any issue arises.

Few issues if that can be fixed and implemented would be great : 1. The transaction history only shows the transactions of the current month. Put a filter at the top to change the duration. 2. To view older transaction history one has to download it by setting the range of dates. However the downloaded pdf only has name, date, amount and success/failure columns. It doesnt have UPI tansaction Id or Reference number which is super important.

nothing exciting. almost all such kinds of app have same features and even much more than super.money. A big issues is everytime when I try to log needs OTP (it's okay) but verify the mobile number through sim binding and verification is not successful everytime. why there is need for sim binding verification when this app is installed on same device that has registered mobile number. useless app.

The screen lock feature is problematic. It often misses numbers, requiring me to enter my passcode twice. This needs to be fixed for a smoother experience. The app misguides users with a "Scan" option on the lock screen. Even though it appears, I can't scan without unlocking the app. This is inconvenient and should either be functional or removed to avoid confusion. UPI payments fail about 50% of the time, which is highly unreliable for daily use. Please remove passcode system and add finge

As a OnePlus user, I value my privacy and keep camera permissions blocked by default. However, the Super Money app consistently demands me to unblock my camera as soon as i open your app, for simple balance checks. This constant, unnecessary request is incredibly irritating. The app should only prompt camera access when click Tap to Scan option for payment. Fix this intrusive behavior and keep the user experience smooth and respectful of privacy.

I've been using the Super Money app for a month, and the experience has been frustrating. The app is extremely laggy and often fails to open, getting stuck on the launching screen. My device is a brand-new Moto Edge 50 Pro with high-end specs, so hardware isn't the issue. The developers seriously need to optimize performance, as it's nearly unusable in its current state. Hope they fix it soon!

The app is getting stuck on the loading screen when being opened. It's been almost more than 2 months since this happened. I uninstall and reinstall it, it works fine for 1 transaction but then again the same.... Looks like the developers are not yet ready to take this much load.

I appreciate the app, but annoying notification, WhatsApp intimation are not too good for this app. You did good. But if the cx feel irritated they will shift from your app. You can do , add a option where we customize our notification from your app. Because i switch off notifications from my android option.

Sometimes payments get failed. The app is a bit slow. Moreover, I installed this application as an alternative to GPay. But after registration, I see there is no mobile recharge or bill payments option available which are basic and essential elements of any payment application.

The update bricked the app. It was working fine a few days back and was my main UPI app due to its cashback. But after the most recent update, the app no longer works. I uninstalled & reinstalled the app and now the app doesn't allow me to login saying that it is unable to send SMS for verification.

The app has serious privacy breaching bugs. Fix your camera permissions ASAP!!! I have set camera permission to ask every time, I close the app and open it again and the camera opens up without asking for permission again. It's been 3 months I think I'm still having this issue.

it's very simple and user friendly UPI interface. but there is not individual Payment history like other upi apps have. there should be option of mobile recharge and another bill payment option. otherwise this app is very good and fast.

You only get cash backs for the first few transactions every month. And later on for the other transactions you get a ticket supposed to be for a raffle draw with smartphone as a price. But I'm skeptical about how they choose the winners or the names they put up as winners as real person. I've had my chances of winning the smartphones for for upto 100x but never got to win any. I would expect transparency on how they choose their winners. And their promise of cashback for every transaction's lie

It is hard to approach to the Customer care , and they do not take any action to our feedback, I paid a vendor and the status was showing pending from 30 hours (I had to give him cash eventually) and now after 30 hours money from my account has been debited and is given to the vendor, there no way I can contact that vendor and also to Customer support of super money. worst customer service experience ever!
Its A Scam App..Worst app lost money in the app due to credit card scam. Don't fall for credit card..

completely cheated, there is no cashbacks with this app. if your looking to install this app for only cashback purpose then don't Install because there is no 5% cashback with it all the offer is fake.

## FAQs

What is super.money?

super.money is a modern payments app designed to make paying people online faster, safer and simpler.

How do I use the Scan & Pay feature to send money?

- Tap the QR icon on the top left corner of the Pay screen
- Enter the amount you wish to send
- Add a payment note (if required)
- Select the bank account you want to pay from
- Enter your UPI PIN
- Wait for payment confirmation

What is UPI? How does it enable bank-to-bank transfer?

Unified Payments Interface (UPI) is a real-time payment system that facilitates instantaneous inter-bank transactions via mobile phones. UPI is developed by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India. UPI uses IMPS (Immediate Payment Service) for transferring funds from one account to another.

How do I know I can trust super.money with my payments?

Credibility, security and trust are at the core of what we’ve built. We are recognized and approved by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) and you can verify the same on NPCI’s website.

We’ve also partnered with Yes Bank, an RBI-recognized bank, for our UPI services and meet the highest compliance, security, and quality standards for payments apps.

Do I have to pay anything to create a super.money account and use super.money?

No. super.money is completely free and we will never ask you to pay anything to set up a super.money account or to use super.money to send money to people, merchants or bank accounts.

How can I contact super.money for UPI Support?

Go to ‘Profile’ → Click on the relevant FAQ → If your query isn’t resolved by the FAQ, click on ‘Contact support’ at the bottom of the FAQ answer

Alternatively, you can contact us at support@super.money to escalate any existing complaints or support tickets, and we will do our best to ensure a quick resolution.

description:
Paytm (पेटीएम), India’s #1 Payment App, is trusted by more than 45+ Crore Indians. Paytm is a one-stop solution for all your payment needs and is also a reliable money transfer app:

- Send money to your friends & family using your mobile number via Paytm BHIM UPI app, including those who are not on Paytm. Paytm is also a reliable bank to bank money transfer app.
- Scan any QR code & make online payments at grocery stores, petrol pumps, and restaurants. Paytm is among the best mobile payment apps for daily use & offers exciting cashbacks on eligible transactions.
- Paytm serves as a comprehensive recharge app & bill payment app, allowing users to recharge their mobile and pay utility bills (electricity, gas, water, broadband, etc.).

Paytm mobile pay app is now powered by top Indian banks: Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, SBI, & Yes Bank, ensuring a seamless and secure banking experience for all its users. 

Safe, reliable and superfast UPI payments
- Enter your mobile number & transfer money to anyone using Paytm UPI app
- Check your bank account balance and view transaction history on Paytm 
- Your UPI ID is a unique ID used to make payments using the Unified Payment Interface
- Set your UPI PIN (a 4 or 6-digit number). It’s mandatory to set the PIN while creating UPI ID on the UPI payment app
- Use UPI Lite for lightning-fast UPI Payments up to ₹4000 per day, no PIN required

Paytm adds more flexibility to UPI by offering the RuPay Credit Card, making secure payments quick and easy.

Benefits of using RuPay Credit Card on Paytm
- UPI payments via credit card on Paytm effortlessly - just add your card and pay at shops without CVV/OTP
- Hassle-free & safe payments: No need to carry credit cards
- Get Rewards & Cashbacks:  Earn rewards, cashbacks on all your Paytm payments

Safe & contactless payments at offline stores
- Pay using Paytm UPI Payments app, mobile number or by scanning a QR code at nearby stores, pharmacies, restaurants, petrol pumps etc.
 
Pay at online stores
- Make online payments on 100+ apps, including food delivery, grocery, shopping & entertainment apps
 
Easy mobile recharge & utility bill payments
- Recharge your mobile, DTH (TataPlay, Sun Direct, Airtel DTH, etc) or pay electricity, broadband, water bills, insurance premiums, E-Challan, Loan EMI, Municipal tax, etc.
- Find the latest prepaid and postpaid recharge plans & mobile recharge offers on Jio recharge, Airtel recharge, VI recharge, MTNL & BSNL recharge
- Recharge any FASTag easily with Paytm, the leading recharge app

Order food, monthly groceries, and home decor items on Paytm ONDC for the best deals

Check free credit score

Get instant personal loans in India
● Loan amount starting from 50K to 25 lac
● Repay loan 6-60 months
● Annual interest rate (per annum monthly reducing): 10.99%-35%
● Loan processing fee: 0-6%
Note: Personal loans are available only to Indian citizens within India

Lending partners (NBFC): 
● Hero Fincorp Ltd
● Aditya Birla Finance Ltd
● Incred
● EarlySalary (Fibe)
● Poonawalla Fincorp


Example:
Loan amount: 100,000, Interest 23%, Processing fee 4.25%, Tenure 18
Loan processing fee: ₹ 4250
Stamp duty charges: Applicable as per law
EMI per month: ₹ 6621
Total interest: ₹ 19178
Disbursal amount: ₹ 94785
Amount payable: ₹ 119186

Book tickets for Trains, Bus, Flights
- Paytm is the Authorized IRCTC Partner for Rail e-ticket booking, Cancellation, PNR Status & Live Train Status

Contact Us
One 97 Communications Ltd.
One Skymark, Tower-D, Plot No. H-10B,Sector-98, Noida UP 201304 IN

*Paytm Money Ltd. is a wholly owned subsidiary of One97 Communication Ltd. (Paytm) and is registered with SEBI and PFRDA as Stock broker (INZ000240532) and e-pop (269042019) for NPS services.

Paytm is India’s leading payment platform, offering BHIM UPI payments, money transfers, and easy recharges, all with top-notch security like the BHIM app.

description:
The Bajaj Finserv App is trusted by 50 million+ customers across India for their financial and payment needs. Using this app, you can apply online for a set of loans including personal loan, home loan, gold loan, professional loan etc, and fulfil your requirements. You can shop offline from 1 million+ products on Easy EMIs, invest in FDs, get insurance & do much more. You can also easily pay all your utility bills, recharge your mobile, DTH services & transfer money using BHIM UPI.

Instant Personal Loan App
● Get instant personal loans up to ₹55 Lakh with this loan app. 
● Doctors & Chartered Accountants can get funding via professional loans.
● Self-employed individuals can get affordable business loans.

Highlights of Personal Loan
✔️ Loan Amount: ₹20,000 to ₹55 Lakh
✔️ Repayment Tenure: 6 to 96 months
✔️ Rate of Interest: 10% to 32%
✔️ Processing Fees: Up to 3.93% of the loan amount (inclusive of applicable taxes)

Example: For a loan of ₹1,00,000 at an interest rate of 15% per annum for 12 months resulting in ₹8,310 interest amount (interest rate on a reducing balance method), with a processing fee of 3.93% (₹3,930) and other charges of ₹100, the total amount to be repaid after a year is approximately ₹1,12,340.
Note: This is an estimate; the actual interest rate and processing fees may vary depending on the product. 

Shop on Easy EMIs
● Shop from 1 million+ products at 1.5 lakh+ stores across India. 
● From electronics to sports equipment to smartphones to furniture - shop everything on Easy EMIs. 
● Shop genuine products from top brands with exciting offers and discounts.

Recharge & Bill Payments in One Place
● Pay all your utility bills such as water, LPG, electricity, etc. online using the Bajaj Finserv app.
● Recharge your mobile numbers, DTH & FASTag from leading providers.
● Instantly pay fees towards education, clubs & associations, housing societies, etc.
● Earn exciting cashback when you pay using Bajaj Pay UPI & use it for future bill payments.

Payments Simplified with BHIM UPI App
● Create your unique Bajaj Pay UPI ID, enjoy UPI offers & send/receive money, or pay bills by scanning any QR code & authorize your UPI payments by entering the UPI PIN.
● Add money to your Bajaj Pay Wallet & make payments in seconds.

Invest with Ease in Fixed Deposits
● Get high ROI on fresh FDs and renewal of existing FDs.
● Enjoy special rates on Digital FD through the app.
● You can start investing in FD online for just ₹15,000 and get a loan against it.
● Secure your savings with high-yield FD.

Mutual Funds for Everyone
● Invest in Mutual Funds with as low as ₹100 with this Top Mutual Fund App.
● You can invest in any Mutual Fund via monthly SIPs or pay a lumpsum.
● Pay monthly mutual fund investment via UPI.
● Make the most of your investment by paying 0% distributor commission.

Insurance for Every Need
● The Bajaj Finserv app offers 300+ plans for Health Insurance, Motor Insurance, Pocket Insurance, and more.
● Getting insurance is even easier with a 100% digital process.

One App for All Needs
● Fulfill your shopping and travel needs on one platform with 100+ brand partners.

Features
● Find all your financial transactions in one place
● Calculate your EMIs for your preferred tenure using the EMI Calculator 
● Check your CIBIL score and get the credit health report online
● Download your loan account statements
● Get quick assistance & timely resolution for your queries

Contact Us:
Bajaj Finserv- Off Pune-Ahmednagar Road, Vimannagar, Pune-411014

🚀 What's New in Bajaj Finserv!

* Business Loan: Seamlessly resume offline applications online, complete KYC, and track progress.
* Lawyer Loan: New journey with instant offers, in-app mandates, and accurate credit insights.

This app has been the worst user experience I've ever had. Every time I tried to use it, it would get stuck. Even when attempting to make UPI payments, it often redirects to the AMP web app and stops functioning. Similarly, while trying to make bill payments or recharge, the app frequently displays a complete white screen after selecting the option, and then stops working altogether.

I've been using the Bajaj Finserv app for a while now, and it's been a really frustrating experience. The app often crashes or fails to load, making it difficult to access important features like loan details and payments. The user interface is not intuitive, and the overall performance is poor. I've tried reaching out to customer support, but the response time is slow, and the issues are not resolved. I expected much better performance from an app associated with such a well-known company.

Very slow in flagship processer snapdragon 8th gen 3 mine. app is extremely disappointing and frustrating to use. It constantly lags, making it nearly impossible to navigate or access important information. Most of the time, it fails to display my loan details, which is the primary reason I use the app. This lack of functionality and poor performance is unacceptable. If these issues aren't resolved immediately, please

They keep trying to force their paid "prime" subscription down your throat. Pop ups for prime keep coming up every 2 seconds, particularly when trying to make any payment with this app, trying to trap the user into unintentional subscription. In the process app becomes extremely buggy and needs to be launched multiple times before one can actually do any of the basic functions. In developer response, they are misleading by irrelevantly referring to "terms & conditions" prime.

The offline KYC process is a hassle. Go to Store Locator shows outdated locations where some store do not exist. Some of them show the wrong location on Google Maps. The app won't even allow to take screenshots of the Store Locator shops list. Minimising the app for a sec and opening it again makes it blank for a while, sometimes it does not reappear. Also buying with EMI is a hassle and very confusing. Bajaj does not give the EXACT reason on why it is declined. App and process overhaul required

I had recently took a loan from Bajaj Finance and the experience has been great. The process was quick and hassle-free with minimal documentation required.and The app is user-friendly, and I can track my loan details anytime. Overall, I'm really happy with the service and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a smooth loan experience

Some things are not working in app like,mobile protect,fonesafe lite and insurance,not working buffering and not loading etc.,I also tried with wifi connection upto 100mbs also with cellular jio 5g, nothing works,I don't like the way,please fix it quickly because in my friend circle 13/20 friends of mine are facing the same problem,fix it quickly please.

what's the point of taking prime membership if I can't even access the rewards section on the app from past one month , when were I try opening rewards section, I get an error message 'something went wrong' and it closes rewards section. I waited patiently for a month waiting for you guys to correct it but I am still unable to use it

pathetic app with 0 customer service. EMI card is blocked for no reason and there are no instructions to unblock it. When trying to chat with support the bot keeps giving the same generic response that does not help. there is no number to reach customer service too. awful service. they won't let you raise a service request and will keep making you go in loops.

This app is fantastic the user interface is intuitive and the features are exactly what I need.It runs smoothly and I appreciate the regular updates that continues improve its performance.Highly recommended this app to anyone looking for a reliable and user friendly experience.

Even after paying the sum, there is no physical card. When tried to view the card number, it's showing authentication failed (even without mentioning the reason for failure). No means to contact customer support. only option is to raise a ticket and in that attempt they are providing the step i already tried but failed and the ticket connot be raised as they provided the solution. There will many ads emails and even whatsapp messages only till you take the card. Totally disappointed.

why is it trying to sync with my sim card? then tell me there's an error and your phone number is not your phone number? so far this app sucks, that's my experience so far, I don't even think this is for America. it puts a 9 and a 1 in front of your phone number, how is it going to have the right phone number if it doesn't even let you put in the right number. Ohh, thank you for getting back to me I didn't know it was only in India. So my review is incorrect, my apologies for bad review.

Bought their prime thinking about saving 10% on my bills but the pathetic app never used to pay anything. It just started loading and loading and loading as soon as you tap "pay". After getting frustrated you pay with other app 🤷. Worst app for bills and recharges.

No customer service. Pathetic App. To start with my loan is not getting reflected on the app. In app customer support doesn't list my specific concen. Customer care number doesn't have relevant options. On CC number they ask to key in registered mobile number and To move ahead it asks for OTP they have sent. But they don't send OTP. Effectively making CC number ineffective. I think the app, CC number and the whole after loan disbursement experience is shambolic. AVOID BAJAJ FINSERV.

I'm extremely disappointed with the Bajaj Finance app. Despite its functionality for paying EMIs, the app's performance is sluggish and frustrating to use. A major drawback is its inability to display the outstanding balance. Overall, my experience with the app has been subpar, and I would rate it poorly.

App doesn't work on emi payment date.... payment not updated in their system...won't recommend to anyone....updated the app...re writing the same issue again after three months...at the date of emi app stops working for-2-3 days ,emi aslo not auto debited from account...you need to pay amt manually with extra charges...which always effects on your cibil score.

Their customer service is very bad. They deduct money on failed transactions. On complaining they close the service request. And the status of the closed service request does not come on their app. There is no customer service toll free number on the app and the mail id is automatic which is useless.

This app is fantastic the user interface is intuitive and the features are exactly what i need. it runs smoothly and I appreciate the regular updates that continue to improve its Performance highly recommended this app to anyone looking for a reliable and user friendly experience...

"Bajaj finserv is not responding" repeatedly getting this message in the new versions. Earlier this app user to work fine. Update 21Feb25: Even after 6 months issue remain the same. Update 18Mar25: After reinstall app was fast initially but in few mins again became very sluggish. This app is the most sluggish app on my phone.

It was a very good app. But now there is a very big issue. I am getting a message to do kyc reverification, but when I am trying to do verification, it again and again says "there was a technical error at our end, please retry". i applied for a loan over this application.. everything is done but after that it's continuously showing that our representative will connect you with 24 hrs and it's been more than 15 days but nobody tried to connect with me. really frustrating... uninstalling it now it's useless

Thanks for fixing loading issues..but when I click on any loan details in relation..it loads for continuous 5 - 10.seconds and then it shows server failed to load in red ..pls fix this asap(issue from last 1 month..even with Other devices same issue)..not sure why these changes are being deployed in production with out end to end data load sanity..my self has reported more than 4-5 major issues .. requested to pls fix asap

Applied and received the card by paying Rs. 530/-. Took the card for online shopping. I have never found this clause during the application process. Wastage of Rs. 530/-.

The Bajaj Finserv app is frustratingly slow. Every action takes too long to load, whether it's checking loan details, making payments, or even just opening the app. The user experience is poor due to constant lags and delays. A financial app should be fast and efficient, but this one is the opposite. Developers need to optimize the app for better performance. Until then, it's a disappointing experience.

I've been using the Bajaj Finserv App for managing my personal loans, credit cards, and investments. The app is extremely user-friendly and provides a seamless experience. I can easily track my payments, due dates and statements. The app also offers personalized offers and discounts, which is a great bonus. The customer support team is also very responsive and helpful. Overall, I'm very satisfied with the app and would highly recommend as convenient and reliable financial management solution

description:
Instant personal loan app, free credit-score & more!🔥 

OneScore is a lifetime free credit score management and instant personal loan platform trusted by over 4 Crore Indians.  Whether you need money for short term personal expenses, a long vacation, or to cover medical expenses, you can get an instant loan for any cash emergency with OnePL. 

✅Instant Loan Disbursal 
✅Easy Application
✅No Collateral requirement
✅Zero Documentation
✅Flexible EMI options 

How to avail of the best instant loan offer on OneScore💸
Build your credit worth by regularly tracking your credit score, & look out for the personalized best loan offer. Depending on your credit score, & other factors, you will receive instant approval for a personal loan through our app.

What’s more!💡
You can also use the EMI calculator within the app to plan your online loan EMIs & choose from the flexible repayment options. 
Set up payment reminders so you never miss an EMI.

Eligibility Criteria for best online loan offer with OnePL👇
A credit score of 730 & above
Stable employment with monthly salary of >₹20,000
Aadhar and PAN card holder 

OnePL features:🚀
• Lending partners: Federal Bank, South Indian Bank, Kisetsu Saison Finance India (KSF)
• Loan Amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh
• Loan tenure: Minimum 6 months, maximum 48 Months
• Interest Rates: 12.5%-18.5% (for Federal bank), 15.9%-16.8% (For SIB), 13.5% - 29.99% (For KSF)
• Processing fees: 1.5-2.5% (Minimum Rs. 999) for Federal bank and 1% + Rs. 750 Digital document charges + GST for SIB, 1%-4% for KSF
• APR: 13.32%-27.49% (for Federal bank), 16.54%-20.52% (For SIB),  16% - 42% (For KSF)  

Let's understand this with an example, assuming a personal loan of Rs. 50,000 with a 13% interest rate & a repayment tenure of 1 year. Here’s how your online loan disbursal amount would be calculated:

• Loan Amount - ₹50,000
• Tenure - 12 months
• Interest Rate - 13%
• EMI - ₹4,466
• Total Interest Payable - ₹4,466 x 12 months - ₹50,000 Principal = ₹ 3592   
• Processing Fees (incl. GST) - ₹1179
• Disbursed Amount - ₹50,000 - ₹1,179 = ₹48,821
• Total Amount Payable - Principal + Interest + Processing Fees = ₹54,771
• Total Cost of the Loan = Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹3592 + ₹1179 = ₹4,771

*In case the loan is disbursed on or after the 6th of the month and your EMIs fall on the 5th of the month, there’s a gap of 29 days between your loan disbursal date & the first EMI. The interest rate charged for this period is called Broken Period Interest.

Why download OneScore?📲

Get instant loans up to Rs 5 lakh with zero documentation & flexible EMI options.

Check your Experian and CIBIL score for free. It’s also completely spam-free & ad-free.

Get notified about changes in your credit score. Stay in charge of your credit score with a simplified credit report & eliminate errors in real-time.

Use the ‘Find out why feature’ to analyze your data and understand exactly why your Experian and CIBIL credit score has changed.

Use the Score Planner to level up your credit score. Set a goal for yourself & achieve your ideal score with personalized insights.  

Have a low credit score? Use the simulator to get suggestions on how to improve your Experian and CIBIL score with good financial habits. 

Get a bird’s eye view of all your personal loan & credit card accounts. 

Report inaccuracies in your credit record with a simple click.

Why OneScore is different🌟

End-to-End Credit Management Tool
One-stop solution for end-to-end credit management from building your credit score to availing instant personal loans at low-interest rates.

Safe & Secure:
None of your information is shared with any third party or institution. Your data is safe with us.

email for help: support@fplabs.tech. Do visit our website to contact us for any queries at https://onescore.app.
Our address: West Bay, S. No. 278 Hissa No. 4/3, Pallod Farms Phase II, Baner, Pune, MH IN 411045
